papers.title: Chorus: a Programming Framework for Building Scalable Differential Privacy Mechanisms
papers.authors: Noah M. Johnson, Joseph P. Near, Joseph M. Hellerstein, Dawn Song
papers.abstract: Differential privacy is fast becoming the gold standard in enabling statistical analysis of data while protecting the privacy of individuals. However, practical use of differential privacy still lags behind research progress because research prototypes cannot satisfy the scalability requirements of production deployments. To address this challenge, we present Chorus, a framework for building scalable differential privacy mechanisms which is based on cooperation between the mechanism itself and a high-performance production database management system (DBMS). We demonstrate the use of Chorus to build the first highly scalable implementations of complex mechanisms like Weighted PINQ, MWEM, and the matrix mechanism. We report on our experience deploying Chorus at Uber, and evaluate its scalability on real-world queries.
papers.abstract_zh: 差异隐私正迅速成为在保护个人隐私的同时实现数据统计分析的黄金标准。然而，差分隐私的实际使用仍然落后于研究进展，因为研究原型无法满足生产部署的可伸缩性要求。为了应对这一挑战，我们提出了Chorus，这是一个用于构建可扩展的差分隐私机制的框架，它基于机制本身和高性能生产数据库管理系统(DBMS)之间的合作。我们演示了如何使用Chorus来构建复杂机制的第一个高度可伸缩的实现，比如加权PINQ、MWEM和矩阵机制。我们报告了在优步部署Chorus的经验，并评估了它在真实查询中的可伸缩性。
papers.title_zh: Chorus:一个用于构建可伸缩的差分隐私机制的编程框架

papers.title: Detecting Malware Injection with Program-DNS Behavior
papers.authors: Yixin Sun, Kangkook Jee, Suphannee Sivakorn, Zhichun Li, Cristian Lumezanu, Lauri Korts-Pärn, Zhenyu Wu, Junghwan Rhee, Chung Hwan Kim, Mung Chiang, Prateek Mittal
papers.abstract: Analyzing the DNS traffic of Internet hosts has been a successful technique to counter cyberattacks and identify connections to malicious domains. However, recent stealthy attacks hide malicious activities within seemingly legitimate connections to popular web services made by benign programs. Traditional DNS monitoring and signature-based detection techniques are ineffective against such attacks. To tackle this challenge, we present a new program-level approach that can effectively detect such stealthy attacks. Our method builds a fine-grained Program-DNS profile for each benign program that characterizes what should be the “expected” DNS behavior. We find that malware-injected processes have DNS activities which significantly deviate from the Program-DNS profile of the benign program. We then develop six novel features based on the Program-DNS profile, and evaluate the features on a dataset of over 130 million DNS requests collected from a real-world enterprise and 8 million requests from malware-samples executed in a sandbox environment. We compare our detection results with that of previously-proposed features and demonstrate that our new features successfully detect 190 malware-injected processes which fail to be detected by previously-proposed features. Overall, our study demonstrates that fine-grained Program-DNS profiles can provide meaningful and effective features in building detectors for attack campaigns that bypass existing detection systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 分析互联网主机的DNS流量已经成为对抗网络攻击和识别恶意域连接的成功技术。然而，最近的秘密攻击将恶意活动隐藏在由良性程序建立的到流行web服务的看似合法的连接中。传统的DNS监控和基于签名的检测技术对于这种攻击是无效的。为了应对这一挑战，我们提出了一种新的程序级方法，可以有效地检测这种隐形攻击。我们的方法为每个良性程序构建了一个细粒度的程序DNS配置文件，它描述了“预期”的DNS行为。我们发现注入恶意软件的进程具有明显偏离良性程序的程序DNS配置文件的DNS活动。然后，我们基于该程序的DNS配置文件开发了六个新功能，并在一个数据集上对这些功能进行了评估，该数据集包含从真实企业收集的超过1.3亿个DNS请求和在沙盒环境中执行的800万个恶意软件样本请求。我们将我们的检测结果与以前提出的特征进行比较，并证明我们的新特征成功地检测到了以前提出的特征未能检测到的190个恶意软件注入的进程。总的来说，我们的研究表明，细粒度的程序DNS配置文件可以为绕过现有检测系统的攻击活动构建检测器提供有意义和有效的功能。
papers.title_zh: 利用程序DNS行为检测恶意软件注入

papers.title: SecurePay: Strengthening Two-Factor Authentication for Arbitrary Transactions
papers.authors: Radhesh Krishnan Konoth, Björn Fischer, Wan J. Fokkink, Elias Athanasopoulos, Kaveh Razavi, Herbert Bos
papers.abstract: Secure transactions on the Internet often rely on two-factor authentication (2FA) using mobile phones. In most existing schemes, the separation between the factors is weak and a compromised phone may be enough to break 2FA. In this paper, we identify the basic principles for securing any transaction using mobile-based 2FA. In particular, we argue that the computing system should not only provide isolation between the two factors, but also the integrity of the transaction, while involving the user in confirming the authenticity of the transaction. We show for the first time how these properties can be provided on commodity mobile phones, securing 2FA-protected transactions even when the operating system on the phone is fully compromised. We explore the challenges in the design and implementation of SecurePay, and evaluate the first formally-verified solution that utilizes the ARM TrustZone technology to provide the necessary integrity and authenticity guarantees for mobile-based 2FA. For our evaluation, we integrated SecurePay in ten existing apps, all of which required minimal changes and less than 30 minutes of work. Moreover, if code modifications are not an option, SecurePay can still be used as a secure drop-in replacement for existing (insecure) SMS-based 2FA solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网上的安全交易通常依赖于使用移动电话的双因素认证(2FA)。在大多数现有的方案中，这些因素之间的分离很弱，一部受损的手机可能足以破坏2FA。在本文中，我们确定了使用基于移动设备的2FA保护任何交易的基本原则。特别地，我们认为计算系统不仅应该提供这两个因素之间的隔离，还应该提供交易的完整性，同时让用户参与确认交易的真实性。我们首次展示了如何在商用手机上提供这些属性，即使手机上的操作系统完全受损，也能保护2FA保护的交易。我们探讨了SecurePay设计和实施中的挑战，并评估了第一个经过正式验证的解决方案，该解决方案利用ARM TrustZone技术为基于移动设备的2FA提供必要的完整性和真实性保证。在我们的评估中，我们将SecurePay集成到了10个现有的应用程序中，所有这些应用程序都只需要最少的更改和不到30分钟的工作。此外，如果代码修改不是一个选项，SecurePay仍然可以用作现有的(不安全的)基于SMS的2FA解决方案的安全替代方案。
papers.title_zh: SecurePay:加强任意交易的双因素认证

papers.title: PESTO: Proactively Secure Distributed Single Sign-On, or How to Trust a Hacked Server
papers.authors: Carsten Baum, Tore Kasper Frederiksen, Julia Hesse, Anja Lehmann, Avishay Yanai
papers.abstract: Single Sign-On (SSO) is becoming an increasingly popular authentication method for users that leverages a trusted Identity Provider (IdP) to bootstrap secure authentication tokens from a single user password. It alleviates some of the worst security issues of passwords, as users no longer need to memorize individual passwords for all service providers, and it removes the burden of these service to properly protect huge password databases. However, SSO also introduces a single point of failure. If compromised, the IdP can impersonate all users and learn their master passwords. To remedy this risk while preserving the advantages of SSO, Agrawal et al. (CCS'18) recently proposed a distributed realization termed PASTA (password-authenticated threshold authentication) which splits the role of the IdP across n servers. While PASTA is a great step forward and guarantees security as long as not all servers are corrupted, it uses a rather inflexible corruption model: servers cannot be corrupted adaptively and - even worse - cannot recover from corruption. The latter is known as proactive security and allows servers to re-share their keys, thereby rendering all previously compromised information useless. In this work, we improve upon the work of PASTA and propose a distributed SSO protocol with proactive and adaptive security (PESTO), guaranteeing security as long as not all servers are compromised at the same time. We prove our scheme secure in the UC framework which is known to provide the best security guarantees for password-based primitives. The core of our protocol are two new primitives we introduce: partially-oblivious distributed PRFs and a class of distributed signature schemes. Both allow for non-interactive refreshing of the secret key material and tolerate adaptive corruptions. We give secure instantiations based on the gap one-more BDH and RSA assumption respectively, leading to a highly efficient 2-round PESTO protocol. We also present an implementation and benchmark of our scheme in Java, realizing OAuth-compatible bearer tokens for SSO, demonstrating the viability of our approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 单点登录(SSO)正成为越来越受用户欢迎的身份认证方法，它利用可信身份提供者(IdP)从单个用户密码引导安全身份认证令牌。它缓解了一些最糟糕的密码安全问题，因为用户不再需要记住所有服务提供商的个人密码，并且它消除了这些服务的负担，以适当地保护巨大的密码数据库。然而，SSO也引入了单点故障。如果遭到破坏，IdP可以模拟所有用户并获知他们的主密码。为了弥补这一风险，同时保留SSO的优势，Agrawal等人(CCS'18)最近提出了一种称为PASTA(密码认证的门限认证)的分布式实现，它将IdP的角色划分到n个服务器上。虽然PASTA是一个很大的进步，只要不是所有的服务器都被破坏，它就能保证安全性，但是它使用了一个相当不灵活的破坏模型:服务器不能自适应地被破坏，甚至更糟，不能从破坏中恢复。后者被称为主动安全，它允许服务器重新共享它们的密钥，从而使所有以前泄露的信息变得无用。在本文中，我们改进了PASTA的工作，提出了一个具有主动和自适应安全性的分布式单点登录协议(PESTO ),只要不是所有的服务器同时受到攻击，它就能保证安全性。我们在UC框架下证明了我们的方案是安全的，UC框架为基于口令的原语提供了最好的安全保证。协议的核心是我们引入的两个新的原语:部分不经意的分布式PRFs和一类分布式签名方案。两者都允许秘密密钥材料的非交互式刷新，并容许适应性破坏。我们分别基于多BDH和RSA假设给出了安全实例，从而得到一个高效的两轮PESTO协议。我们还介绍了我们的方案在Java中的实现和基准，为SSO实现了OAuth兼容的承载令牌，证明了我们方法的可行性。
papers.title_zh: PESTO:主动保护分布式单点登录，或者如何信任被黑的服务器

papers.title: COMAR: Classification of Compromised versus Maliciously Registered Domains
papers.authors: Sourena Maroofi, Maciej Korczynski, Cristian Hesselman, Benoît Ampeau, Andrzej Duda
papers.abstract: Miscreants abuse thousands of domain names every day by launching large-scale attacks such as phishing or malware campaigns. While some domains are solely registered for malicious purposes, others are benign but get compromised and misused to serve malicious content. Existing methods for their detection can either predict malicious domains at the time of registration or identify indicators of an ongoing malicious activity conflating maliciously registered and compromised domains into common blacklists. Since the mitigation actions for these two types domains are different, we propose COMAR, an approach to differentiate between compromised and maliciously registered domains, complementary to previously proposed domain reputation systems. We start the paper with a thorough analysis of the domain life cycle to determine the relationship between each step and define its associated features. COMAR uses a set of 38 features costly to evade. We evaluate COMAR using phishing and malware blacklists and show that it can achieve high accuracy (97% accuracy with a 2.5% false-positive rate) without using any privileged or non-publicly available data, which makes it suitable for the use by any organization. We plan to deploy COMAR at two domain registry operators of the European country-code TLDs and set up an early notification system to facilitate the remediation of blacklisted domains.
papers.abstract_zh: 不法分子通过发起大规模攻击，如网络钓鱼或恶意软件活动，每天滥用数千个域名。虽然有些域名只是为了恶意目的而注册的，但其他域名是良性的，但会受到损害并被滥用来提供恶意内容。现有的检测方法既可以在注册时预测恶意域，也可以识别正在进行的恶意活动的指示器，将恶意注册和受损的域合并到公共黑名单中。由于这两种类型的域的缓解措施是不同的，我们提出COMAR，一种区分受损和恶意注册域的方法，作为以前提出的域信誉系统的补充。我们从对领域生命周期的全面分析开始，以确定每个步骤之间的关系，并定义其相关的特性。COMAR使用了一套38个特征，规避成本很高。我们使用网络钓鱼和恶意软件黑名单来评估COMAR，并表明它可以在不使用任何特权或非公开可用数据的情况下实现高准确性(97%的准确性和2.5%的误报率)，这使得它适合任何组织使用。我们计划在欧洲国家代码顶级域名的两个域名注册管理机构运营商部署COMAR，并建立一个早期通知系统，以促进黑名单域名的补救。
papers.title_zh: COMAR:受损域名与恶意注册域名的分类

papers.title: SoK: Delegation and Revocation, the Missing Links in the Web's Chain of Trust
papers.authors: Laurent Chuat, AbdelRahman Abdou, Ralf Sasse, Christoph Sprenger, David A. Basin, Adrian Perrig
papers.abstract: The ability to quickly revoke a compromised key is critical to the security of any public-key infrastructure. Regrettably, most traditional certificate revocation schemes suffer from latency, availability, or privacy problems. These problems are exacerbated by the lack of a native delegation mechanism in TLS, which increasingly leads domain owners to engage in dangerous practices such as sharing their private keys with third parties. We analyze solutions that address the longstanding delegation and revocation shortcomings of the web PKI, with a focus on approaches that directly affect the chain of trust (i.e., the X.509 certification path). For this purpose, we propose a 19-criteria framework for characterizing revocation and delegation schemes. We also show that combining short-lived delegated credentials or proxy certificates with an appropriate revocation system would solve several pressing problems.
papers.abstract_zh: 快速撤销泄露密钥的能力对于任何公钥基础设施的安全性都是至关重要的。遗憾的是，大多数传统的证书撤销方案都存在延迟、可用性或隐私问题。TLS中缺乏本地授权机制加剧了这些问题，这越来越多地导致域名所有者参与危险的行为，如与第三方共享他们的私钥。我们分析了解决web PKI长期存在的授权和撤销缺点的解决方案，重点关注直接影响信任链的方法(即X.509认证路径)。为此，我们提出了一个描述撤销和授权方案的19标准框架。我们还表明，将短期委托凭证或代理证书与适当的撤销系统相结合将解决几个紧迫的问题。
papers.title_zh: SoK:授权和撤销，网络信任链中缺失的环节

papers.title: International Workshop on Cyber Range Technologies and Applications (CACOE 2020)
papers.authors: Maria Leitner, Teodor Sommestad
papers.abstract: Cyber ranges are virtual environments (e.g., cyber-physical labs and private clouds) meant to represent real cyber environments. Analogous to a shooting range, a cyber range is a safe place to test and explore various types of cyber attacks without jeopardizing any operational systems or business processes. There are countless examples of when cyber ranges are been used to advance knowledge in cyber security and countless examples of training programs and larger exercises that have used cyber ranges to reach their learning goals. Unfortunately, setting up events in a cyber range can be difficult and error-prone. This is not strange, because it is often expected that a few cyber range engineers should both instantiate and manage cyber environments that normally require a whole IT-department and simulate realistic user activity in these environments. Nevertheless, tools to support this process is warranted. Furthermore, since the use of cyber ranges can be costly compared to alternatives, such as computer modeling and tabletop exercises, more knowledge of their utility to different types of problems is also desirable.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络靶场是虚拟环境(例如，网络物理实验室和私有云)，旨在代表真实的网络环境。类似于射击场，网络靶场是一个测试和探索各种类型网络攻击的安全场所，不会危及任何操作系统或业务流程。有无数的例子表明，网络靶场被用来提高网络安全方面的知识，也有无数的例子表明，培训计划和更大规模的演习使用网络靶场来达到他们的学习目标。不幸的是，在网络范围内安排活动可能很困难，而且容易出错。这并不奇怪，因为通常期望几个网络工程师既实例化又管理通常需要整个it部门的网络环境，并在这些环境中模拟真实的用户活动。然而，支持这一过程的工具是必要的。此外，由于与计算机建模和桌面练习等替代方法相比，使用电脑靶场成本较高，因此也需要更多地了解电脑靶场对不同类型问题的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 赛博靶场技术与应用国际研讨会(CACOE 2020)

papers.title: Automated Penetration Testing Using Deep Reinforcement Learning
papers.authors: Zhenguo Hu, Razvan Beuran, Yasuo Tan
papers.abstract: At present, penetration testing is done mostly manually, and relies heavily on the experience of the ethical hackers that are performing it, called "pentesters". This paper presents an automated penetration testing framework that employs deep reinforcement learning to automate the penetration testing process. We plan to use this framework mainly as a component of cybersecurity training activities, to provide guided learning for attack training by making use of the framework to suggest possible strategies. When adding support for actual penetration testing tools, the framework could also be used in defense training, by automatically recreating attacks in the training environment.In this paper we present our approach for automated penetration testing, which has two stages. First we use the Shodan search engine to collect relevant server data in order to build a realistic network topology, and employ multi-host multi-stage vulnerability analysis (MulVAL) to generate an attack tree for that topology; traditional search algorithms are used to find all the possible attack paths in that tree and to build a matrix representation as needed by deep reinforcement learning algorithms. As a second stage, we employ the Deep Q-Learning Network (DQN) method to discover the most easy to exploit attack path from the possible candidates. This approach was evaluated by generating thousands of input scenarios, and DQN was able to find the optimal path with an accuracy of 0.86, while also providing valid solutions in the other cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 目前，渗透测试大多是手动完成的，并且严重依赖于执行渗透测试的道德黑客的经验，这些黑客被称为“pentesters”。本文提出了一个自动化渗透测试框架，该框架采用深度强化学习来自动化渗透测试过程。我们计划将该框架主要用作网络安全培训活动的一个组成部分，通过利用该框架建议可能的策略，为攻击培训提供指导学习。当添加对实际渗透测试工具的支持时，通过在训练环境中自动重现攻击，该框架还可以用于防御训练。在本文中，我们提出了我们的自动化渗透测试方法，它有两个阶段。首先，我们使用Shodan搜索引擎收集相关的服务器数据，以建立一个现实的网络拓扑，并采用多主机多阶段漏洞分析(MulVAL)来生成该拓扑的攻击树；传统的搜索算法用于找到树中所有可能的攻击路径，并根据深度强化学习算法的需要构建矩阵表示。在第二阶段，我们使用深度Q学习网络(DQN)方法从可能的候选者中发现最容易被利用的攻击路径。通过生成数千个输入场景来评估这种方法，DQN能够以0.86的精度找到最佳路径，同时在其他情况下也提供有效的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 使用深度强化学习的自动化渗透测试

papers.title: Comprehensive Cyber Arena; The Next Generation Cyber Range
papers.authors: Mika Karjalainen, Tero Kokkonen
papers.abstract: The cyber domain and all the interdependencies between networked systems form an extremely complex ensemble. Incidents in the cyber domain may have an abundance effect on the physical domain. For example, a cyber attack or an intrusion against an electricity system may affect the performance of healthcare system as well. For organisation's cyber resilience, know-how is the key resource. Cyber security training and exercises have an extremely important role for achieving the required level of know-how in the cyber domain. The old military based-proverb You Fight Like You Train is relevant in the cyber domain. Traditionally, the platform for cyber security training and exercises is called cyber range. Because of the accelerating digitalisation and more complex totality of the cyber domain, also the infrastructure for the cyber security training and exercises is required to be more and more complex. In this paper, the concept of cyber arena, next generation cyber range, is discussed.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络领域和所有联网系统之间的相互依赖构成了一个极其复杂的整体。网络领域的事件可能会对物理领域产生巨大影响。例如，针对电力系统的网络攻击或入侵也可能影响医疗保健系统的性能。对于组织的网络弹性来说，专业知识是关键资源。网络安全培训和演习对于达到网络领域所需的知识水平具有极其重要的作用。古老的军事谚语“像训练一样战斗”适用于网络领域。传统上，网络安全训练和演习的平台被称为网络靶场。由于数字化进程的加快和网络领域整体的更加复杂，网络安全培训和演习的基础设施也需要变得越来越复杂。本文讨论了赛博竞技场的概念，即下一代赛博靶场。
papers.title_zh: 全面的网络竞技场；下一代网络产品系列

papers.title: Evaluation of Information Elements in a Cyber Incident Report
papers.authors: Patrik Lif, Stefan Varga, Mikael Wedlin, David Lindahl, Mats Persson
papers.abstract: An analyst’s main task within cyber security is to monitor, analyze, and decide on appropriate remedies for detected attacks. Analysts should ideally produce incident reports for record keeping and traceability, but also for enabling information sharing.This paper investigates which information elements that need to be included in an incident report to support incident management in a time-critical and high mental workload situation. Background information on existing reporting templates were drawn from the literature. Five different templates, a data exchange format, as well as two cyber situational awareness frameworks were analyzed. Then a novel reporting template from the military domain was scrutinized during a live cyber defense exercise.The results show that the information elements in the various existing templates differ, probably due to the different areas of use. The proposed military template was found to be useful to a high degree, even for incident reporting in the civilian sector. The new template can be improved by introducing additional fields, such as, e.g. descriptions of victims, attackers and assessments of attackers’ motives.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络安全分析师的主要任务是监控、分析和决定对检测到的攻击采取适当的补救措施。理想情况下，分析师应该生成事故报告，以便于记录和跟踪，同时也便于信息共享。本文调查了在时间紧迫和高脑力负荷的情况下，需要在事故报告中包含哪些信息元素来支持事故管理。现有报告模板的背景信息来自文献。分析了五种不同的模板、一种数据交换格式以及两种网络态势感知框架。然后，一个来自军事领域的新颖的报告模板在一次网络防御演习中被仔细检查。结果表明，各种现有模板中的信息元素不同，这可能是由于使用领域不同。拟议的军事模板被认为非常有用，甚至对民用部门的事件报告也是如此。可以通过引入额外的字段来改进新模板，例如对受害者、攻击者的描述以及对攻击者动机的评估。
papers.title_zh: 网络事件报告中信息元素的评估

papers.title: Learning Analytics Perspective: Evidencing Learning from Digital Datasets in Cybersecurity Exercises
papers.authors: Kaie Maennel
papers.abstract: Cybersecurity exercises are gaining in popularity in university curricula and professional training paths and are seen as an effective teaching method. Such exercises provide digital datasets to facilitate a learning analytics approach such as by using the traces that learners leave behind to improve the learning process and environment. While there are various learning measurement efforts from digital datasets in the existing literature, a holistic learning analytics approach incorporated into cybersecurity exercises is still lacking. We propose a practical reference model for incorporating a learning analytics approach into the cybersecurity exercise life-cycle. To facilitate this application, we have performed an extensive review of existing academic research on applying learning analytics in the context of cybersecurity exercises. We specifically focus on the learning indicators used to measure empirical impact and training effectiveness that could indicate achievement of defined learning outcomes. This reference model and overview of existing learning analytics use cases and learning metrics in various types of exercises can help educators, organisers and cyber range developers. This results in more adaptive exercise design and measurement using evidence-based data and connects digital learning traces to skills and competencies.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络安全练习在大学课程和专业培训路径中越来越受欢迎，并被视为一种有效的教学方法。这种练习提供数字数据集来促进学习分析方法，例如通过使用学习者留下的痕迹来改善学习过程和环境。虽然在现有文献中有各种来自数字数据集的学习测量工作，但是仍然缺乏整合到网络安全练习中的整体学习分析方法。我们提出了一个实用的参考模型，用于将学习分析方法纳入网络安全演习生命周期。为了促进这种应用，我们对现有的关于在网络安全演习中应用学习分析的学术研究进行了广泛的审查。我们特别关注用于衡量经验影响和培训效果的学习指标，这些指标可以表明定义的学习成果的实现情况。该参考模型和现有学习分析用例的概述以及各种类型练习中的学习指标可以帮助教育工作者、组织者和网络范围开发者。这导致使用基于证据的数据进行更具适应性的锻炼设计和测量，并将数字学习轨迹与技能和能力联系起来。
papers.title_zh: 学习分析视角:在网络安全演习中从数字数据集学习的证据

papers.title: CRATE Exercise Control - A cyber defense exercise management and support tool
papers.authors: Jonas Almroth, Tommy Gustafsson
papers.abstract: The growing dependency on computerized systems in society causes an increased need for a high level of cyber security competence among the professionals tasked with operating and protecting such systems. Cyber defense exercises are important for experience-based learning to train professionals working with critical computer systems. However, arranging realistic exercises require skilled instructors and technicians with the right set of tools. In this paper, we describe an exercise management and support tool called CRATE Exercise Control (CEC). The tool was developed by the Swedish Defence Research Agency (FOI), based on empirical experiences from arranging cyber defense exercises in the cyber range CRATE (Cyber Range And Training Environment), and best practices published by other organizations. We also share experiences made while using CEC during cyber defense exercises, as well as recommendations to consider when designing exercise management and support tools.
papers.abstract_zh: 社会对计算机化系统的依赖日益增长，这使得负责操作和保护此类系统的专业人员对高水平网络安全能力的需求不断增加。网络防御练习对于基于经验的学习来培训使用关键计算机系统的专业人员非常重要。然而，安排真实的练习需要熟练的教师和技术人员使用合适的工具。在本文中，我们描述了一个运动管理和支持工具，称为机箱运动控制(CEC)。该工具由瑞典国防研究机构(FOI)开发，基于在网络靶场箱(网络靶场和训练环境)中安排网络防御演习的经验，以及其他组织公布的最佳实践。我们还分享了在网络防御演习中使用CEC的经验，以及在设计演习管理和支持工具时要考虑的建议。
papers.title_zh: CRATE演习控制-一种网络防御演习管理和支持工具

papers.title: Replicated Testbed Experiments for the Evaluation of a Wide-range of DDoS Defenses
papers.authors: Alefiya Hussain, David DeAngelis, Erik Kline, Stephen Schwab
papers.abstract: Cyber security attacks and defenses are constantly evolving, requiring us to re-tool our networks at a regular pace. New systems are usually evaluated within restricted corporate or enterprise networks, with limited or no access for researchers and cyber security students. In this paper we present a longitudinal study of the design and evaluation of six novel defense technologies to thwart next generation DDoS attacks. While the technologies were developed independently as part of the DARPA XD3 program, the evaluations were conducted over the last year on the DETER cyber security testbed and on Amazon Web Services. We present the evaluation framework, the results, and the inherent challenges in evaluating a wide range of defense technologies on the testbed. We believe the technologies presented in this paper will aid in the development of relevant and plausible living in the future operational scenarios for cyber ranges.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络安全攻击和防御在不断发展，要求我们定期更新我们的网络。新系统通常在受限的公司或企业网络中进行评估，研究人员和网络安全专业的学生只能有限或根本无法访问。在本文中，我们提出了一个纵向研究的设计和评估六个新的防御技术，以挫败下一代DDoS攻击。虽然这些技术是作为DARPA XD3计划的一部分独立开发的，但评估是在去年在DETER网络安全测试床和亚马逊网络服务上进行的。我们介绍了评估框架、结果以及在测试平台上评估各种防御技术的固有挑战。我们相信，本文中介绍的技术将有助于在未来的赛博靶场的作战场景中开发相关和可信的生活。
papers.title_zh: 用于评估各种DDoS防御的重复试验台实验

papers.title: An Experimental Approach for Estimating Cyber Risk: a Proposal Building upon Cyber Ranges and Capture the Flags
papers.authors: Giorgio Di Tizio, Fabio Massacci, Luca Allodi, Stanislav Dashevskyi, Jelena Mirkovic
papers.abstract: Current approaches to estimate the risk of compromise are based on either historical data or pure technical assessments, such as the number and severity of vulnerabilities in the target network. We propose a novel experimental approach for estimating the risk of compromise based on experimental data, as opposed to observational data, by leveraging on cyber ranges and capture the flag exercises. We identify the key design principles in terms of response and explanatory variables, specification of how they can be measured, and the overall block design from related experiments and approaches as well as assess their suitability and limitations.
papers.abstract_zh: 当前评估危害风险的方法基于历史数据或纯技术评估，如目标网络中漏洞的数量和严重性。我们提出了一种新的实验方法，通过利用网络靶场和捕捉旗帜演习，基于实验数据而不是观察数据来估计危害风险。我们根据响应和解释变量、如何测量它们的规范以及来自相关实验和方法的整体区组设计来确定关键设计原则，并评估它们的适用性和局限性。
papers.title_zh: 评估网络风险的实验方法:基于网络范围和捕捉旗帜的建议

papers.title: First International Workshop on lightweight and Incremental Cybersecurity Certification
papers.authors: Philippe Massonet
papers.abstract: CyberCert 2020 is the first edition of the workshop on lightweight and Incremental Cybersecurity Certification. The workshop is co-located with the IEEE European Symposium on Security and Privacy 2020 conference that will be held in Genova, Italy on September 7-11, 2020.
papers.abstract_zh: CyberCert 2020是轻量级和增量网络安全认证研讨会的第一个版本。该研讨会与将于2020年9月7日至11日在意大利热那亚举行的IEEE欧洲安全和隐私研讨会2020会议在同一地点举行。
papers.title_zh: 首届轻量级和增量式网络安全认证国际研讨会

papers.title: How to stop crashing more than twice: A Clean-Slate Governance Approach to IT Security
papers.authors: Tobias Fiebig
papers.abstract: "Moving fast, and breaking things", instead of "being safe and secure", is the credo of the IT industry. However, if we look at the wide societal impact of IT security incidents in the past years, it seems like it is no longer sustainable. Just like in the case of Equifax, people simply forget updates, just like in the case of Maersk, companies do not use sufficient network segmentation. Security certification does not seem to help with this issue. After all, Equifax was IS027001 compliant.In this paper, we take a look at how we handle and (do not) learn from security incidents in IT security. We do this by comparing IT security incidents to early and later aviation safety. We find interesting parallels to early aviation safety, and outline the governance levers that could make the world of IT more secure, which were already successful in making flying the most secure way of transportation.
papers.abstract_zh: “快速移动，打破东西”，而不是“安全可靠”，是IT行业的信条。然而，如果我们看看过去几年IT安全事件的广泛社会影响，它似乎不再是可持续的。就像在Equifax的情况下，人们只是忘记更新，就像在马士基的情况下，公司没有使用足够的网络分段。安全认证似乎对这个问题没有帮助。毕竟，Equifax符合IS027001标准。在本文中，我们看一下我们如何处理IT安全中的安全事件，以及如何(不)从这些事件中吸取教训。我们通过将IT安全事件与早期和后期的航空安全进行比较来做到这一点。我们发现了与早期航空安全的有趣相似之处，并概述了可以使IT世界更加安全的治理杠杆，这些杠杆已经成功地使飞行成为最安全的交通方式。
papers.title_zh: 如何避免崩溃超过两次:IT安全的全新治理方法

papers.title: From Lightweight Cybersecurity Assessment to SME Certification Scheme in Belgium
papers.authors: Christophe Ponsard, Philippe Massonet, Jeremy Grandclaudon, Nicolas Point
papers.abstract: Companies are increasingly exposed to cybersecurity threats. Among them, SMEs are especially vulnerable due to their lack of maturity and resilience. They are also increasingly targeted by cyberattacks. In order to help SMEs to secure their business against such threats, various programs are developing all over Europe. We report here about the evolution of a Belgian program first anchored in good practices and self-assessment to a lightweight certification scheme fitting the needs and capabilities of SMEs. We present how the various means interconnect to form a maturity raising scale. We also detail some supporting tools for the current assessment and the future certification scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 公司越来越多地面临网络安全威胁。其中，中小企业由于缺乏成熟度和应变能力，尤其脆弱。他们也越来越多地成为网络攻击的目标。为了帮助中小企业抵御这些威胁，欧洲各地都在开展各种项目。我们在此报告比利时的一个项目的发展，该项目最初以良好实践和自我评估为基础，后来发展成为适合中小企业需求和能力的轻量级认证计划。我们提出了各种手段如何相互联系，以形成成熟度提高规模。我们还详细介绍了当前评估和未来认证计划的一些支持工具。
papers.title_zh: 从轻量级网络安全评估到比利时中小企业认证计划

papers.title: Towards Incremental Safety and Security Requirements Co-Certification
papers.authors: Andrea Morgagni, Philippe Massonet, Sébastien Dupont, Jeremy Grandclaudon
papers.abstract: The continuous technological developments and the growing connectivity of applications and infrastructures is leading to the new threats to the technological world in particular to the possibility of considering certain threats in environments that were not previously touched by them. Now that many safety critical systems are becoming connected, they need to be protected from security threats. Safety and security engineering and certification evaluation are processes that have evolved independently. However now that security issues may impact safety they need to be analysed together, yet the processes must become more flexible to encourage certification when it is not mandatory. In this paper we sketch an approach for incremental certification of security requirements with Common Criteria in the general context of security/safety co-engineering and certification. The approach is illustrated with a case study.
papers.abstract_zh: 技术的不断发展以及应用程序和基础设施的日益连接性给技术世界带来了新的威胁，特别是有可能考虑到以前从未接触过的环境中的某些威胁。现在，许多安全关键系统正变得相互连接，需要保护它们免受安全威胁。安全和安保工程和认证评估是独立发展的过程。然而，现在安全问题可能会影响安全性，因此需要对它们一起进行分析，然而，在认证不是强制性的情况下，过程必须变得更加灵活，以鼓励认证。在本文中，我们概述了在安全/安全合作工程和认证的一般背景下，使用通用标准对安全要求进行增量认证的方法。通过一个案例说明了该方法。
papers.title_zh: 逐步提高安全和安保要求联合认证

papers.title: Cybersecurity Certification for Agile and Dynamic Software Systems - a Process-Based Approach
papers.authors: Volkmar Lotz
papers.abstract: In this extended abstract, we outline an approach for security certification of products or services for modern commercial systems that are characterized by agile development, the integration of development and operations, and high dynamics of system features and structures. The proposed scheme rather evaluates the processes applied in development and operations than investigates into the validity of the product properties itself. We argue that the resulting claims are still suitable to increase the confidence in the security of products and services resulting from such processes.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇扩展摘要中，我们概述了一种对现代商业系统的产品或服务进行安全认证的方法，这些系统的特点是敏捷开发、开发和运营的集成以及系统功能和结构的高度动态性。所提出的方案更倾向于评估开发和操作中应用的过程，而不是调查产品属性本身的有效性。我们认为，由此产生的主张仍然适合于增加对此类过程产生的产品和服务的安全性的信心。
papers.title_zh: 敏捷和动态软件系统的网络安全认证——基于过程的方法

papers.title: JCMathLib: Wrapper Cryptographic Library for Transparent and Certifiable JavaCard Applets
papers.authors: Vasilios Mavroudis, Petr Svenda
papers.abstract: The JavaCard multi-application platform is now deployed to over twenty billion smartcards, used in various applications ranging from banking payments and authentication tokens to SIM cards and electronic documents. In most of those use cases, access to various cryptographic primitives is required. The standard JavaCard API provides a basic level of access to such functionality (e.g., RSA encryption) but does not expose low-level cryptographic primitives (e.g., elliptic curve operations) and essential data types (e.g., Integers). Developers can access such features only through proprietary, manufacturer-specific APIs. Unfortunately, such APIs significantly reduce the interoperability and certification transparency of the software produced as they require non-disclosure agreements (NDA) that prohibit public sharing of the applet’s source code.We introduce JCMathLib, an open library that provides an intermediate layer realizing essential data types and low-level cryptographic primitives from high-level operations. To achieve this, we introduce a series of optimization techniques for resource-constrained platforms that make optimal use of the underlying hardware, while having a small memory footprint. To the best of our knowledge, it is the first generic library for low-level cryptographic operations in JavaCards that does not rely on a proprietary API.Without any disclosure limitations, JCMathLib has the potential to increase transparency by enabling open code sharing, release of research prototypes, and public code audits. Moreover, JCMathLib can help resolve the conflict between strict open-source licenses such as GPL and proprietary APIs available only under an NDA. This is of particular importance due to the introduction of JavaCard API v3.1, which targets specifically IoT devices, where open-source development might be more common than in the relatively closed world of government-issued electronic documents.
papers.abstract_zh: JavaCard多应用平台现已部署到超过200亿张智能卡上，用于各种应用，从银行支付和认证令牌到SIM卡和电子文档。在大多数用例中，需要访问各种密码原语。标准JavaCard API提供了对这种功能的基本级别的访问(例如RSA加密)，但是不公开低级密码原语(例如椭圆曲线运算)和基本数据类型(例如整数)。开发人员只能通过专有的、特定于制造商的API来访问这些功能。不幸的是，这种API大大降低了所生产软件的互操作性和认证透明度，因为它们需要禁止公共共享小程序源代码的保密协议(NDA)。我们介绍JCMathLib，这是一个开放的库，它提供了一个中间层来实现基本的数据类型和来自高级操作的低级加密原语。为了实现这一点，我们引入了一系列针对资源受限平台的优化技术，这些技术可以优化底层硬件的使用，同时占用少量内存。据我们所知，它是JavaCards中第一个不依赖于专有API的低级加密操作的通用库。没有任何公开限制，JCMathLib有可能通过开放代码共享、发布研究原型和公共代码审计来增加透明度。此外，JCMathLib可以帮助解决严格的开源许可(如GPL)和只有在NDA下才可用的专有API之间的冲突。由于JavaCard API v3.1的推出，这一点尤为重要，该版本专门针对物联网设备，开源开发可能比相对封闭的政府发布的电子文档更常见。
papers.title_zh: JCMathLib:用于透明和可认证的JavaCard小程序的包装加密库

papers.title: A Cross-Platform Evaluation of Privacy Notices and Tracking Practices
papers.authors: Maryam Mehrnezhad
papers.abstract: As online services diversify, protecting user privacy becomes more complicated since user tracking as well as presented privacy options vary across platforms. We conduct a cross-platform evaluation on three different platforms: PC browser, mobile browser, and mobile apps, which is the first study of its kind. We study the tracking behaviours, privacy notice presentation, user control options, and further privacy enhancing technologies. Our study considers the top 116 EU websites and their corresponding Android apps (available for 101 out of 116 services). The results show that the privacy consent banner is presented to the user in various and inconsistent ways across websites, browsers, and mobile apps, where the majority of these consent notices do not comply with the GDPR. In addition, most of these services start tracking the user right after the website is loaded and the app starts running, without waiting for the user to interact with the privacy consent. This behaviour can be considered not respectful to the user and is, indeed, not compliant with current regulations.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着在线服务的多样化，保护用户隐私变得更加复杂，因为用户跟踪以及呈现的隐私选项会因平台而异。我们在三个不同的平台上进行跨平台评估:PC浏览器、移动浏览器和移动应用程序，这是同类研究中的首次。我们研究跟踪行为、隐私声明呈现、用户控制选项和进一步的隐私增强技术。我们的研究考虑了排名前116位的欧盟网站及其相应的Android应用程序(116项服务中有101项可用)。结果显示，隐私同意横幅在网站、浏览器和移动应用程序中以各种不一致的方式呈现给用户，其中大多数同意通知不符合GDPR。此外，大多数这些服务在网站加载和应用程序开始运行后就开始跟踪用户，而无需等待用户与隐私同意书进行交互。这种行为可以被认为是对用户的不尊重，并且确实不符合当前的规定。
papers.title_zh: 隐私声明和跟踪实践的跨平台评估

papers.title: Data Sharing in Mobile Apps - User Privacy Expectations in Europe
papers.authors: Nils Quermann, Martin Degeling
papers.abstract: Although privacy on mobile apps has increased through tougher permission guidelines and new data protection legislation, developers still make profit of sharing data of and about their users with advertisers or other services. In light of the continuous debates on privacy and mobile apps we wanted to understand users’ expectations of privacy when it comes to different app types and data sharing practices. We conducted a survey on MTurk (N = 103) to learn more about privacy awareness and expectations. We found that 9 out of 10 users suspect that they are being tracked across different mobile applications and that they have a good understanding of what information is necessary for certain types of mobile applications. 65% of participants also expect that, on average, 2-6 different services receive their personal information and 93% think that at least a minority of mobile applications share their personal information without their consent.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管通过更严格的许可准则和新的数据保护立法，移动应用程序的隐私有所增加，但开发者仍然通过与广告商或其他服务共享用户的数据来获利。鉴于关于隐私和移动应用的持续辩论，我们希望了解用户在不同应用类型和数据共享实践中对隐私的期望。我们对MTurk (N = 103)进行了一项调查，以了解更多关于隐私意识和期望的信息。我们发现，10个用户中有9个怀疑他们在不同的移动应用程序中被跟踪，并且他们非常了解某些类型的移动应用程序需要哪些信息。65%的参与者还预计，平均有2-6个不同的服务接收他们的个人信息，93%的人认为至少有少数移动应用未经他们同意就共享他们的个人信息。
papers.title_zh: 移动应用中的数据共享——欧洲用户的隐私期望

papers.title: GDPR Reality Check - Claiming and Investigating Personally Identifiable Data from Companies
papers.authors: Fatemeh Alizadeh, Timo Jakobi, Alexander Boden, Gunnar Stevens, Jens Boldt
papers.abstract: Today, more personal data than ever before Is being collected and stored by companies of all types for a wide variety of purposes. The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) aims to strengthen the rights of consumers by providing them with tools for controlling data collection and processing. While companies are now subject to legal obligations, precedent cases are still missing. At the same time. It remains unclear how the right to access data can be concretely implemented in practical and technical terms. Our study intends to address this problem by investigating the case ofloyalty card providers—an established branch that collects the purchase data of users in exchange for discounts. For our study, we asked 13 households to request their personal data from their respective loyalty program providers. Based on interviews, we investigate the expectations of these users of the GDPR and the right to access data. Furthermore, we analyze the currently implemented process of claiming and receiving data as well as the sensemaking of said data by the users. Based on our analysis, we make the following contributions: We shed light on what users know about and expect from the GDPR, particularly concerning the right to access, we report user expectations regarding the process to claim access to data and the data archives provided, and finally, we also show why also companies could benefit from actively designing the data takeout to demonstrate their data collection practices.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，各种类型的公司出于各种目的收集和存储的个人数据比以往任何时候都多。《一般数据保护条例》( GDPR)旨在通过向消费者提供控制数据收集和处理的工具来加强消费者的权利。虽然公司现在受到法律义务的约束，但先例案例仍然缺失。同时。目前尚不清楚如何从实际和技术角度具体落实获取数据的权利。我们的研究旨在通过调查优惠卡提供商的案例来解决这个问题，优惠卡提供商是一个收集用户购买数据以换取折扣的成熟分支机构。在我们的研究中，我们要求13个家庭向他们各自的忠诚计划提供商索取他们的个人数据。基于访谈，我们调查了这些用户对GDPR的期望和访问数据的权利。此外，我们分析了当前实现的声明和接收数据的过程，以及用户对所述数据的感知。基于我们的分析，我们做出了以下贡献:我们揭示了用户对GDPR的了解和期望，特别是在访问权方面，我们报告了用户对申请访问数据和所提供的数据档案的过程的期望，最后，我们还表明了为什么公司也可以从积极设计数据获取以展示其数据收集做法中受益。
papers.title_zh: GDPR现实核查-从公司索取和调查个人身份数据

papers.title: Analysis of publicly available anti-phishing webpages: contradicting information, lack of concrete advice and very narrow attack vector
papers.authors: Mattia Mossano, Kami Vaniea, Lukas Aldag, Reyhan Düzgün, Peter Mayer, Melanie Volkamer
papers.abstract: Phishing is currently one of the biggest threats in cybersecurity for both the business and the private contexts. A large percentage of phishing attacks are blocked by automated technical solutions, but unfortunately there is often a delay between when phishing emails enter inboxes and when the technical solutions are able to detect and filter them out. To close this gap, it is common practice for companies to implement mandatory phishing awareness measures for their employees. But what about the private context? We aimed at answering that question by analysing 94 anti-phishing webpages from eight different countries and four organisation types. Our analysis revealed not only contradicting recommendations, but also that most of them are rather abstract (e.g. check the URL before clicking on the link without telling what to look for) and lack guidance on advanced phishing techniques (e.g. clone phishing). We discuss the problems faced by readers of these webpages and outline both immediate recommendations to the web designer and ways forward to improve the current situation as future work.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络钓鱼目前是商业和私人环境中网络安全的最大威胁之一。很大一部分网络钓鱼攻击被自动化技术解决方案阻止，但不幸的是，在网络钓鱼电子邮件进入收件箱和技术解决方案能够检测并过滤掉它们之间往往存在延迟。为了缩小这一差距，公司通常会对员工实施强制性的网络钓鱼防范措施。但是私有环境呢？我们旨在通过分析来自八个不同国家和四种组织类型的94个反网络钓鱼网页来回答这个问题。我们的分析不仅揭示了相互矛盾的建议，而且大多数建议都相当抽象(例如，在点击链接之前检查URL，而不告诉要查找什么)，并且缺乏对高级网络钓鱼技术(例如克隆网络钓鱼)的指导。我们讨论了这些网页的读者所面临的问题，并概述了对网页设计者的直接建议和作为未来工作的改进现状的方法。
papers.title_zh: 对可公开获得的反钓鱼网页的分析:相互矛盾的信息、缺乏具体的建议和非常狭窄的攻击媒介

papers.title: Investigating Teenagers' Ability to Detect Phishing Messages
papers.authors: James Nicholson, Yousra Javed, Matt Dixon, Lynne M. Coventry, Opeyemi Dele-Ajayi, Philip Anderson
papers.abstract: Young people are increasingly becoming responsible for the security of their devices, yet do not appear to receive formal instruction on how to protect themselves online. In this paper, we investigate the phish detection performance of teenagers while exploring how their familiarity with a service affects their overall performance in identifying phishing messages. Our study with 83 teenagers finds that teenagers were poor at distinguishing between genuine and phishing messages in an experimental task, yet performance was not affected by the familiarity of the service. However, our participants exhibited riskier behavior when making decisions on unfamiliar messages, suggesting that this is an area for further exploration. We discuss the implications of the poor phishing performance for teenagers and explore possible avenues to improve their awareness of these attacks, e.g. through embedding training content within the school curriculum.
papers.abstract_zh: 年轻人越来越多地对自己设备的安全负责，但似乎没有接受如何在网上保护自己的正式指导。在本文中，我们调查了青少年的网络钓鱼检测性能，同时探讨了他们对服务的熟悉程度如何影响他们识别网络钓鱼消息的整体性能。我们对83名青少年的研究发现，在一项实验任务中，青少年在区分真实信息和网络钓鱼信息方面表现不佳，但表现不受服务熟悉程度的影响。然而，我们的参与者在对不熟悉的信息做出决定时表现出更冒险的行为，这表明这是一个需要进一步探索的领域。我们讨论了网络钓鱼表现不佳对青少年的影响，并探索了提高他们对这些攻击的认识的可能途径，例如通过在学校课程中嵌入培训内容。
papers.title_zh: 调查青少年检测网络钓鱼邮件的能力

papers.title: Do Women in Conservative Societies (Not) Follow Smartphone Security Advice? A Case Study of Saudi Arabia and Pakistan
papers.authors: Elham Al Qahtani, Yousra Javed, Heather Lipford, Mohamed Shehab
papers.abstract: Women in conservative cultures, are an understudied population when it comes to investigating how users keep their devices and data safe. Owing to the recent trend in smartphone adoption and the simultaneous increase in attacks targeting women in conservative societies, this study uses the rational decision model to investigate the motivations of this user group for (not) following common smartphone security advice. We focus on four pieces of smartphone security advice, i.e., using screen lock, updating device software, deleting suspicious text messages, and using secure WIFI networks. Through interviews with 156 women from Saudi Arabia and Pakistan, we re-validate the rational decision model, identify key gaps in perception between those who follow common smartphone security advice and those who do not, help explain participants’ reasons behind their decisions and suggest recommendations for improving risk communication. Additionally, we describe similarities and differences between the studied population and the West in terms of sources for receiving smartphone security advice.
papers.abstract_zh: 在调查用户如何保护其设备和数据安全时，保守文化中的女性是一个研究不足的群体。由于最近智能手机采用的趋势以及保守社会中针对女性的攻击的同时增加，本研究使用理性决策模型来调查该用户群(不)遵循常见智能手机安全建议的动机。我们重点关注四条智能手机安全建议，即使用锁屏、更新设备软件、删除可疑短信、使用安全WIFI网络。通过对来自沙特阿拉伯和巴基斯坦的156名女性的采访，我们重新验证了理性决策模型，确定了那些遵循常见智能手机安全建议的人和那些不遵循的人之间的关键认知差距，帮助解释参与者做出决定的原因，并提出了改善风险沟通的建议。此外，我们还描述了被研究人群和西方人在接受智能手机安全建议的来源方面的异同。
papers.title_zh: 保守社会的女性(不)会遵循智能手机安全建议吗？沙特阿拉伯和巴基斯坦的案例研究

papers.title: Vision: I don't want to use my Phone! A Cognitive Walkthrough for YubiKeys
papers.authors: Claudia Bischoff, Eva Gerlitz, Matthew Smith
papers.abstract: Security keys can be used as a second factor when users aim at securing their online accounts or devices in addition to passwords. In this vision paper, we made the first step to identify common issues when registering a YubiKey as second factor on Google, Facebook, Windows 10 and Ubuntu 18.04.4 accounts by a cognitive walkthrough. We found the websites to be too phone-centered and the instructions for operating systems too complex and incomplete at the same time. We therefore plan to analyze further websites to identify the most usable implementation for each step of the registration process, in order to combine those into an improved overall solution.
papers.abstract_zh: 除了密码之外，当用户旨在保护其在线帐户或设备时，安全密钥可以用作第二个因素。在这篇愿景论文中，我们首先通过认知演练来确定在谷歌、脸书、Windows 10和Ubuntu 18.04.4账户上将YubiKey注册为第二要素时的常见问题。我们发现网站过于以电话为中心，同时操作系统的说明过于复杂和不完整。因此，我们计划进一步分析网站，为注册流程的每一步确定最有用的实现方式，以便将这些整合到一个改进的整体解决方案中。
papers.title_zh: 视觉:我不想用手机！YubiKeys认知漫游

papers.title: Vision: Investigating Web API Developer Experience in Relation to Terms of Service and Privacy Policies
papers.authors: Aidah Ichario, Manuel Maarek
papers.abstract: Rapid advancement in Web technologies has seen a shift from the use and implementation of closed applications to open information sharing in the form of Web APIs (Application Programming Interface). Developers make use of Web APIs by integrating them into their Web and mobile applications. These APIs however, come with Terms of Service (ToS) and Privacy Policies drawn up by the API providers that the developers must abide by. This research seeks to identify issues developers face with Web API ToS with regard to privacy. We propose to ground our understanding of ToS and privacy policy issues and their subsequent implications on Developer Experience from content analysis of developer discourse with card sorting. We report on a small scale pilot experiment.
papers.abstract_zh: Web技术的快速发展已经见证了从封闭应用程序的使用和实现到Web APIs(应用程序编程接口)形式的开放信息共享的转变。开发人员通过将Web APIs集成到他们的Web和移动应用程序中来利用它们。然而，这些API附带了服务条款(ToS)和由API提供者起草的隐私政策，开发者必须遵守这些条款。这项研究旨在确定开发者在使用Web API ToS时面临的隐私问题。我们建议将我们对ToS和隐私政策问题及其对开发者体验的后续影响的理解建立在通过卡片分类对开发者对话进行内容分析的基础上。我们报道了一个小规模的试点实验。
papers.title_zh: 愿景:调查Web API开发人员在服务条款和隐私政策方面的体验

papers.title: Vision: Shred If Insecure - Persuasive Message Design as a Lesson and Alternative to Previous Approaches to Usable Secure Email Interfaces
papers.authors: Jan Tolsdorf, Luigi Lo Iacono
papers.abstract: Despite the advances in research on usable secure email, the majority of mail user agents found in practice still violates best practices in UI design and uses ineffective and inhomogeneous design strategies to communicate and let users control the security status of an email message.We propose a novel interaction and design concept that we refer to as persuasive message design. Our approach is derived from heuristics and a systematic meta-study of existing HCI literature on email management, usable secure email and phishing research. Concluding on this body of knowledge we propose the design of interfaces that suppress weak cues and instead manipulate the display of emails according to their technical security level. Persuasive message design addresses several shortcomings of current secure email user interfaces and provides a consistent user experience that can be deployed even by email providers.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管在可用的安全电子邮件的研究方面取得了进展，但是在实践中发现的大多数邮件用户代理仍然违反了UI设计中的最佳实践，并且使用无效的和不均匀的设计策略来进行通信并让用户控制电子邮件消息的安全状态。我们提出了一个新颖的交互和设计概念，我们称之为有说服力的信息设计。我们的方法源自启发式和对现有HCI文献的系统元研究，这些文献涉及电子邮件管理、可用的安全电子邮件和网络钓鱼研究。总结这些知识，我们提出了抑制弱线索的界面设计，并根据电子邮件的技术安全级别来操纵电子邮件的显示。说服性消息设计解决了当前安全电子邮件用户界面的几个缺点，并提供了一致的用户体验，甚至可以由电子邮件提供商部署。
papers.title_zh: 愿景:如果不安全就销毁——劝导式邮件设计作为一个教训，替代以前使用安全电子邮件界面的方法

papers.title: Vision: What If They All Die? Crypto Requirements For Key People
papers.authors: Chan Nam Ngo, Daniele Friolo, Fabio Massacci, Daniele Venturi, Ettore Battaiola
papers.abstract: The question above seems absurd but it is what a Bank has to ask to its suppliers to meet the European Central Bank (ECB) regulations on the continuity of critical business functions. The bank has no intention of mingling in the daily work of the supplier (that’s the whole purpose of outsourcing). Nor the supplier has any intention to make available to the bank the keys of its kingdom (it is actually forbidden to do so by the very same regulations). We need a way to do so only when the hearts of the key people stop beating. In this paper, we discuss whether recent advances in cryptography (secret sharing and MPC, time-lock puzzles, etc.) can replace the classical approach based on human redundancy.
papers.abstract_zh: 上面的问题看起来很荒谬，但这是一家银行必须向其供应商提出的要求，以满足欧洲央行(ECB)关于关键业务职能连续性的规定。银行无意介入供应商的日常工作(这是外包的全部目的)。供应商也无意向银行提供其王国的钥匙(同样的法规实际上禁止这样做)。只有当关键人物的心脏停止跳动时，我们才需要一种方法来做到这一点。在这篇论文中，我们讨论了密码学的最新进展(秘密共享和MPC，时间锁难题等。)可以取代基于人类冗余的经典方法。
papers.title_zh: 愿景:如果他们都死了呢？关键人员的加密要求

papers.title: Vision: Why Johnny Can't Configure Smart Home? A Behavioural Framework for Smart Home Privacy Configuration
papers.authors: Joseph Shams, Nalin A. G. Arachchilage, Jose M. Such
papers.abstract: Despite the advancements in smart technologies, the lack of user awareness of the capabilities of IoT smart home devices can expose them to privacy breaches. For example, a user may be unaware that their smart home devices are recording and storing their conversations (e.g. personal, perhaps sensitive or confidential communications). It could be argued that this is due to the lack of users’ threat perceptions and the challenges of altering existing (smart home) configuration behaviours. Therefore, we propose a behavioural framework to enhance users’ smart home configuration behaviours through their motivation. To develop the framework, we derived and extended the elements from the Technology Threat Avoidance Theory (TTAT) and Fogg’s Behavioural Motivation (FBM) model. The elements of the proposed framework were incorporated into an application scenario, i.e. a game design. The designed gaming application aims to educate users about smart home device capabilities and enhance their configuration behaviour through motivation. More research is required to evaluate the proposed framework and its gaming application scenario through empirical investigations.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管智能技术取得了进步，但用户对物联网智能家居设备功能的缺乏认识可能会使他们面临隐私泄露的风险。例如，用户可能不知道他们的智能家居设备正在记录和存储他们的对话(例如，个人的、可能敏感或机密的通信)。可以说，这是由于缺乏用户的威胁感知和改变现有(智能家居)配置行为的挑战。因此，我们提出了一个行为框架，通过用户的动机来增强用户的智能家居配置行为。为了开发这个框架，我们从技术威胁回避理论(TTAT)和福格的行为动机(FBM)模型中衍生和扩展了元素。所提出的框架的元素被合并到一个应用场景中，即游戏设计中。设计的游戏应用程序旨在教育用户智能家居设备的功能，并通过激励增强他们的配置行为。需要更多的研究通过实证调查来评估所提出的框架及其游戏应用场景。
papers.title_zh: 愿景:为什么Johnny配置不了智能家居？智能家居隐私配置的行为框架

papers.title: Simulating the Effects of Social Presence on Trust, Privacy Concerns & Usage Intentions in Automated Bots for Finance
papers.authors: Magdalene Ng, Kovila P. L. Coopamootoo, Ehsan Toreini, Mhairi Aitken, Karen Elliott, Aad van Moorsel
papers.abstract: FinBots are chatbots built on automated decision technology, aimed to facilitate accessible banking and to support customers in making financial decisions. Chatbots are increasing in prevalence, sometimes even equipped to mimic human social rules, expectations and norms, decreasing the necessity for human-to-human interaction. As banks and financial advisory platforms move towards creating bots that enhance the current state of consumer trust and adoption rates, we investigated the effects of chatbot vignettes with and without socio-emotional features on intention to use the chatbot for financial support purposes. We conducted a between-subject online experiment with N = 410 participants. Participants in the control group were provided with a vignette describing a secure and reliable chatbot called XRO23, whereas participants in the experimental group were presented with a vignette describing a secure and reliable chatbot that is more human-like and named Emma. We found that Vignette Emma did not increase participants’ trust levels nor lowered their privacy concerns even though it increased perception of social presence. However, we found that intention to use the presented chatbot for financial support was positively influenced by perceived humanness and trust in the bot. Participants were also more willing to share financially-sensitive information such as account number, sort code and payments information to XRO23 compared to Emma - revealing a preference for a technical and mechanical FinBot in information sharing. Overall, this research contributes to our understanding of the intention to use chatbots with different features as financial technology, in particular that socio-emotional support may not be favoured when designed independently of financial function.
papers.abstract_zh: 金融机器人是建立在自动决策技术基础上的聊天机器人，旨在促进无障碍银行服务，并支持客户做出金融决策。聊天机器人越来越流行，有时甚至模仿人类的社会规则、期望和规范，降低了人与人之间互动的必要性。随着银行和金融咨询平台转向创建能够增强消费者信任和采用率的机器人，我们调查了带有和不带有社会情感特征的聊天机器人短片对使用聊天机器人进行金融支持的意图的影响。我们对410名参与者进行了受试者之间的在线实验。控制组的参与者被提供了一个描述安全可靠的聊天机器人XRO23的短片，而实验组的参与者被提供了一个描述安全可靠的聊天机器人的短片，这个聊天机器人更像人类，名叫Emma。我们发现，即使《爱玛》增加了对社交存在的感知，但它并没有增加参与者的信任度，也没有降低他们对隐私的担忧。然而，我们发现，使用所展示的聊天机器人获得财务支持的意愿受到感知的人性化和对机器人的信任的积极影响。与Emma相比，参与者也更愿意与XRO23分享金融敏感信息，如账号、分类代码和支付信息，这表明了他们在信息共享方面对技术和机械FinBot的偏好。总的来说，这项研究有助于我们理解使用具有不同功能的聊天机器人作为金融技术的意图，特别是当设计独立于金融功能时，社会情感支持可能不会受到青睐。
papers.title_zh: 模拟金融自动化机器人中社交存在对信任、隐私问题和使用意图的影响

papers.title: Cash, Cards or Cryptocurrencies? A Study of Payment Culture in Four Countries
papers.authors: Karoline Busse, Mohammad Tahaei, Katharina Krombholz, Emanuel von Zezschwitz, Matthew Smith, Jing Tian, Wenyuan Xu
papers.abstract: Payment cultures around the globe are diverse and have significant implications on security, privacy and trust. We study usable security aspects of payment cultures in four culturally distinct societies. Based on a qualitative study in Germany and Iran, we developed an online survey and deployed it in Germany, Iran, China, and the United States. The results reveal significant differences between the studied countries. For example, we found that participants from Iran and China are more comfortable with credential sharing and German participants were most accepting towards cryptocurrencies. We suggest these kinds of differences in payment culture need to be considered in the context of HCI research when evaluating current payment mechanisms or designing new ones.
papers.abstract_zh: 全球的支付文化多种多样，对安全性、隐私和信任有着重大影响。我们研究了四个文化不同的社会中支付文化的可用安全方面。基于在德国和伊朗的定性研究，我们开发了一个在线调查，并在德国、伊朗、中国和美国进行了部署。结果显示了被研究国家之间的显著差异。例如，我们发现来自伊朗和中国的参与者对凭证共享更为满意，而德国参与者对加密货币的接受度最高。我们建议，在评估当前的支付机制或设计新的支付机制时，需要在HCI研究的背景下考虑支付文化中的这些差异。
papers.title_zh: 现金、卡还是加密货币？四国支付文化研究

papers.title: Improving Non-Experts' Understanding of End-to-End Encryption: An Exploratory Study
papers.authors: Wei Bai, Michael Pearson, Patrick Gage Kelley, Michelle L. Mazurek
papers.abstract: End-to-end encryption (E2EE) can effectively protect the privacy of online communication and has been adopted by several popular messaging apps. However, prior research indicates that many users have difficulty using E2EE tools correctly and confidently, as well as recognizing their security benefits, in part because of incorrect mental models. This paper takes a first step toward providing high-level, roughly correct information about end-to-end encryption to non-experts. In a lab study, participants (n=25) were asked about their understanding of E2EE before and after a tutorial we created, as well as which information they found most useful and surprising. Overall, participants’ understanding of the benefits and limitations of E2EE improved. They found information about confidentiality, risks and weaknesses most useful, surprising, and compelling to pass on to others. Some confusion about integrity and authenticity remained. The results provide insight into how to structure new educational materials for E2EE.
papers.abstract_zh: 端到端加密(E2EE)可以有效地保护在线通信的隐私，已经被几个流行的消息应用程序采用。然而，先前的研究表明，许多用户难以正确和自信地使用E2EE工具，以及认识到它们的安全优势，部分原因是不正确的心理模型。本文向向非专家提供有关端到端加密的高级、大致正确的信息迈出了第一步。在一项实验室研究中，参与者(n=25)被问及他们在我们创建的教程之前和之后对E2EE的理解，以及他们认为最有用和最令人惊讶的信息。总体而言，参与者对E2EE的优势和局限性的理解有所提高。他们发现，关于保密性、风险和弱点的信息最有用、最令人惊讶，并且最有说服力地传递给其他人。一些关于完整性和真实性的困惑仍然存在。这些结果为如何为E2EE构建新的教育材料提供了见解。
papers.title_zh: 提高非专家对端到端加密的理解:一项探索性研究

papers.title: Making Encryption Feel Secure: Investigating how Descriptions of Encryption Impact Perceived Security
papers.authors: Verena Distler, Carine Lallemand, Vincent Koenig
papers.abstract: When communication about security to end users is ineffective, people frequently misinterpret the protection offered by a system. The discrepancy between the security users perceive a system to have and the actual system state can lead to potentially risky behaviors. It is thus crucial to understand how security perceptions are shaped by interface elements such as text-based descriptions of encryption. This article addresses the question of how encryption should be described to non-experts in a way that enhances perceived security. We tested the following within-subject variables in an online experiment (N=309): a) how to best word encryption, b) whether encryption should be described with a focus on the process or outcome, or both c) whether the objective of encryption should be mentioned d) when mentioning the objective of encryption, how to best describe it e) whether a hash should be displayed to the user. We also investigated the role of context (between subjects). The verbs "encrypt" and "secure" performed comparatively well at enhancing perceived security. Overall, participants stated that they felt more secure not knowing about the objective of encryption. When it is necessary to state the objective, positive wording of the objective of encryption worked best. We discuss implications and why using these results to design for perceived lack of security might be of interest as well. This leads us to discuss ethical concerns, and we give guidelines for the design of user interfaces where encryption should be communicated to end users.
papers.abstract_zh: 当与最终用户的安全沟通无效时，人们经常会误解系统提供的保护。用户认为系统具有的安全性和实际系统状态之间的差异会导致潜在的危险行为。因此，理解界面元素(如基于文本的加密描述)是如何塑造安全概念的至关重要。本文讨论了如何以一种增强安全性的方式向非专家描述加密的问题。我们在一个在线实验(N=309)中测试了以下受试者内变量:a)如何最好地进行字加密，b)是否应该重点描述加密的过程或结果，或者两者都描述c)是否应该提及加密的目标d)当提及加密的目标时，如何最好地描述它e)是否应该向用户显示散列。我们还调查了背景(受试者之间)的作用。动词“加密”和“安全”在增强感知的安全性方面表现相对较好。总体而言，参与者表示，不知道加密的目的，他们会感到更安全。当需要陈述目标时，加密目标的正面措辞效果最好。我们讨论了影响，以及为什么使用这些结果来设计感知缺乏安全可能也是感兴趣的。这导致我们讨论伦理问题，我们给出了用户界面设计的指导方针，加密应该传达给最终用户。
papers.title_zh: 让加密变得安全:调查加密描述如何影响感知的安全性

papers.title: End User and Expert Perceptions of Threats and Potential Countermeasures
papers.authors: Simon Anell, Lea Gröber, Katharina Krombholz
papers.abstract: Experts often design security and privacy technology with specific use cases and threat models in mind. In practice however, end users are not aware of these threats and potential countermeasures. Furthermore, mis-conceptions about the benefits and limitations of security and privacy technology inhibit large-scale adoption by end users. In this paper, we address this challenge and contribute a qualitative study on end users’ and security experts’ perceptions of threat models and potential countermeasures. We follow an inductive research approach to explore perceptions and mental models of both security experts and end users. We conducted semi-structured interviews with 8 security experts and 13 end users. Our results suggest that in contrast to security experts, end users neglect acquaintances and friends as attackers in their threat models. Our findings highlight that experts value technical countermeasures whereas end users try to implement trust-based defensive methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 专家通常在设计安全和隐私技术时会考虑特定的使用案例和威胁模型。然而实际上，最终用户并不知道这些威胁和潜在的对策。此外，对安全和隐私技术的好处和局限性的错误认识阻碍了最终用户的大规模采用。在本文中，我们将解决这一挑战，并对最终用户和安全专家对威胁模型和潜在对策的看法进行定性研究。我们采用归纳研究方法来探索安全专家和最终用户的认知和心理模型。我们对8名安全专家和13名最终用户进行了半结构化采访。我们的结果表明，与安全专家相反，最终用户在他们的威胁模型中忽略了作为攻击者的熟人和朋友。我们的发现强调了专家重视技术对策，而终端用户试图实施基于信任的防御方法。
papers.title_zh: 最终用户和专家对威胁和潜在对策的看法

papers.title: "Security should be there by default": Investigating how journalists perceive and respond to risks from the Internet of Things
papers.authors: Anjuli R. K. Shere, Jason R. C. Nurse, Ivan Flechais
papers.abstract: Journalists have long been the targets of both physical and cyber-attacks from well-resourced adversaries. Internet of Things (IoT) devices are arguably a new avenue of threat towards journalists through both targeted and generalised cyber-physical exploitation. This study comprises three parts: First, we interviewed 11 journalists and surveyed 5 further journalists, to determine the extent to which journalists perceive threats through the IoT, particularly via consumer IoT devices. Second, we surveyed 34 cyber security experts to establish if and how lay-people can combat IoT threats. Third, we compared these findings to assess journalists’ knowledge of threats, and whether their protective mechanisms would be effective against experts’ depictions and predictions of IoT threats. Our results indicate that journalists generally are unaware of IoT-related risks and are not adequately protecting themselves; this considers cases where they possess IoT devices, or where they enter IoT-enabled environments (e.g., at work or home). Expert recommendations spanned both immediate and longterm mitigation methods, including practical actions that are technical and socio-political in nature. However, all proposed individual mitigation methods are likely to be short-term solutions, with 26 of 34 (76.5%) of cyber security experts responding that within the next five years it will not be possible for the public to opt-out of interaction with the IoT.
papers.abstract_zh: 长期以来，记者一直是资源充足的对手的物理和网络攻击的目标。可以说，物联网设备通过有针对性的和普遍的网络物理利用，成为威胁记者的新渠道。这项研究包括三个部分:首先，我们采访了11名记者，并调查了另外5名记者，以确定记者对物联网威胁的感知程度，特别是通过消费物联网设备。其次，我们调查了34位网络安全专家，以确定外行人是否以及如何应对物联网威胁。第三，我们比较了这些发现，以评估记者对威胁的了解，以及他们的保护机制是否能有效应对专家对物联网威胁的描述和预测。我们的结果表明，记者普遍不了解物联网相关的风险，也没有充分保护自己；这考虑了他们拥有物联网设备的情况，或者他们进入物联网环境的情况(例如，在工作或家中)。专家建议涵盖了短期和长期缓解方法，包括技术和社会政治性质的实际行动。然而，所有提议的单个缓解方法都可能是短期解决方案，34名网络安全专家中有26名(76.5%)回应说，在未来五年内，公众不可能选择退出与物联网的交互。
papers.title_zh: “安全应该默认存在”:调查记者如何感知和应对物联网风险

papers.title: Tech Pains: Characterizations of Lived Cybersecurity Experiences
papers.authors: Huixin Tian, Chris Kanich, Jason Polakis, Sameer Patil
papers.abstract: The permeation of technology into every facet of life has profoundly shifted the nature and ramifications of cybersecurity incidents. As a consequence, a complete and refined characterization of these adverse events necessitates a sociotechnical approach that takes into account the subjective lived experiences of the victims. Although researchers have examined such experiences pertaining to specific types of incidents, a broad understanding of the harmful impact of cybersecurity incidents requires an investigation of how people characterize and cope with these adverse experiences in general. To that end, we conducted semi-structured interviews with 21 individuals who reported a variety of cybersecurity incidents, consequences, and coping mechanisms. We found that the experiences can be characterized along a bounded to fuzzy spectrum. As the majority of current cybersecurity efforts focus on relatively bounded incidents, we make the case that fuzzy incidents deserve similar attention because their harmful impacts are deeper and longer-lasting. Our insight can be applied to improve and personalize the delivery of cybersecurity interventions.
papers.abstract_zh: 技术渗透到生活的方方面面，深刻地改变了网络安全事件的性质和后果。因此，要对这些不良事件进行完整而精确的描述，就必须采用一种考虑到受害者主观生活经历的社会技术方法。虽然研究人员研究了与特定类型事件相关的此类经历，但要广泛了解网络安全事件的有害影响，需要调查人们如何描述和应对这些负面经历。为此，我们对21名报告了各种网络安全事件、后果和应对机制的个人进行了半结构化采访。我们发现体验可以沿着一个有界到模糊的谱来表征。由于当前大多数网络安全工作都集中在相对有限的事件上，我们认为模糊事件值得类似的关注，因为它们的有害影响更深、更持久。我们的洞察力可用于改进和个性化网络安全干预的交付。
papers.title_zh: 技术之痛:真实网络安全体验的特征

papers.title: HotSpot: Hot Issues in Security Principles and Trust 2020
papers.authors: Joshua D. Guttman, Sebastian Mödersheim
papers.abstract: The principles of security and trust remain an area of intense and creative work. This work is focused primarily on defining security and trust goals, developing methods to verify that systems meet those goals, and to synthesize systems that meet those goals by construction.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全和信任的原则仍然是一个紧张和创造性工作的领域。这项工作主要集中在定义安全和信任目标，开发验证系统满足这些目标的方法，以及通过构造合成满足这些目标的系统。
papers.title_zh: 热点:安全原则和信任2020中的热点问题

papers.title: QQIF: Quantum Quantitative Information Flow (invited paper)
papers.authors: Arthur Américo, Pasquale Malacaria
papers.abstract: The field of Quantitative Information Flow (QIF) is concerned with quantifying information leakage in systems. This work generalises the QIF framework to the quantum setting, having as foundations the recently developed g-leakage framework. Next, some recent results of the field of quantum statistical decision are presented and translated in terms of the "quantum" g-leakage framework, including a recently developed quantum generalisation of the Coriasceous Theorem, an important result for QIF.
papers.abstract_zh: 定量信息流(QIF)领域关注的是量化系统中的信息泄漏。这项工作将QIF框架推广到量子环境，以最近开发的g泄漏框架为基础。接下来，量子统计决策领域的一些最近的结果被提出并且在“量子”g-泄漏框架方面被翻译，包括最近发展的Coriasceous定理的量子一般化，QIF的一个重要结果。
papers.title_zh: QQIF:量子量化信息流(特邀论文)

papers.title: Security across abstraction layers: old and new examples
papers.authors: Frank Piessens
papers.abstract: A common technique for building ICT systems is to build them as successive layers of bstraction: for instance, the Instruction Set Architecture (ISA) is an abstraction of the hardware, and compilers or interpreters build higher level abstractions on top of the ISA.The functionality of an ICT application can often be understood by considering only a single level of abstraction. For instance the source code of the application defines the functionality using the level of abstraction of the source programming language. Functionality can be well understood by just studying this source code.Many important security issues in ICT system however are cross-layer issues: they can not be understood by considering the system at a single level of abstraction, but they require understanding how multiple levels of abstraction are implemented. Attacks may rely on, or exploit, implementation details of one or more layers below the source code level of abstraction.The purpose of this paper is to illustrate this cross-layer nature of security by discussing old and new examples of cross-layer security issues, and by providing a classification of these issues.
papers.abstract_zh: 构建ICT系统的常用技术是将它们构建为连续的抽象层:例如，指令集架构(ISA)是硬件的抽象，编译器或解释器在ISA之上构建更高级别的抽象。一个ICT应用程序的功能通常可以通过仅考虑一个抽象层次来理解。例如，应用程序的源代码使用源编程语言的抽象级别来定义功能。只需研究这些源代码就可以很好地理解功能。然而，ICT系统中的许多重要安全问题是跨层问题:它们不能通过在单一抽象层次上考虑系统来理解，但是它们需要理解多个抽象层次是如何实现的。攻击可能依赖或利用源代码抽象级别以下的一层或多层的实现细节。本文的目的是通过讨论跨层安全问题的新旧示例，并对这些问题进行分类，来说明安全的跨层本质。
papers.title_zh: 跨抽象层的安全性:旧的和新的例子

papers.title: A Game Of Drones: Extending the Dolev-Yao Attacker Model With Movement
papers.authors: Andrew Cook, Luca Viganò
papers.abstract: We introduce the idea of modelling security protocols and attacks on protocols in a mobile setting, where agents need to move in order to send and receive messages. More specifically, we consider an environment involving drones capable of long-distance flight and "base stations" with which they can communicate. To specify and reason about such an environment, we formalise a pi-calculus and an attacker model that extends the Dolev-Yao model with capabilities for movement and "environmental knowledge" of the position of the other agents. As a simple but illustrative case study, we show how, under certain geographical conditions, the man-in-the-middle attack on the NSPK protocol would require multiple movements to complete successfully. We also define a simple normalisation procedure that allows the attacker to avoid carrying out redundant movements. This procedure also sets the basis for future, more refined normalisations and for investigations into how movements of the attacker and of the honest agents could be optimised.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们介绍了在移动环境中对安全协议和协议攻击建模的思想，在移动环境中，代理需要移动以发送和接收消息。更具体地说，我们考虑一个涉及能够长距离飞行的无人机和它们可以与之通信的“基站”的环境。为了对这样的环境进行详细说明和推理，我们形成了一个π演算和一个攻击者模型，该模型扩展了Dolev-Yao模型，具有其他代理的位置的移动能力和“环境知识”。作为一个简单但说明性的案例研究，我们展示了在某些地理条件下，中间人对NSPK协议的攻击需要多次移动才能成功完成。我们还定义了一个简单的标准化过程，允许攻击者避免执行多余的动作。这一程序也为未来更精确的标准化和调查攻击者和诚实特工的行动如何优化奠定了基础。
papers.title_zh: 无人机的游戏:用移动扩展多列夫-姚攻击模型

papers.title: Explainable Security
papers.authors: Luca Viganò, Daniele Magazzeni
papers.abstract: With the rise in popularity of smart objects and online services, the use of Trigger-Action Platforms for the definition of custom behaviors is growing significantly. These platforms enable end-users to create Event-Condition-Action (ECA) rules for triggering actions upon event occurrences on physical devices or online services in different domains. ECA rules could easily expose end-users to security risks mainly due to their low level of knowledge and awareness. To alleviate this problem, classification models can be used for identifying possible security issues that ECA rules could inflict when triggered. However, the results produced by these classifiers may not be understood by end-users. This position paper provides first insights concerning the application of AI models for generating natural language explanations according to the identified risks of ECA rules.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着智能对象和在线服务的普及，使用触发动作平台来定义自定义行为的情况正在显著增加。这些平台使最终用户能够创建事件-条件-动作(ECA)规则，以便在不同域中的物理设备或在线服务上发生事件时触发动作。ECA规则很容易使最终用户面临安全风险，这主要是因为他们的知识和意识水平较低。为了缓解这个问题，可以使用分类模型来识别ECA规则在被触发时可能造成的可能的安全问题。然而，最终用户可能不理解这些分类器产生的结果。这份立场文件提供了关于应用人工智能模型根据ECA规则的风险生成自然语言解释的第一手见解。
papers.title_zh: 可解释的安全性

papers.title: Preface on the International Workshop on Privacy Engineering 2020 (IWPE'20)
papers.authors: José M. del Álamo, Jose M. Such, Isabel Wagner, Kopo Marvin Ramokapane
papers.abstract: The International Workshop on Privacy Engineering 2020 (IWPE’20 - https://iwpe.info ) has organized its 6th edition, co-located with the 5th IEEE European Symposium on Security and Privacy (EuroS&P).
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私工程2020国际研讨会(IWPE'20 - https://iwpe.info)已经组织了第六届会议，与第五届IEEE欧洲安全和隐私研讨会(EuroS&P)在同一地点举行。
papers.title_zh: 2020年隐私工程国际研讨会前言

papers.title: LINDDUN GO: A Lightweight Approach to Privacy Threat Modeling
papers.authors: Kim Wuyts, Laurens Sion, Wouter Joosen
papers.abstract: Realizing privacy-preserving software requires the application of principles such as Privacy by Design (PbD) which require the consideration of privacy early on in the software development lifecycle. While privacy threat modeling approaches, such as LINDDUN, provide such a systematic and extensive assessment of a system’s design, their application requires the analyst performing the assessment to have (i) extensive privacy expertise and (ii) sufficient experience with the threat modeling process itself. Hence, there is a high startup cost to apply these techniques. To reduce this initial threshold, more lightweight privacy analysis approaches are necessary.In this paper, we (i) discuss the requirements for early lightweight privacy analysis approaches; (ii) present LIND-DUN GO, a toolkit that supports lightweight privacy threat modeling; (iii) describe the pilot studies that were conducted for the preliminary evaluation with industry professionals.The availability of lightweight privacy analysis approaches reduces the initial effort to start privacy threat modeling and can therefore enable a more wide-spread adoption of system privacy assessments in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 实现隐私保护软件需要应用诸如设计隐私(PbD)之类的原则，这些原则要求在软件开发生命周期的早期考虑隐私。虽然隐私威胁建模方法(如LINDDUN)提供了对系统设计的这种系统和广泛的评估，但它们的应用要求执行评估的分析师具有(I)广泛的隐私专业知识和(ii)对威胁建模过程本身的足够经验。因此，应用这些技术的启动成本很高。为了降低这个初始阈值，更轻量级的隐私分析方法是必要的。在本文中，我们(I)讨论了早期轻量级隐私分析方法的要求；㈡介绍LIND-DUN GO，这是一个支持轻量级隐私威胁建模的工具包；(iii)描述为与行业专业人员进行初步评估而进行的试点研究。轻量级隐私分析方法的可用性减少了开始隐私威胁建模的初始工作，因此能够在实践中更广泛地采用系统隐私评估。
papers.title_zh: LINDDUN GO:一种轻量级隐私威胁建模方法

papers.title: Shedding light on web privacy impact assessment: A case study of the Ambient Light Sensor API
papers.authors: Lukasz Olejnik
papers.abstract: As modern web browsers gain new and increasingly powerful features the importance of impact assessments of the new functionality becomes crucial.A web privacy impact assessment of a planned web browser feature, the Ambient Light Sensor API, indicated risks arising from the exposure of overly precise information about the lighting conditions in the user environment. The analysis led to the demonstration of direct risks of leaks of user data, such as the list of visited websites or exfiltration of sensitive content across distinct browser contexts.Our work contributed to the creation of web standards leading to decisions by browser vendors (i.e. obsolescence, non-implementation or modification to the operation of browser features). We highlight the need to consider broad risks when making reviews of new features. We offer practically-driven high-level observations lying on the intersection of web security and privacy risk engineering and modeling, and standardization. We structure our work as a case study from activities spanning over three years.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着现代网络浏览器获得新的和日益强大的功能，新功能的影响评估变得至关重要。对计划中的网络浏览器功能----环境光传感器API ----的网络隐私影响评估表明，暴露关于用户环境中照明条件的过于精确的信息会带来风险。该分析展示了用户数据泄露的直接风险，如访问过的网站列表或跨不同浏览器环境的敏感内容泄露。我们的工作有助于创建web标准，促使浏览器供应商做出决策(即过时、不实施或修改浏览器功能的操作)。我们强调在审查新功能时需要考虑广泛的风险。我们提供实际驱动的高级观察，位于web安全和隐私风险工程和建模以及标准化的交叉点上。我们将我们的工作作为一个案例研究，涵盖了三年多的活动。
papers.title_zh: 揭示网络隐私影响评估:环境光线传感器API案例研究

papers.title: The Never-Ending Story: On the Need for Continuous Privacy Impact Assessment
papers.authors: Laurens Sion, Dimitri Van Landuyt, Wouter Joosen
papers.abstract: The importance of privacy by design has increased with initiatives such as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). While static, design-level assessment of privacy aspects provides considerable benefits in the creation of privacy-preserving software-intensive systems, operational aspects that are difficult to predict at design-time also play a key role. This is particularly true in the instance of privacy impact or privacy risk: while existing approaches succeed fairly well in assessing the overall risk from a static design context, they are not well suited to capture risk elements that are dynamic and often impossible to foresee.In this position paper, we highlight this problem at the basis of a number of realistic motivational scenarios and outline our vision towards continuous privacy impact assessment and risk management.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着《一般数据保护条例》( GDPR)等倡议的提出，隐私设计的重要性有所增加。虽然对隐私方面的静态设计级评估在创建保护隐私的软件密集型系统方面提供了相当大的好处，但在设计时难以预测的操作方面也起着关键作用。在隐私影响或隐私风险的情况下尤其如此:虽然现有方法在从静态设计环境评估整体风险方面相当成功，但它们不太适合捕捉动态且通常不可能预见的风险元素。在这份立场文件中，我们在大量现实动机情景的基础上强调了这一问题，并概述了我们对持续隐私影响评估和风险管理的愿景。
papers.title_zh: 永无止境的故事:持续隐私影响评估的必要性

papers.title: Extracting Layered Privacy Language Purposes from Web Services
papers.authors: Kalle Hjerppe, Jukka Ruohonen, Ville Leppänen
papers.abstract: Web services are important in the processing of personal data in the World Wide Web. In light of recent data protection regulations, this processing raises a question about consent or other basis of legal processing. While a consent must be informed, many web services fail to provide enough information for users to make informed decisions. Privacy policies and privacy languages are one way for addressing this problem; the former document how personal data is processed, while the latter describe this processing formally. In this paper, the so-called Layered Privacy Language (LPL) is coupled with web services in order to express personal data processing with a formal analysis method that seeks to generate the processing purposes for privacy policies. To this end, the paper reviews the background theory as well as proposes a method and a concrete tool. The results are demonstrated with a small case study.
papers.abstract_zh: Web服务在处理万维网中的个人数据时非常重要。根据最近的数据保护法规，这种处理提出了一个关于同意或其他合法处理基础的问题。虽然同意必须是知情的，但许多web服务无法为用户提供足够的信息来做出明智的决定。隐私政策和隐私语言是解决这个问题的一种方法；前者记录了个人数据是如何处理的，而后者正式描述了这一过程。在本文中，所谓的分层隐私语言(LPL)与web服务相结合，以便用一种形式分析方法来表达个人数据处理，该方法试图为隐私策略生成处理目的。为此，本文回顾了背景理论，并提出了方法和具体工具。通过一个小的案例研究验证了结果。
papers.title_zh: 从Web服务中提取分层的隐私语言目的

papers.title: On Compliance of Cookie Purposes with the Purpose Specification Principle
papers.authors: Imane Fouad, Cristiana Santos, Feras Al Kassar, Nataliia Bielova, Stefano Calzavara
papers.abstract: The enforcement of the General Data Protection Regulation and the ePrivacy Directive relies upon auditing legal compliance of websites. Data controllers, as part of their accountability and transparency obligations, need to declare the purposes of cookies that they use in their websites. This leads to relevant questions such as: How should purposes be described according to the purpose specification principle? And how to ensure a scalable auditing, enabled by automated means, for legal compliance of cookie purposes?In this paper, we investigate the legal compliance of purposes for 20,218 third-party cookies. Surprisingly, only 12.85% of third-party cookies have a corresponding cookie policy where a cookie is even mentioned. Overall, we find out that purposes declared in cookie policies do not comply with the purpose specification principle in 95% of cases in our automatized audit. Finally, we provide recommendations on standardized specification of purposes following the recent draft recommendation of the French Data Protection Authority (CNIL) on cookies.
papers.abstract_zh: 《一般数据保护条例》和《电子隐私指令》的执行依赖于对网站法律合规性的审计。作为其责任和透明度义务的一部分，数据控制者需要声明他们在网站中使用的cookies的目的。这就引出了相关的问题，如:根据目的说明原则，目的应该如何描述？以及如何确保通过自动化方式实现的可伸缩审计，以符合cookie的法律要求？在本文中，我们调查了20，218个第三方cookies的合法合规性。令人惊讶的是，只有12.85%的第三方cookie有相应的cookie政策，其中甚至提到了cookie。总的来说，在我们的自动化审计中，我们发现cookie策略中声明的目的在95%的情况下不符合目的规范原则。最后，我们根据法国数据保护局(CNIL)最近关于cookies的建议草案，提供了关于标准化目的规范的建议。
papers.title_zh: 论Cookie的用途与用途说明原则的一致性

papers.title: A Siamese Adversarial Anonymizer for Data Minimization in Biometric Applications
papers.authors: Giuseppe Garofalo, Tim Van hamme, Davy Preuveneers, Wouter Joosen
papers.abstract: A wealth of sensors measure our day to day activities. Sharing these biometric data with cloud-enabled applications provides users with useful insights about their health status. However, due to their high re-identification potential, granting medical and fitness applications access to sensors data raises serious privacy concerns.In this work, we aim to find a data representation that sup-presses identity while retaining utility, i.e. data minimization. To this end, we define a component that is plugged into a machine learning pipeline and trained following a min-max adversarial optimization strategy. By using our component during training, we limit the need to rely on third parties and, therefore, reduce the risks of leakages and unintended processing. We evaluate privacy vs. utility trade-off on a real-world sharing scenario involving motion data, i.e. accelerometer and gyroscope measurements. Privacy is estimated by analyzing if an honest-but-curious attacker can effectively link two traces to the same user. In our experiments, we observe a decrease in test verification accuracy, i.e. the identifiability of the users, from 85% to 57%. This leaves an attacker with a representation that he can match only slightly better compared to a random guess. On top of that, the privatized gait representation is accompanied by an increase in performance w.r.t. the main tasks.
papers.abstract_zh: 大量的传感器测量我们的日常活动。与支持云的应用程序共享这些生物特征数据，为用户提供了关于其健康状况的有用见解。然而，由于其较高的重新识别可能性，允许医疗和健身应用访问传感器数据会引起严重的隐私问题。在这项工作中，我们的目标是找到一种数据表示，在保持实用性的同时，即数据最小化。为此，我们定义了一个组件，它被插入到机器学习管道中，并按照最小-最大对立优化策略进行训练。通过在培训期间使用我们的组件，我们减少了对第三方的依赖，从而降低了泄漏和意外处理的风险。我们评估了涉及运动数据(即加速度计和陀螺仪测量)的真实世界共享场景中隐私与效用的权衡。通过分析诚实但好奇的攻击者是否能够有效地将两个跟踪链接到同一个用户来估计隐私。在我们的实验中，我们观察到测试验证准确性，即用户的可识别性，从85%下降到57%。这使得攻击者只能找到比随机猜测稍好一点的表示。最重要的是，私有化的步态表征伴随着在主要任务中表现的提高。
papers.title_zh: 一种用于生物识别应用中数据最小化的暹罗对抗匿名器

papers.title: Enhancing Privacy via Hierarchical Federated Learning
papers.authors: Aidmar Wainakh, Alejandro Sánchez Guinea, Tim Grube, Max Mühlhäuser
