papers.abstract: Federated learning suffers from several privacy-related issues that expose the participants to various threats. A number of these issues are aggravated by the centralized architecture of federated learning. In this paper, we discuss applying federated learning on a hierarchical architecture as a potential solution. We introduce the opportunities for more flexible decentralized control over the training process and its impact on the participants' privacy. Furthermore, we investigate possibilities to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of defense and verification methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 联合学习受到几个隐私相关问题的困扰，这些问题使参与者面临各种威胁。联邦学习的集中架构加剧了这些问题。在本文中，我们讨论了在一个层次结构上应用联合学习作为一个潜在的解决方案。我们介绍了对培训过程及其对参与者隐私的影响进行更灵活的分散控制的机会。此外，我们研究了提高防御和验证方法的效率和有效性的可能性。
papers.title_zh: 通过分层联合学习增强隐私

papers.title: Reconciling Privacy and Utility for Energy Services - an Application to Demand Response Protocols
papers.authors: Franklin Leukam Lako, Paul Lajoie-Mazenc, Maryline Laurent
papers.abstract: The collection of fine-grained consumption of users in the smart grid enables energy providers to propose new services (e.g. consumption forecasts or demand response protocols), but at the price of users’ privacy: consumption data collected by smart meters reflects the use of all appliances by inhabitants in the household over time. Based on the observation that Secure Multi-party Computation (SMC) enables computing an aggregate without learning individual information, this paper proposes a privacy-preserving adaptation of an existing demand response protocol which is fed with users’ personal data. An extension providing fraud resistance is also presented. Experimental results demonstrate that our protocol is able to reconcile privacy and utility.
papers.abstract_zh: 收集智能电网中用户的精细消费使能源提供商能够提出新的服务(例如消费预测或需求响应协议)，但代价是用户的隐私:智能电表收集的消费数据反映了住户在一段时间内对所有电器的使用情况。基于安全多方计算(SMC)无需学习个人信息就能计算出一个集合的观点，提出了一个对现有的需求响应协议的隐私保护修改方案。还提出了一种提供防欺诈的扩展。实验结果表明，我们的协议能够兼顾隐私和效用。
papers.title_zh: 调和能源服务的隐私和效用——需求响应协议的应用

papers.title: IEEE S&B 2020: 4th IEEE Workshop on Security and Privacy on the Blockchain
papers.authors: Tim Ruffing, Florian Tschorsch
papers.abstract: This volume includes the proceedings of the fourth IEEE Security and Privacy on the Blockchain Workshop (S&B 2020), which is affiliated with the IEEE European Symposium on Security and Privacy (EuroS&P 2020).
papers.abstract_zh: 本卷包括第四届IEEE安全和隐私区块链研讨会(S&B 2020)的会议录，该会议隶属于IEEE欧洲安全和隐私研讨会(EuroS&P 2020)。
papers.title_zh: IEEE S&B 2020:第四届IEEE区块链安全和隐私研讨会

papers.title: FileBounty: Fair Data Exchange
papers.authors: Simon Janin, Kaihua Qin, Akaki Mamageishvili, Arthur Gervais
papers.abstract: Digital contents are typically sold online through centralized and custodian marketplaces, which requires the trading partners to trust a central entity. We present FileBounty, a fair protocol which, assuming the cryptographic hash of the file of interest is known to the buyer, is trust-free and lets a buyer purchase data for a previously agreed monetary amount, while guaranteeing the integrity of the contents. To prevent misbehavior, FileBounty guarantees that any deviation from the expected participants’ behavior results in a negative financial payoff; i.e. we show that honest behavior corresponds to a subgame perfect Nash equilibrium. Our novel deposit refunding scheme is resistant to extortion attacks under rational adversaries. If buyer and seller behave honestly, FileBounty’s execution requires only three on-chain transactions, while the actual data is exchanged off-chain in an efficient and privacypreserving manner. We moreover show how FileBounty enables a flexible peer-to-peer setting where multiple parties fairly sell a file to a buyer.
papers.abstract_zh: 数字内容通常通过集中和托管市场在线销售，这要求交易伙伴信任中央实体。我们提出了FileBounty，这是一个公平的协议，假设感兴趣的文件的加密散列对买方是已知的，它是无信任的，并且允许买方以预先商定的金额购买数据，同时保证内容的完整性。为了防止不当行为，FileBounty保证任何偏离预期参与者行为的行为都会导致负的财务回报；也就是说，我们证明诚实行为对应于一个子博弈完美纳什均衡。我们新颖的存款退还方案抵抗理性对手的敲诈攻击。如果买方和卖方行为诚实，FileBounty的执行只需要三个链上交易，而实际的数据以有效和隐私保护的方式在链外交换。此外，我们还展示了FileBounty如何支持灵活的对等设置，多方可以公平地将文件出售给买家。
papers.title_zh: 公平数据交换

papers.title: Performance Trade-offs in Design of MimbleWimble Proofs of Reserves
papers.authors: Suyash Bagad, Saravanan Vijayakumaran
papers.abstract: Revelio (CVCBT 2019) is a proof of reserves protocol for MimbleWimble-based cryptocurrencies which provides privacy to a cryptocurrency exchange by hiding the exchange-owned outputs in a larger anonymity set of unspent outputs. A drawback of Revelio is that the proof size scales linearly in the size of the anonymity set. To alleviate this, we design RevelioBP, a Bulletproofs-based proof of reserves protocol with proof sizes which scale logarithmically in the size of the anonymity set. This improvement allows us to use the set of all UTXOs as the anonymity set, resulting in better privacy for the exchange. On the downside, the higher proof generation and verification time of RevelioBP than that of Revelio might affect practical deployment of RevelioBP. Through implementation of RevelioBP, we quantitatively analyse trade-offs in design of MimbleWimble proofs of reserves in terms of scalability and performance. We conclude that unless proof size is a concern for exchanges, Revelio is a marginally better choice for proof of reserves. On the other hand, if an exchange is willing to pay in terms of proof generation time, RevelioBP offers proof sizes significantly smaller than Revelio.
papers.abstract_zh: Revelio (CVCBT 2019)是基于mimble的加密货币的储备证明协议，它通过将交易所拥有的输出隐藏在更大的未用输出匿名集中，为加密货币交易所提供隐私。Revelio的一个缺点是证明大小与匿名集的大小成线性比例。为了缓解这个问题，我们设计了RevelioBP，一个基于Bulletproofs的保留证明协议，其证明大小与匿名集的大小成对数比例。这一改进允许我们使用所有UTXOs的集合作为匿名集合，从而为交换带来更好的保密性。另一方面，RevelioBP的证明生成和验证时间比Revelio长，这可能会影响RevelioBP的实际部署。通过RevelioBP的实现，我们从可扩展性和性能的角度定量分析了储量证明设计中的权衡。我们的结论是，除非证明规模是交易所的一个问题，否则Revelio是储备证明的一个略好的选择。另一方面，如果交易所愿意在证据生成时间方面付费，RevelioBP提供的证据大小远远小于Revelio。
papers.title_zh: 储量动效证明设计中的性能权衡

papers.title: zkRelay: Facilitating Sidechains using zkSNARK-based Chain-Relays
papers.authors: Martin Westerkamp, Jacob Eberhardt
papers.abstract: We facilitate trusted cross-blockchain state proofs by implementing a chain-relay that validates block headers from proof-of-work blockchains. While current approaches require proof sizes linear to the amount of blocks the state was built on, trusted intermediaries, or economic assumptions, we propose the utilization of off-chain computations through zkSNARKs to provide a cryptographically secure and highly scalable sidechain mechanism. Multiple block headers are included in batches and verified off-chain, while preserving light client support. Only the validity of the off-chain computation is verified on-chain, creating a sidechain mechanism that requires constant verification costs and releases the target ledger from processing and storing every single block header of the source blockchain. Efficient Merkle proofs enable including intermediary blocks for any batch that was submitted. We provide a prototypical implementation that facilitates the verification of 504 Bitcoin headers in a single proof on Ethereum using the ZoKrates framework. Hereby, the verification costs are reduced by a factor of 187 compared to current approaches such as BTC Relay.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们通过实现一个链式中继来验证来自工作证明区块链的块头，从而促进可信的跨区块链状态证明。虽然当前的方法要求证明大小与建立状态的块数、可信中介或经济假设成线性关系，但我们建议通过zkSNARKs利用链外计算来提供密码安全和高度可伸缩的侧链机制。多个块头被批量包含并离线验证，同时保留了轻量级客户端支持。只有链外计算的有效性在链上被验证，这创建了需要恒定验证成本的侧链机制，并使目标分类帐免于处理和存储源区块链的每个单个块标题。高效的Merkle证明支持包含提交的任何批次的中间块。我们提供了一个原型实现，它使用ZoKrates框架在以太坊上简化了504个比特币报头的验证。因此，与诸如BTC中继的当前方法相比，验证成本降低了187倍。
papers.title_zh: zkRelay:使用基于zkSNARK的链式中继来简化侧链

papers.title: A Quantitative Analysis of Security, Anonymity and Scalability for the Lightning Network
papers.authors: Sergei Tikhomirov, Pedro Moreno-Sanchez, Matteo Maffei
papers.abstract: Payment channel networks have been introduced to mitigate the scalability issues inherent to permissionless decentralized cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin. Launched in 2018, the Lightning Network (LN) has been gaining popularity and consists today of more than 5000 nodes and 35000 payment channels that jointly hold 965 bitcoins (9.2M USD as of June 2020). This adoption has motivated research from both academia and industryPayment channels suffer from security vulnerabilities, such as the wormhole attack [39], anonymity issues [38], and scalability limitations related to the upper bound on the number of concurrent payments per channel [28], which have been pointed out by the scientific community but never quantitatively analyzedIn this work, we first analyze the proneness of the LN to the wormhole attack and attacks against anonymity. We observe that an adversary needs to control only 2% of nodes to learn sensitive payment information (e.g., sender, receiver, and amount) or to carry out the wormhole attack. Second, we study the management of concurrent payments in the LN and quantify its negative effect on scalability. We observe that for micropayments, the forwarding capability of up to 50% of channels is restricted to a value smaller than the channel capacity. This phenomenon hinders scalability and opens the door for denial-of-service attacks: we estimate that a network-wide DoS attack costs within 1.6M USD, while isolating the biggest community costs only 238k USDOur findings should prompt the LN community to consider the issues studied in this work when educating users about path selection algorithms, as well as to adopt multi-hop payment protocols that provide stronger security, privacy and scalability guarantees.
papers.abstract_zh: 支付通道网络已被引入，以缓解比特币等无许可分散加密货币固有的可扩展性问题。闪电网络(LN)于2018年推出，越来越受欢迎，目前由5000多个节点和35000个支付渠道组成，共持有965个比特币(截至2020年6月为920万美元)。这种采用激发了学术界和工业界的研究，支付通道遭受安全漏洞，如虫洞攻击[39]，匿名问题[38]，以及与每个通道并发支付数量上限相关的可伸缩性限制[28]，科学界已经指出了这些问题，但从未进行定量分析。在这项工作中，我们首先分析了LN对虫洞攻击和匿名攻击的倾向。我们观察到，对手只需要控制2%的节点就可以了解敏感的支付信息(例如，发送者、接收者和金额)或实施虫洞攻击。其次，我们研究了LN中并发支付的管理，并量化了它对可伸缩性的负面影响。我们观察到，对于微支付，高达50%的通道的转发能力被限制在小于通道容量的值。这种现象阻碍了可扩展性，并为拒绝服务攻击打开了大门:我们估计一次全网络范围的DoS攻击成本在160万美元以内，而隔离最大的社区成本仅为23.8万美元。我们的发现应该促使LN社区在教育用户有关路径选择算法时考虑本研究中的问题，并采用多跳支付协议，以提供更强的安全性、隐私和可扩展性保证。
papers.title_zh: 闪电网络安全性、匿名性和可扩展性的定量分析

papers.title: Ostraka: Secure Blockchain Scaling by Node Sharding
papers.authors: Alex Manuskin, Michael Mirkin, Ittay Eyal
papers.abstract: Cryptocurrencies, implemented with blockchain protocols, promise to become a global payment system if they can overcome performance limitations. Rapidly advancing architectures improve on latency and throughput, but most require all participating servers to process all transactions. Several recent works propose to shard the system, such that each machine would only process a subset of the transactions.However, we identify a denial-of-service attack that is exposed by these solutions – an attacker can generate transactions that would overload a single shard, thus delaying processing in the entire system. Moreover, we show that in common scenarios, these protocols require most node operators to process almost all blockchain transactions.We present Ostraka, a blockchain node architecture that shards (parallelizes) the nodes themselves. We prove that replacing a unified node with an Ostraka node does not affect the security of the underlying consensus mechanism.We evaluate analytically and experimentally block propagation and processing in various settings. Ostraka allows nodes in the network to scale, without costly coordination. In our experiments, Ostraka nodes transaction processing rate grows linearly with the addition of resources.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过区块链协议实现的加密货币，如果能够克服性能限制，有望成为全球支付系统。快速发展的体系结构改善了延迟和吞吐量，但大多数都需要所有参与的服务器来处理所有事务。最近的几项工作提出了共享系统，这样每台机器只能处理事务的一个子集。然而，我们发现了这些解决方案暴露的拒绝服务攻击——攻击者可以生成使单个碎片过载的事务，从而延迟整个系统的处理。此外，我们表明，在常见的情况下，这些协议需要大多数节点运营商处理几乎所有的区块链事务。我们介绍了Ostraka，这是一种区块链节点体系结构，它将节点本身分片(并行化)。我们证明了用Ostraka节点替换统一节点不会影响底层共识机制的安全性。我们通过分析和实验评估了不同环境下的阻断传播和处理。Ostraka允许网络中的节点进行扩展，无需昂贵的协调。在我们的实验中，Ostraka节点的事务处理率随着资源的增加而线性增长。
papers.title_zh: Ostraka:通过节点分片实现安全区块链扩展

papers.title: An Automatic Detection and Analysis of the Bitcoin Generator Scam
papers.authors: Emad Badawi, Guy-Vincent Jourdan, Gregor von Bochmann, Iosif-Viorel Onut
papers.abstract: We investigate what we call the "Bitcoin Generator Scam" (BGS), a simple system in which the scammers promise to "generate" new bitcoins using the ones that were sent to them. A typical offer will suggest that, for a small fee, one could receive within minutes twice the amount of bitcoins submitted. BGS is clearly not a very sophisticated attack. The modus operandi is simply to put up some web page on which to find the address to send the money and wait for the payback. The pages are then indexed by search engines, and ready to find for victims looking for free bitcoins.We describe here a generic system to find and analyze scams such as BGS. We have trained a classifier to detect these pages, and we have a crawler searching for instances using a series of search engines. We then monitor the instances that we find to trace payments and bitcoin addresses that are being used over time. Unlike most bitcoin-based scam monitoring systems, we do not rely on analyzing transactions on the blockchain to find scam instances. Instead, we proactively find these instances through the web pages advertising the scam. Thus our system is able to find addresses with very few transactions, or even none at all. Indeed, over half of the addresses that have eventually received funds were detected before receiving any transactions.The data for this paper was collected over four months, from November 2019 to February 2020. We have found more than 1,300 addresses directly associated with the scam, hosted on over 500 domains. Overall, these addresses have received (at least) over 5 million USD to the scam, with an average of 47.3 USD per transaction.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们调查了我们所谓的“比特币发电机骗局”(BGS)，这是一个简单的系统，骗子承诺使用发送给他们的比特币“生成”新的比特币。一个典型的提议是，支付少量费用，你可以在几分钟内收到两倍于提交数量的比特币。BGS显然不是一个非常复杂的攻击。惯用的手法是简单地建立一些网页，在上面找到寄钱的地址，然后等待回报。这些页面随后会被搜索引擎编入索引，并随时可供寻找免费比特币的受害者查找。我们在这里描述一个通用的系统来寻找和分析诈骗，如BGS。我们已经训练了一个分类器来检测这些页面，我们有一个爬虫使用一系列搜索引擎来搜索实例。然后，我们监控我们发现的实例，以跟踪随着时间的推移正在使用的支付和比特币地址。与大多数基于比特币的诈骗监控系统不同，我们不依赖于分析区块链上的交易来发现诈骗实例。相反，我们通过广告骗局的网页主动发现这些实例。因此，我们的系统能够找到交易很少的地址，甚至根本没有交易。事实上，超过一半的最终收到资金的地址是在收到任何交易之前被发现的。本文的数据是在2019年11月至2020年2月的四个月内收集的。我们已经发现了1，300多个与该骗局直接相关的地址，托管在500多个域中。总的来说，这些地址已经收到(至少)超过500万美元的诈骗，平均每笔交易47.3美元。
papers.title_zh: 比特币发电机骗局的自动检测和分析

papers.title: CryptoWills: How to Bequeath Cryptoassets
papers.authors: István András Seres, Omer Shlomovits, Pratyush Ranjan Tiwari
papers.abstract: In this paper, we put forth the problem of bequeathing cryptoassets. In this problem, a testator wishes to bequeath cryptoassets - e.g. secrets, static keys or cryptocurrency - to their heirs. Crucially, the testator should retain control of their assets before their passing. Additionally testator needs to maintain privacy, i.e. beneficiaries must not learn the bequest. Moreover, beneficiaries must not be able to determine whether they will inherit at all before testator’s decease. We formally define the security goals of a cryptographic will (cryptowill) protocol and subsequently present schemes fulfilling the required security properties.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了遗赠加密资产的问题。在这个问题中，遗嘱人希望将加密资产(如秘密、静态密钥或加密货币)留给他们的继承人。至关重要的是，遗嘱人应该在他们去世前保留对其资产的控制权。此外，立遗嘱人需要保护隐私，即受益人不得得知遗产。此外，在立遗嘱人死亡之前，受益人必须无法确定他们是否将继承遗产。我们正式定义了密码遗嘱(cryptowill)协议的安全目标，并随后提出了满足所需安全属性的方案。
papers.title_zh: 加密遗嘱:如何遗赠加密资产

papers.title: WACCO 2020: the 2nd Workshop on Attackers and Cybercrime Operations Co-held with IEEE European Symposium on Security and Privacy 2020
papers.authors: Luca Allodi, Alice Hutchings, Fabio Massacci, Sergio Pastrana, Marie Vasek
papers.abstract: The Workshop on Attackers and Cybercrime Operations started in 2019 to build a strongly multidisciplinary venue providing a variety of angles (including but not limited to technical, legal, and criminological) on issues related to cybercrime and attacker operations.
papers.abstract_zh: 关于攻击者和网络犯罪行动的研讨会始于2019年，旨在建立一个强有力的多学科场所，提供关于网络犯罪和攻击者行动相关问题的各种角度(包括但不限于技术、法律和犯罪学)。
papers.title_zh: WACCO 2020:与IEEE欧洲安全和隐私研讨会2020共同举办的第二届攻击者和网络犯罪操作研讨会

papers.title: A tight scrape: methodological approaches to cybercrime research data collection in adversarial environments
papers.authors: Kieron Turk, Sergio Pastrana, Ben Collier
papers.abstract: We outline in this article a study of ‘adversarial scraping’ for academic research, which involves the collection of data from websites that implement defences against traditional web scraping tools. Although this is primarily a research methods article, it also constitutes a valuable systematic accounting of the different defensive techniques used by the administrators of illicit online services. Some of these administrators intentionally implement functionality which attempts to prevent web scrapers from gathering data from their site, and some will unintentionally design their sites in ways that make data gathering harder. This is of particular importance for criminological research, where websites such as cryptomarkets and underground forums are publicly available (and hence there is an ethical case for data collection), but the illicit activity involved means that the administrators of these services limit scraping. We classify different anti-crawling techniques taken by websites and outline our developed countermeasures. Based on this, we evaluate which of these methods do and do not succeed at preventing data gathering from a website, as well as those which impact the scraper but do not necessarily prevent the data from being obtained. We find that there are some defences that, if used together, might thwart scraping. There are also a series of defences that are successful at slowing down scrapers, making historical scraping more difficult. On the other hand, we show that many defences are easy to work around and do not impact scraping.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们在这篇文章中概述了一项针对学术研究的“对抗性抓取”研究，该研究涉及从对传统网络抓取工具实施防御的网站收集数据。虽然这主要是一篇研究方法的文章，但它也对非法在线服务的管理员使用的不同防御技术进行了有价值的系统阐述。这些管理员中的一些故意实现试图阻止web抓取器从他们的站点收集数据的功能，并且一些将无意地以使数据收集更困难的方式设计他们的站点。这对于犯罪学研究尤其重要，在犯罪学研究中，cryptomarkets和地下论坛等网站是公开的(因此存在数据收集的道德问题)，但所涉及的非法活动意味着这些服务的管理者限制抓取。我们对网站采用的不同反爬行技术进行了分类，并概述了我们开发的对策。在此基础上，我们评估了这些方法中哪些成功阻止了从网站收集数据，哪些成功阻止了从网站收集数据，以及哪些影响了刮刀但不一定阻止了数据的获取。我们发现有一些防御措施，如果一起使用，可能会阻碍刮擦。还有一系列防御措施可以成功减缓铲运机的速度，让历史性的铲运机变得更加困难。另一方面，我们表明许多防御很容易解决，不会影响刮擦。
papers.title_zh: 困境:敌对环境下网络犯罪研究数据收集的方法

papers.title: #ISIS vs #ActionCountersTerrorism: A Computational Analysis of Extremist and Counter-extremist Twitter Narratives
papers.authors: Fatima Zahrah, Jason R. C. Nurse, Michael Goldsmith
papers.abstract: The rapid expansion of cyberspace has greatly facilitated the strategic shift of traditional crimes to online platforms. This has included malicious actors, such as extremist organisations, making use of online networks to disseminate propaganda and incite violence through radicalising individuals. In this article, we seek to advance current research by exploring how supporters of extremist organisations craft and disseminate their content, and how posts from counter-extremism agencies compare to them. In particular, this study will apply computational techniques to analyse the narratives of various pro-extremist and counter-extremist Twitter accounts, and investigate how the psychological motivation behind the messages compares between pro-ISIS and counter-extremism narratives. Our findings show that pro-extremist accounts often use different strategies to disseminate content (such as the types of hashtags used) when compared to counter-extremist accounts across different types of organisations, including accounts of governments and NGOs. Through this study, we provide unique insights into both extremist and counter-extremist narratives on social media platforms. Furthermore, we define several avenues for discussion regarding the extent to which counter-messaging may be effective at diminishing the online influence of extremist and other criminal organisations. Cybercrime, online radicalisation, counterextremism, social media analysis, Twitter, cyber-criminals.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络空间的快速扩张极大地促进了传统犯罪向网络平台的战略转移。这包括恶意行为者，如极端主义组织，利用在线网络进行宣传，并通过激进个人煽动暴力。在这篇文章中，我们试图通过探索极端组织的支持者如何制作和传播他们的内容，以及反极端主义机构的帖子如何与他们进行比较，来推进当前的研究。特别是，这项研究将应用计算技术来分析各种支持极端主义和反对极端主义的推特账户的叙事，并调查支持ISIS和反对极端主义的叙事背后的心理动机是如何比较的。我们的发现表明，与不同类型的组织(包括政府和非政府组织)的反极端主义账户相比，亲极端主义账户经常使用不同的策略来传播内容(如使用的标签类型)。通过这项研究，我们对社交媒体平台上的极端主义和反极端主义叙事提供了独特的见解。此外，我们定义了几个讨论途径，讨论反信息在减少极端分子和其他犯罪组织的在线影响方面的有效程度。网络犯罪，网络激进化，反极端主义，社交媒体分析，推特，网络罪犯。
papers.title_zh: # ISIS vs # action counters terrorism:对极端主义和反极端主义推特叙事的计算分析

papers.title: Mapping the Geography of Cybercrime: A Review of Indices of Digital Offending by Country
papers.authors: Jonathan Lusthaus, Miranda Bruce, Nigel Phair
papers.abstract: The acknowledgement that cybercrime offenders are embedded within local contexts presents a broad vector for further study. But research in this area is still in its early days and many topics need to be developed further. Foremost among these is the geography of cybercrime. This endeavour has an important policy contribution to make. For example, if we can determine which countries are producing cybercrime at more significant levels, preventative measures can be specifically targeted to those countries. The first step within such a research agenda must be the development of an index of cybercriminality by country, as this is foundational to identifying hubs of digital offending and the factors driving the emergence of these hubs. This paper is methodological in its contribution, and does not offer its own empirical findings. Instead, it aims to provide some broad foundational thinking for a very challenging research exercise, and it is intended to support later, more refined, efforts to develop indices. It consists of two components. First, it reviews existing attempts to identify and rank cybercrime hotspots. Second, it draws important lessons from these works towards developing a successful index. Some methodological points are made on what the way forward may be for this emerging field, and how a reliable and valid index on cybercriminality could be crafted.
papers.abstract_zh: 承认网络犯罪罪犯植根于当地环境为进一步研究提供了一个广泛的载体。但这方面的研究仍处于早期阶段，许多课题需要进一步研究。其中最重要的是网络犯罪的地理分布。这一努力可以做出重要的政策贡献。例如，如果我们可以确定哪些国家正在产生更严重的网络犯罪，那么预防措施就可以专门针对这些国家。这一研究议程的第一步必须是按国家制定网络犯罪指数，因为这是确定数字犯罪中心和推动这些中心出现的因素的基础。这篇论文的贡献是方法论的，并不提供自己的实证研究结果。相反，它旨在为一项极具挑战性的研究工作提供一些广泛的基础思维，并旨在支持以后更精细的指数开发工作。它由两部分组成。首先，它回顾了现有的识别和排列网络犯罪热点的尝试。其次，它从这些工作中吸取了重要的经验教训，以开发一个成功的指数。就这一新兴领域的前进方向以及如何制定可靠有效的网络犯罪指数提出了一些方法观点。
papers.title_zh: 绘制网络犯罪的地理分布图:各国数字犯罪指数综述

papers.title: Growth and Commoditization of Remote Access Trojans
papers.authors: Veronica Valeros, Sebastian Garcia
papers.abstract: In the last three decades there have been significant changes in the cybercrime world in terms of organization, type of attacks, and tools. Remote Access Trojans (RAT) are an intrinsic part of traditional cybercriminal activities but they have become a standard tool in advanced espionage and scams attacks. The overly specialized research in our community on Remote Access Trojans has resulted in a seemingly lack of general perspective and understanding on how RATs have evolved as a phenomenon. This work presents a new generalist perspective on Remote Access Trojans, an analysis of their growth in the last 30 years, and a discussion on how they have become a commodity in the last decade. We found that the amount of RATs increased drastically in the last ten years and that nowadays they have become standardized commodity products that are no very different from each other.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去三十年中，网络犯罪领域在组织、攻击类型和工具方面发生了重大变化。远程访问特洛伊木马(RAT)是传统网络犯罪活动的固有组成部分，但它们已成为高级间谍和诈骗攻击的标准工具。我们社区中对远程访问特洛伊木马的过度专业化研究导致了对rat作为一种现象是如何演变的缺乏普遍的观点和理解。这项工作提出了一个关于远程访问木马的新的通才观点，分析了它们在过去30年中的增长，并讨论了它们如何在过去十年中成为一种商品。我们发现老鼠的数量在过去的十年中急剧增加，现在它们已经成为标准化的商品，彼此没有太大的不同。
papers.title_zh: 远程访问特洛伊木马的增长和商品化

papers.title: My Boss is Really Cool: Malware-Induced Misperception in Workplace Communication Through Covert Linguistic Manipulation of Emails
papers.authors: Filipo Sharevski, Peter Jachim, Paige Treebridge, Audrey Li, Adam Babin
papers.abstract: This paper introduces a social engineering attack called Malware-Induced Misperception (MIM). Social engineering attacks are usually carried over emails and "phish" for the receiver’s assets, e.g. passwords. The MIM also uses email as an attack vector but instead "phishes" for the receiver’s perception. Since email is one of the main lines of communication in a workplace, individuals are trained how to spot traditional phishing but not emails aiming to induce misperception. A study was conducted to test the effect of the MIM attack in covertly manipulating the perception of the individual’s working relationship in a realistic workplace email interaction (N = 173). The misperception-inducing malware was packaged as a browser extension that manipulated the "politeness" formatting of an email request through covert linguistic rearrangements. The results indicate that the attack is capable of creating misperceptions that: (1) an email request seems more demanding than it actually is; and (2) the sender seems more polite and "cool" than they actually are. The results also show that the attack nudges the receivers to match the level of politeness in their response to the one in the email request. The overall findings are consistent with the politeness theory applied in computer-mediated communication settings.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍了一种叫做恶意软件诱导的误解(MIM)的社会工程攻击。社会工程攻击通常通过电子邮件和针对接收者资产(如密码)的“网络钓鱼”进行。MIM也使用电子邮件作为攻击媒介，但却是针对收件人感知的“网络钓鱼”。由于电子邮件是工作场所中的主要沟通渠道之一，因此人们会接受如何识别传统网络钓鱼的培训，但不会接受旨在诱导误解的电子邮件的培训。我们开展了一项研究，以测试MIM攻击在现实工作场所电子邮件交互中暗中操纵个人工作关系感知的效果(N = 173)。这种引起误解的恶意软件被打包成一个浏览器扩展，通过隐蔽的语言重排来操纵电子邮件请求的“礼貌”格式。结果表明，这种攻击能够造成误解:(1)电子邮件请求似乎比实际要求更高；(2)发送者看起来比他们实际上更有礼貌，更“酷”。结果还表明，攻击会促使收件人在回复邮件请求时表现出同样的礼貌。总体研究结果与礼貌理论在网络交际中的应用是一致的。
papers.title_zh: 我的老板真的很酷:通过对电子邮件进行隐蔽的语言操作，恶意软件在工作场所交流中引发了误解

papers.title: Don't Forget the Human: a Crowdsourced Approach to Automate Response and Containment Against Spear Phishing Attacks
papers.authors: Pavlo Burda, Luca Allodi, Nicola Zannone
papers.abstract: Organizations are increasingly facing sophisticated social engineering attacks that exploit human vulnerabilities and overcome commonly available countermeasures. Spear-phishing campaigns are becoming the most prevalent attack and source of compromise for most organizations. We argue that existing prevention and detection countermeasures are fundamentally ineffective against this class of attacks. In this work, we propose a novel approach to address the limitations of existing countermeasures. Our proposition is a new course of action to exploit human detection capabilities as a basis of automated response strategies. Preliminary results unveil users’ mental models for phishing detection and reporting as a way to improve the phishing reporting process altogether. A real word case study is provided to promote the feasibility of our proposal.
papers.abstract_zh: 组织越来越多地面临复杂的社会工程攻击，这些攻击利用了人类的弱点并克服了常见的对策。鱼叉式网络钓鱼活动正成为大多数组织最普遍的攻击和危害来源。我们认为，现有的预防和检测对策对这类攻击根本无效。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种新的方法来解决现有对策的局限性。我们的主张是一种新的行动路线，利用人类的探测能力作为自动反应策略的基础。初步结果揭示了用户对网络钓鱼检测和报告的心理模型，作为一种全面改进网络钓鱼报告流程的方法。我们提供了一个真实的案例研究，以促进我们的建议的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 不要忘记人:一种众包方法，用于自动响应和遏制鱼叉式网络钓鱼攻击

papers.title: Knowledge is power: An analysis of discussions on hacking forums
papers.authors: John McAlaney, Sarah Hambidge, Emily Kimpton, Helen Thackray
papers.abstract: There remains a lack of understanding on the social factors that influence the behaviours and beliefs of people who have an interest in hacking. This research sought to address that gap by exploring the conversations that take place on hacking forums and subreddits. Text in hacking related threads was collected from these sites over a period of several months. Linguistic Inquiry and Word Count (LIWC) software was used to determine the linguistic characteristics of each forum/ subreddit. Thematic analysis was then conducted on a sub-set of text from each source. The results of the LIWC analysis indicated that there are variations in several psychologically relevant factors between these forums and subreddits, including the degree to which users used language that indicated they were being honest, confident, analytical and emotional. There were several results that were inconsistent with stereotypes of hackers, such as a relative absence of language indicating anger. The thematic analysis identified several themes relating to knowledge, skills acquisition, honesty legality and risk. Overall, this research demonstrates that there exists an established online community of hackers, which are likely to be encountered by any young person who becomes interested in cybersecurity and hacking. These communities may potentially act as an important source of social support and social identity for their members. Understanding the dynamics of these communities may better help us steer people towards legitimate cybersecurity careers, where their passion and skills can be used for societal good.
papers.abstract_zh: 对影响对黑客感兴趣的人的行为和信仰的社会因素仍然缺乏了解。这项研究试图通过探索黑客论坛和子论坛上的对话来解决这个问题。黑客相关主题的文本是在几个月的时间里从这些网站上收集的。语言查询和字数统计(LIWC)软件用于确定每个论坛/子编辑的语言特征。然后对每个来源的文本子集进行主题分析。LIWC分析的结果表明，这些论坛和子论坛之间的几个心理相关因素存在差异，包括用户使用语言表明他们诚实、自信、善于分析和情绪化的程度。有几个结果与黑客的刻板印象不一致，比如相对缺乏表示愤怒的语言。专题分析确定了与知识、技能获取、诚信、合法性和风险有关的几个专题。总体而言，这项研究表明，存在一个成熟的黑客在线社区，任何对网络安全和黑客感兴趣的年轻人都可能会遇到这个社区。这些社区可能成为其成员获得社会支持和社会认同的重要来源。了解这些社区的动态可能会更好地帮助我们引导人们走向合法的网络安全职业，在那里他们的热情和技能可以用于社会公益。
papers.title_zh: 知识就是力量:黑客论坛讨论分析

papers.title: A Social Network Analysis and Comparison of Six Dark Web Forums
papers.authors: Ildiko Pete, Jack Hughes, Yi Ting Chua, Maria Bada
papers.abstract: With increasing monitoring and regulation by platforms, communities with criminal interests are moving to the dark web, which hosts content ranging from whistle-blowing and privacy, to drugs, terrorism, and hacking. Using post discussion data from six dark web forums we construct six interaction graphs and use social network analysis tools to study these underground communities. We observe the structure of each network to highlight structural patterns and identify nodes of importance through network centrality analysis. Our findings suggest that in the majority of the forums some members are highly connected and form hubs, while most members have a lower number of connections. When examining the posting activities of central nodes we found that most of the central nodes post in sub-forums with broader topics, such as general discussions and tutorials. These members play different roles in the different forums, and within each forum we identified diverse user profiles.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着平台越来越多的监控和监管，具有犯罪利益的社区正在转向黑暗网络，该网络托管从举报和隐私到毒品、恐怖主义和黑客的内容。使用来自六个黑暗网络论坛的帖子讨论数据，我们构建了六个交互图，并使用社会网络分析工具来研究这些地下社区。我们观察每个网络的结构以突出结构模式，并通过网络中心性分析识别重要节点。我们的发现表明，在大多数论坛中，一些成员高度连接并形成枢纽，而大多数成员的连接数量较少。当检查中心节点的发帖活动时，我们发现大多数中心节点在具有更广泛主题的子论坛中发帖，例如一般讨论和教程。这些成员在不同的论坛中扮演不同的角色，在每个论坛中，我们确定了不同的用户配置文件。
papers.title_zh: 六大暗网论坛的社会网络分析与比较

papers.title: A Measurement Study on the Advertisements Displayed to Web Users Coming from the Regular Web and from Tor
papers.authors: Adrian Bermudez-Villalva, Mirco Musolesi, Gianluca Stringhini
papers.abstract: Online advertising is an effective way for businesses to find new customers and expand their reach to a great variety of audiences. Due to the large number of participants interacting in the process, advertising networks act as brokers between website owners and businesses facilitating the display of advertisements. Unfortunately, this system is abused by cybercriminals to perform illegal activities such as malvertising. In this paper, we perform a measurement of malvertising from the user point of view. Our goal is to collect advertisements from a regular Internet connection and using The Onion Router in an attempt to understand whether using different technologies to access the Web could influence the probability of infection. We compare the data from our experiments to find differences in the malvertising activity observed. We show that the level of maliciousness is similar between the two types of accesses. Nevertheless, there are significant differences related to the malicious landing pages delivered in each type of access. Our results provide the research community with insights into how ad traffic is treated depending on the way users access Web content.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线广告是企业寻找新客户和扩大受众范围的有效途径。由于在该过程中有大量的参与者交互，广告网络充当网站所有者和企业之间的经纪人，促进广告的显示。不幸的是，该系统被网络罪犯滥用来进行非法活动，例如恶意广告。在本文中，我们从用户的角度对广告失真进行了测量。我们的目标是从常规的互联网连接和使用洋葱路由器中收集广告，试图了解使用不同的技术访问网络是否会影响感染的可能性。我们比较实验数据，以发现所观察到的变性活动的差异。我们表明，这两种类型的访问之间的恶意程度是相似的。然而，在每种类型的访问中，恶意登录页面之间存在显著差异。我们的结果为研究界提供了如何根据用户访问网络内容的方式来处理广告流量的见解。
papers.title_zh: 对来自普通网站和Tor的网络用户展示广告的测量研究

papers.title: How can data from fitness trackers be obtained and analyzed with a forensic approach?
papers.authors: Florian Hantke, Andreas Dewald
papers.abstract: The use of Internet of Things devices is continuously increasing: People buy devices to make their lives more comfortable by using smart assistants or track sports activities and assess them. Moreover, these devices can sup-port digital investigators with valuable information when it is involved in a crime scene, since its data may provide information about the circumstances of the crime. One group of those devices are fitness trackers, which hold data such as walked steps. Accordingly, analysts can see activities, routines, and inconsistencies. We inspected three different common fitness trackers and developed a tool to analyze them in a standardized and forensically sound way. To collect data, we analyzed the Bluetooth communication, data on the phone, and internet communication. Our tool can analyze the different sources automatically and subsequently presents the results on a self-hosted web application. It is open-source and easily scalable so that developers can implement new extensions to support more than the three analyzed trackers.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网设备的使用不断增加:人们购买设备，通过使用智能助手或跟踪体育活动并对其进行评估，使他们的生活更加舒适。此外，这些设备可以在涉及犯罪现场时为数字调查人员提供有价值的信息，因为其数据可以提供有关犯罪环境的信息。其中一组设备是健身追踪器，它可以保存诸如行走步数等数据。相应地，分析师可以看到活动、例程和不一致性。我们检查了三种不同的常见健身追踪器，并开发了一种工具，以标准化和法医合理的方式分析它们。为了收集数据，我们分析了蓝牙通信、手机数据和互联网通信。我们的工具可以自动分析不同的来源，并随后在自托管的web应用程序上呈现结果。它是开源的，易于扩展，因此开发人员可以实现新的扩展来支持三个以上的分析跟踪器。
papers.title_zh: 如何通过取证方法获取和分析健身追踪器的数据？

papers.title: Typosquatting and Combosquatting Attacks on the Python Ecosystem
papers.authors: Duc Ly Vu, Ivan Pashchenko, Fabio Massacci, Henrik Plate, Antonino Sabetta
papers.abstract: Limited automated controls integrated into the Python Package Index (PyPI) package uploading process make PyPI an attractive target for attackers to trick developers into using malicious packages. Several times this goal has been achieved via the combosquatting and typosquatting attacks when attackers give malicious packages similar names to already existing legitimate ones. In this paper, we study the attacks, identify potential attack targets, and propose an approach to identify combosquatting and typosquatting package names automatically. The approach might serve as a basis for an automated system that ensures the security of the packages uploaded and distributed via PyPI.
papers.abstract_zh: 集成到Python包索引(PyPI)包上传过程中的有限自动控制使PyPI成为攻击者诱骗开发人员使用恶意包的诱人目标。当攻击者给恶意软件包起一个与已经存在的合法软件包相似的名字时，这个目标已经多次通过组合域名和域名仿冒攻击实现。在本文中，我们研究了这些攻击，识别了潜在的攻击目标，并提出了一种自动识别组合域名和仿冒域名的方法。这种方法可以作为自动化系统的基础，确保通过PyPI上传和分发的包的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 对Python生态系统的域名仿冒和组合仿冒攻击

papers.title: Are You a Favorite Target For Cryptojacking? A Case-Control Study On The Cryptojacking Ecosystem
papers.authors: Giorgio Di Tizio, Chan Nam Ngo
papers.abstract: Illicitly hijacking visitors’ computational resources for mining cryptocurrency via compromised websites is a consolidated activity.Previous works mainly focused on large-scale analysis of the cryptojacking ecosystem, technical means to detect browser-based mining as well as economic incentives of cryptojacking. So far, no one has studied if certain technical characteristics of a website can increase (decrease) the likelihood of being compromised for cryptojacking campaigns.In this paper, we propose to address this unanswered question by conducting a case-control study with cryptojacking websites obtained crawling the web using Minesweeper. Our preliminary analysis shows some association for certain website characteristics, however, the results obtained are not statistically significant. Thus, more data must be collected and further analysis must be conducted to obtain a better insight into the impact of these relations.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过受损网站非法劫持访问者的计算资源以挖掘加密货币是一种整合活动。先前的工作主要集中在对密码劫持生态系统的大规模分析、检测基于浏览器的挖掘的技术手段以及密码劫持的经济激励。到目前为止，还没有人研究过网站的某些技术特征是否会增加(减少)被黑客攻击的可能性。在本文中，我们建议通过对使用“扫雷舰”抓取网页获得的密码劫持网站进行病例对照研究来解决这个未回答的问题。我们的初步分析显示了某些网站特征的一些关联，然而，所获得的结果在统计上并不显著。因此，必须收集更多的数据，并进行进一步的分析，以更好地了解这些关系的影响。
papers.title_zh: 你是密码劫持的首选目标吗？隐顶生态系统的病例对照研究

papers.title: Preface on the 5th International Workshop on Traffic Measurements for Cybersecurity
papers.authors: Maciej Korczynski, Wojciech Mazurczyk, Pedro Casas
papers.abstract: The International Workshop on Traffic Measurements for Cybersecurity (WTMC 2020) planned its 5th edition in Genova, Italy, on June 16, 2020. However, due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the IEEE European Symposium on Security and Privacy 2020 conference and its workshops have been first rescheduled to September 7-11, 2020, and then switched to an all-digital conference format. Thus, WTMC finally took place on September 7, 2020, as a virtual event.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络安全流量测量国际研讨会(WTMC 2020)计划于2020年6月16日在热那亚举行第五届会议。然而，由于新冠肺炎疫情，IEEE欧洲安全和隐私研讨会2020会议及其研讨会首先被重新安排到2020年9月7日至11日，然后切换到全数字会议形式。因此，WTMC终于在2020年9月7日作为一个虚拟事件发生了。
papers.title_zh: 第五届网络安全流量测量国际研讨会前言

papers.title: Discovering HTTPSified Phishing Websites Using the TLS Certificates Footprints
papers.authors: Yuji Sakurai, Takuya Watanabe, Tetsuya Okuda, Mitsuaki Akiyama, Tatsuya Mori
papers.abstract: With the recent rise of HTTPS adoption on the Web, attackers have begun "HTTPSifying" phishing websites. HTTPSifying a phishing website has the advantage of making the website appear legitimate and evading conventional detection methods that leverage URLs or web contents in the network. Further, adopting HTTPS could also contribute to generating intrinsic footprints and provide defenders with a great opportunity to monitor and detect websites, including phishing sites, as they would need to obtain a public-key certificate issued for the preparation of the websites. The potential benefits of certificate-based detection include (1) the comprehensive monitoring of all HTTPSified websites by using certificates immediately after their issuance, even if the attacker utilizes dynamic DNS (DDNS) or hosting services; this could be overlooked with the conventional domain-registration-based approaches; and (2) to detect phishing websites before they are published on the Internet. Accordingly, we address the following research question: How can we make use of the footprints of TLS certificates to defend against phishing attacks? For this, we collected a large set of TLS certificates corresponding to phishing websites from Certificate Transparency (CT) logs and extensively analyzed these TLS certificates. We demonstrated that a template of common names, which are equivalent to the fully qualified domain names, obtained through the clustering analysis of the certificates can be used for the following promising applications: (1) The discovery of previously unknown phishing websites with low false positives and (2) understanding the infrastructure used to generate the phishing websites. We use our findings on the abuse of free certificate authorities (CAs) for operating HTTPSified phishing websites to discuss possible solutions against such abuse and provide a recommendation to the CAs.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着最近HTTPS在Web上的应用越来越多，攻击者已经开始对钓鱼网站进行“http封装”。将网络钓鱼网站http化的优势在于使网站看起来合法，并规避利用网络中的URL或网页内容的传统检测方法。此外，采用HTTPS还有助于生成固有足迹，并为维权者提供一个监测和发现网站(包括钓鱼网站)的绝佳机会，因为他们需要获得为准备网站而颁发的公钥证书。基于证书的检测的潜在好处包括:( 1)通过在证书发布后立即使用证书来全面监控所有HTTPSified网站，即使攻击者利用动态DNS (DDNS)或托管服务；传统的基于域名注册的方法可能会忽略这一点；以及(2)在网络钓鱼网站发布到互联网之前检测它们。因此，我们提出了以下研究问题:我们如何利用TLS证书的足迹来防御网络钓鱼攻击？为此，我们从证书透明度(CT)日志中收集了大量与钓鱼网站相对应的TLS证书，并对这些TLS证书进行了广泛的分析。我们证明了通过证书的聚类分析获得的等同于完全合格域名的通用名模板可以用于以下有前途的应用:(1)发现具有低误报率的先前未知的网络钓鱼网站，以及(2)理解用于生成网络钓鱼网站的基础设施。我们使用我们关于滥用免费证书颁发机构(CAs)来操作HTTPSified钓鱼网站的研究结果来讨论针对此类滥用的可能解决方案，并向CAs提供建议。
papers.title_zh: 使用TLS证书足迹发现HTTPSified钓鱼网站

papers.title: Feasibility of Large-Scale Vulnerability Notifications after GDPR
papers.authors: Wissem Soussi, Maciej Korczynski, Sourena Maroofi, Andrzej Duda
papers.abstract: In this paper, we consider the problem of effective notifications of domain abuse or vulnerabilities to the domain owners, administrators, or webmasters. We have developed a scanner to test whether selected email aliases specified in RFC 2142 are correctly configured and whether notifications can be successfully delivered. We also test the reachability of email addresses collected from the DNS Start of Authority (SOA) records. Based on a measurement campaign of a large number of domains compared to the previous studies (4,602,907 domains), we show that domains are more reachable through SOA contacts. We find that the country-code TLD names are more reachable compared to the new gTLD names. We have also observed that the most used generic email alias is abuse (67.95%). Using regression analysis, we show the relationship between the reachability of email addresses and the fact that names are hosted on large shared platforms or have a significant value. Our results confirm that direct notification channels are currently not scalable, so we propose a scheme that preserves user privacy in compliance with GDPR and supports large-scale vulnerability notifications.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们考虑的问题，有效的通知领域滥用或漏洞的领域业主，管理员，或网站管理员。我们开发了一个扫描器来测试RFC 2142中指定的选定电子邮件别名是否配置正确，以及通知是否可以成功发送。我们还测试了从DNS授权开始(SOA)记录中收集的电子邮件地址的可达性。与之前的研究(4，602，907个域)相比，基于大量域的测量活动，我们表明通过SOA联系更容易到达域。我们发现，与新gTLD名字相比，国家代码TLD名字更容易获得。我们还观察到，使用最多的通用电子邮件别名是滥用(67.95%)。使用回归分析，我们显示了电子邮件地址的可达性与域名托管在大型共享平台上或具有重要价值这一事实之间的关系。我们的结果证实了直接通知信道目前是不可扩展的，因此我们提出了一种方案，该方案遵照GDPR保护用户隐私并支持大规模漏洞通知。
papers.title_zh: GDPR之后大规模漏洞通知的可行性

papers.title: The Forgotten Side of DNS: Orphan and Abandoned Records
papers.authors: Raffaele Sommese, Mattijs Jonker, Roland van Rijswijk-Deij, Alberto Dainotti, Kimberly C. Claffy, Anna Sperotto
papers.abstract: DNS zone administration is a complex task involving manual work and several entities and can therefore result in misconfigurations. Orphan records are one of these misconfigurations, in which a glue record for a delegation that does not exist anymore is forgotten in the zone file. Orphan records are a security hazard to third-party domains that have these records in their delegation, as an attacker may easily hijack such domains by registering the domain associated with the orphan. The goal of this paper is to quantify this misconfiguration, extending previous work by Kalafut et al., by identifying a new type of glue record misconfiguration – which we refer to as abandoned records – and by performing a broader characterization. Our results highlight how the situation has changed, not always for the better, compared to a decade-old study.
papers.abstract_zh: DNS区域管理是一项复杂的任务，涉及手动工作和多个实体，因此可能会导致配置错误。孤立记录就是这些错误配置中的一种，其中一个不再存在的委托的粘合记录被遗忘在区域文件中。孤立记录对委托中包含这些记录的第三方域来说是一种安全隐患，因为攻击者可以通过注册与孤立记录相关联的域来轻松劫持此类域。本文的目标是量化这种错误配置，扩展Kalafut等人之前的工作，通过识别一种新类型的胶合记录错误配置(我们称之为废弃记录)并执行更广泛的表征。与十年前的研究相比，我们的结果强调了情况是如何变化的，并不总是变得更好。
papers.title_zh: DNS被遗忘的一面:孤儿和被遗弃的记录

papers.title: TXTing 101: Finding Security Issues in the Long Tail of DNS TXT Records
papers.authors: Olivier van der Toorn, Roland van Rijswijk-Deij, Tobias Fiebig, Martina Lindorfer, Anna Sperotto
papers.abstract: The DNS TXT resource record is the one with the most flexibility for its contents, as it is a largely unstructured. Although it might be the ideal basis for storing any form of text-based information, it also poses a security threat, as TXT records can also be used for malicious and unintended practices. Yet, TXT records are often overlooked in security research. In this paper, we present the first structured study of the uses of TXT records, with a specific focus on security implications. We are able to classify over 99.54% of all TXT records in our dataset, finding security issues including accidentally published private keys and exploit delivery attempts. We also report on our lessons learned during our large-scale, systematic analysis of TXT records.
papers.abstract_zh: DNS TXT资源记录的内容最灵活，因为它基本上是非结构化的。尽管它可能是存储任何形式的基于文本的信息的理想基础，但它也带来了安全威胁，因为TXT记录也可能被用于恶意和非故意的行为。然而，在安全研究中，TXT记录经常被忽略。在本文中，我们提出了第一个关于TXT记录使用的结构化研究，特别关注安全问题。我们能够对数据集中超过99.54%的所有TXT记录进行分类，发现安全问题，包括意外发布的私钥和利用交付尝试。我们还报告了在对TXT记录进行大规模系统分析的过程中获得的经验教训。
papers.title_zh: TXTing 101:在DNS TXT记录的长尾中发现安全问题

papers.title: Into the DDoS maelstrom: a longitudinal study of a scrubbing service
papers.authors: Giovane C. M. Moura, Cristian Hesselman, Gerald Schaapman, Nick Boerman, Octavia de Weerdt
papers.abstract: Distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks are nowadays easy and cheap to carry out, and have become bigger and more frequent over the last years. Cloud-based scrubbers have emerged as a service which victims can hire on demand to fend off attacks. There are many industry players, but not much insights into their operations. This work unravels for the first time the inner workings of a DDoS scrubber — NaWas— a non-profit scrubber in the Netherlands. We analyze 1800+ DDoS attacks spanning over a period of 22 months, and show that while most attacks are not very large, they are still large enough to disrupt services and likely to disturb links. We estimate the collateral damage incurred by DDoS attacks, and demonstrate that the number of victims of is at least quadratically larger (IP2) than the targeted addresses. Last, by correlating attacks metadata with authoritative DNS traffic, we show that DDoS attacks leave fingerprints on DNS traffic, which, in turn can be used to detect DDoS attacks at early stages, even if attackers attempt to deceive DNS based detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击易于实施且成本低廉，并且在过去几年中变得越来越大、越来越频繁。基于云的擦洗器已经成为一种服务，受害者可以按需租用来抵御攻击。有许多行业参与者，但对他们的运营没有太多的见解。这项工作第一次揭示了荷兰一个非盈利的DDoS洗涤器NaWas的内部工作原理。我们分析了22个月内发生的1800多起DDoS攻击，结果显示，虽然大多数攻击的规模不是很大，但仍足以中断服务并可能干扰链接。我们估计了DDoS攻击造成的间接损失，并证明了受害者的数量至少是目标地址的二次方(IP2)。最后，通过将攻击元数据与权威DNS流量相关联，我们发现DDoS攻击会在DNS流量上留下指纹，这反过来可用于在早期阶段检测DDoS攻击，即使攻击者试图欺骗基于DNS的检测。
papers.title_zh: 进入DDoS漩涡:一项擦洗服务的纵向研究

papers.title: A Case of Identity: Detection of Suspicious IDN Homograph Domains Using Active DNS Measurements
papers.authors: Ramin Yazdani, Olivier van der Toorn, Anna Sperotto
papers.abstract: The possibility to include Unicode characters in domain names allows users to deal with domains in their regional languages. This is done by introducing Internationalized Domain Names (IDN). However, the visual similarity between different Unicode characters - called homoglyphs - is a potential security threat, as visually similar domain names are often used in phishing attacks. Timely detection of suspicious homograph domain names is an important step towards preventing sophisticated attacks, since this can prevent unaware users to access those homograph domains that actually carry malicious content. We therefore propose a structured approach to identify suspicious homograph domain names based not on use, but on characteristics of the domain name itself and its associated DNS records. To achieve this, we leverage the OpenINTEL active DNS measurement platform, which performs a daily snapshot of more than 65% of the DNS namespace. In this paper, we first extend the existing Unicode homoglyph tables (confusion tables). This allows us to detect on average 2.97 times homograph domains compared to existing tables. Our proactive detection of suspicious IDN homograph domains provides an early alert that would help both domain owners as well as security researchers in preventing IDN homograph abuse.
papers.abstract_zh: 在域名中包含Unicode字符的可能性允许用户以他们的地区语言处理域名。这是通过引入国际化域名(IDN)来实现的。然而，不同Unicode字符之间的视觉相似性(称为同形异义字符)是一个潜在的安全威胁，因为视觉相似的域名经常被用于网络钓鱼攻击。及时检测可疑的同形异义域名是防止复杂攻击的重要一步，因为这可以防止不知情的用户访问那些实际携带恶意内容的同形异义域名。因此，我们提出了一种结构化的方法来识别可疑的同形异义域名，不是基于使用，而是基于域名本身的特征及其相关的DNS记录。为了实现这一目标，我们利用了OpenINTEL主动DNS测量平台，该平台对超过65%的DNS名称空间执行每日快照。在本文中，我们首先扩展了现有的Unicode同形表(混淆表)。与现有的表相比，这允许我们平均检测2.97倍的单应域。我们对可疑IDN同形异义词域的主动检测提供了早期警报，这将有助于域名所有者和安全研究人员防止IDN同形异义词滥用。
papers.title_zh: 身份案例:使用主动DNS测量检测可疑IDN同形域

papers.title: Forensic Analysis of Network Attacks: Restructuring Security Events as Graphs and Identifying Strongly Connected Sub-graphs
papers.authors: Laetitia Leichtnam, Eric Totel, Nicolas Prigent, Ludovic Mé
papers.abstract: When analyzing the security of activities in a highly distributed system, an analyst faces a huge number of events, mainly coming from network supervision mechanisms. To analyze this huge amount of information, the analyst often starts from an indicator of compromise (IoC), an observable that suggests that a compromise may have occurred, and looks for the information related to this IoC as it could help to explain the related security incident. This approach is referred to as forensic analysis.In this paper, we propose an approach to treat automatically network events to provide the analyst with a new way to determine the subset of information related to a given IoC. This approach relies firstly on the generation of graphs between so-called "Security Objects" that are built from the logged network events, and secondly on the automatic processing of these graphs based on graphs communities analysis.
papers.abstract_zh: 当分析高度分布式系统中活动的安全性时，分析师面临大量事件，这些事件主要来自网络监管机制。为了分析如此大量的信息，分析师通常从危害指标(IoC)开始，这是一种表明危害可能已经发生的可观察指标，并寻找与此IoC相关的信息，因为它可能有助于解释相关的安全事件。这种方法被称为法医分析。在本文中，我们提出了一种自动处理网络事件的方法，为分析人员提供了一种新的方法来确定与给定IoC相关的信息子集。该方法首先依赖于根据记录的网络事件构建的所谓“安全对象”之间的图的生成，其次依赖于基于图社区分析的这些图的自动处理。
papers.title_zh: 网络攻击的取证分析:将安全事件重构为图并识别强连通子图

papers.title: WhatsThat? On the Usage of Hierarchical Clustering for Unsupervised Detection & Interpretation of Network Attacks
papers.authors: Pavol Mulinka, Kensuke Fukuda, Pedro Casas, Lukas Kencl
papers.abstract: The automatic detection and interpretation of network attacks through machine learning is a well-known problem, for which no general solution is available. Super-vised learning and anomaly detection approaches require prior knowledge on the system under analysis, either in the form of normal operation profiles, or on the specific attacks to detect. As a consequence, both approaches have clear limitations when it comes to detecting, and in particular interpreting, previously unseen attacks and anomalies.In this paper we present WhatsThat, a novel approach to unsupervised network anomaly detection, which can both detect and interpret anomalous behaviors in a completely black-box manner, without relying on any ground-truth on the system under analysis. WhatsThat relies on hierarchical–clustering techniques to discover and characterize anomalous patterns present in nested or hierarchically structured multi–dimensional data, which is common in network traffic – e.g., due to multi–layer protocols. The solution uses unsupervised cluster validity metrics to automatically explore the data structure, and builds on automatic identification of relevant features to provide meaningful descriptions for the detected patterns. We showcase WhatsThat in the detection and interpretation of network attacks hidden in real, large-scale network traffic collected at a transit Internet backbone network. While WhatsThat is mainly tailored for unsupervised anomaly detection and interpretation, it can also be applied to the unsupervised analysis of any kind of nested or hierarchically structured multi-dimensional data, showing the potential of hierarchical clustering for general unsupervised data analysis.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过机器学习自动检测和解释网络攻击是一个众所周知的问题，对此没有通用的解决方案。监督学习和异常检测方法需要关于被分析系统的先验知识，或者以正常操作简档的形式，或者关于要检测的特定攻击。因此，这两种方法在检测(尤其是解释)以前未发现的攻击和异常时都有明显的局限性。本文提出了一种新的无监督网络异常检测方法WhatsThat，它能够以完全黑盒的方式检测和解释异常行为，而不依赖于被分析系统的任何基础事实。依靠分层聚类技术来发现和表征嵌套或分层结构多维数据中存在的异常模式，这在网络流量中很常见，例如，由于多层协议。该解决方案使用无监督的聚类有效性度量来自动探索数据结构，并基于相关特征的自动识别来为检测到的模式提供有意义的描述。我们展示了在检测和解释隐藏在真实的大规模网络流量中的网络攻击时所做的工作，这些流量是在一个公共互联网主干网上收集的。虽然whats主要适用于无监督异常检测和解释，但它也可以应用于任何类型的嵌套或分层结构多维数据的无监督分析，这表明了分层聚类对于一般无监督数据分析的潜力。
papers.title_zh: 那是什么？层次聚类在网络攻击的无监督检测和解释中的应用

papers.title: Experimental study of performance and vulnerabilities of IEC 61850 process bus communications on HSR networks
papers.authors: Stéphane Mocanu, Jean-Marc Thiriet
papers.abstract: Modern power-network communications are based on the IEC 61850 series standards. In this paper we investigate the real-time performance, the vulnerabilities and the attack scenarios on the sensor level communication networks, more precisely on the Sampled Measured Value (SMV) protocol. There are two main contributions of our work. First, we evaluate statistically the measured real-time performance of the communication network. The second contribution is the description, implementation and experimental validation of the attacks on SMV protocol targeting electrical protection functions.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代电力网络通信基于IEC 61850系列标准。本文研究了传感器级通信网络的实时性、脆弱性和攻击场景，更准确地说是采样测量值(SMV)协议。我们的工作有两个主要贡献。首先，我们对通信网络的测量实时性能进行统计评估。第二个贡献是对SMV协议攻击的描述、实现和实验验证。
papers.title_zh: HSR网络上IEC 61850过程总线通信性能和脆弱性的实验研究

papers.title: Network Fingerprinting: Routers under Attack
papers.authors: Emeline Marechal, Benoit Donnet
papers.abstract: Nowadays, simple tools such as traceroute can be used by attackers to acquire topology knowledge remotely. Worse still, attackers can use a lightweight fingerprinting technique, based on traceroute and ping, to retrieve the routers brand, and use that knowledge to launch targeted attacks.In this paper, we show that the hardware ecosystem of network operators can greatly vary from one to another, with all potential security implications it brings. Indeed, depending on the autonomous system (AS), not all brands play the same role in terms of network connectivity. An attacker could find an interest in targeting a specific hardware vendor in a particular AS, if known defects are present in this hardware, and if the AS relies heavily on it for forwarding its traffic.
papers.abstract_zh: 现在，攻击者可以使用简单的工具(如traceroute)远程获取拓扑知识。更糟糕的是，攻击者可以使用基于traceroute和ping的轻量级指纹识别技术来检索路由器品牌，并使用该知识发起有针对性的攻击。在本文中，我们展示了网络运营商的硬件生态系统可能会因不同而有很大差异，并带来所有潜在的安全隐患。事实上，根据自治系统(AS)的不同，在网络连接方面，并非所有品牌都扮演相同的角色。如果特定AS中的特定硬件供应商存在已知缺陷，并且AS严重依赖该硬件来转发其流量，则攻击者可能会对该特定硬件供应商感兴趣。
papers.title_zh: 网络指纹:受到攻击的路由器

papers.title: Defensive Programming for Smart Home Cybersecurity
papers.authors: Maria Teresa Rossi, Renan Greca, Ludovico Iovino, Giorgio Giacinto, Antonia Bertolino
papers.abstract: Cybersecurity has become a real issue in the development of smart services in the smart home domain, which is formed by a System of Systems where several smart objects are connected to each other and to the Internet. However, these connections expose the devices to possible attackers inside or outside the network, who may exploit software or hardware vulnerabilities to achieve malicious goals. To alleviate this issue, the use of defensive programming assertions can allow the behaviour of smart objects to be monitored and checked for correctness. Furthermore, open source intelligence tools, such as the Shodan search engine, provide features that could be leveraged to detect potential vulnerabilities. In this paper, we propose an approach for the monitoring of Systems of Systems in the smart home domain exploiting the defensive programming paradigm in combination with Shodan APIs.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络安全已经成为智能家庭领域中智能服务开发的真正问题，智能家庭领域由多个系统的系统形成，其中几个智能对象相互连接并连接到互联网。然而，这些连接将设备暴露给网络内部或外部的可能攻击者，这些攻击者可能利用软件或硬件漏洞来实现恶意目标。为了缓解这个问题，使用防御性编程断言可以允许监控智能对象的行为并检查其正确性。此外，Shodan搜索引擎等开源情报工具提供了可用于检测潜在漏洞的功能。在本文中，我们提出了一种在智能家居领域中利用防御性编程范例结合Shodan APIs来监控系统的方法。
papers.title_zh: 智能家居网络安全的防御性编程

papers.title: Resilient Self-Debugging Software Protection
papers.authors: Bert Abrath, Bart Coppens, Ilja Nevolin, Bjorn De Sutter
papers.abstract: Debuggers are a popular reverse engineering and tampering tool. Self-debugging is an effective technique for applications to defend themselves against hostile debuggers. In penetration tests on state-of-the-art self-debugging, we observed several opportunities through which it could be attacked, however. We therefore improved upon the existing technique, making it more resilient by introducing reciprocal debugging and making the transfers of control between protected application and self-debugger more stealthy. This paper presents the improved self-debugging design, and details our research efforts into realizing reciprocal debugging. In our evaluation we show that the improved design is significantly harder for attackers to defeat.
papers.abstract_zh: 调试器是一种流行的逆向工程和篡改工具。自调试是应用程序抵御恶意调试器的一种有效技术。然而，在对最先进的自调试技术的渗透测试中，我们观察到了一些攻击它的机会。因此，我们改进了现有的技术，通过引入交互调试使其更具弹性，并使受保护的应用程序和自调试器之间的控制转移更加隐蔽。本文提出了改进的自调试设计，并详细介绍了我们在实现交互调试方面的研究工作。在我们的评估中，我们发现改进后的设计对于攻击者来说更加难以攻破。
papers.title_zh: 弹性自调试软件保护

papers.title: Abusing Android Runtime for Application Obfuscation
papers.authors: Pierre Graux, Jean-François Lalande, Pierre Wilke, Valérie Viet Triem Tong
papers.abstract: Studying Android obfuscation techniques is an essential task for understanding and analyzing malicious applications. Obfuscation techniques have already been extensively studied for market applications but never for precompiled applications used in smartphone firmwares. In this paper, we describe two new obfuscation techniques that take advantage of the duality between assembly and Dalvik bytecode and, as far as we know, have never been described before. We also propose detection methods for these obfuscation techniques. We apply them to vendor firmwares and market applications in order to evaluate their usage in the wild. We found that even if they do not seem to be already used in the wild, they are fully practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 研究Android混淆技术是理解和分析恶意应用程序的基本任务。混淆技术已经在市场应用中得到了广泛的研究，但从未用于智能手机固件中的预编译应用。在本文中，我们描述了两种新的混淆技术，这两种技术利用了汇编和Dalvik字节码之间的二元性，据我们所知，这两种技术以前从未被描述过。我们还提出了这些混淆技术的检测方法。我们将它们应用于供应商固件和市场应用程序，以评估它们在野外的使用情况。我们发现，即使它们似乎没有在野外使用过，它们也是完全实用的。
papers.title_zh: 滥用Android运行时进行应用混淆

papers.title: Revealing Similarities in Android Malware by Dissecting their Methods
papers.authors: Michele Pasetto, Niccolò Marastoni, Mila Dalla Preda
papers.abstract: One of the most challenging problems in the fight against Android malware is finding a way to classify them according to their behavior, in order to be able to utilize previously gathered knowledge in analysis and prevention.In this paper we introduce a novel technique that discovers similarities between Android malware samples by comparing fragments of executed traces (strands) generated from their most suspect methods. This way we can accurately pinpoint which (possibly) malicious behaviors are shared between these different samples, allowing for easier analysis and classification.We implement this approach in a tool, StrAndroid, that we evaluate on a few dataset of malware and ransomware samples, comparing its results to an existing similarity tool.
papers.abstract_zh: 在对抗Android恶意软件的斗争中，最具挑战性的问题之一是找到一种根据它们的行为对它们进行分类的方法，以便能够在分析和预防中利用以前收集的知识。在本文中，我们介绍了一种新的技术，通过比较从最可疑的方法生成的已执行跟踪(链)的片段来发现Android恶意软件样本之间的相似性。通过这种方式，我们可以准确地查明这些不同样本之间共享了哪些(可能的)恶意行为，从而更容易进行分析和分类。我们在工具StrAndroid中实现了这种方法，我们在几个恶意软件和勒索软件样本数据集上进行评估，将其结果与现有的相似性工具进行比较。
papers.title_zh: 通过剖析Android恶意软件的方法揭示其相似性

papers.title: Towards Formal Verification of Program Obfuscation
papers.authors: Weiyun Lu, Bahman Sistany, Amy P. Felty, Philip J. Scott
papers.abstract: Code obfuscation involves transforming a program to a new version that performs the same computation but hides the functionality of the original code. An important property of such a transformation is that it preserves the behavior of the original program. In this paper, we lay the foundation for studying and reasoning about code obfuscating transformations, and show how the preservation of certain behaviours may be formally verified. To this end, we apply techniques of formal specification and verification using the Coq Proof Assistant. We use and extend an existing encoding of a simple imperative language in Coq along with an encoding of Hoare logic for reasoning about this language. We formulate what it means for a program’s semantics to be preserved by an obfuscating transformation, and give formal machine-checked proofs that these behaviours or properties hold. We also define a lower-level block-structured language which is "wrapped around" our imperative language, allowing us to model certain flattening transformations and treat blocks of codes as objects in their own right.
papers.abstract_zh: 代码混淆涉及将程序转换为执行相同计算但隐藏原始代码功能的新版本。这种转换的一个重要特性是它保留了原始程序的行为。在本文中，我们为研究和推理代码混淆转换奠定了基础，并展示了如何对某些行为的保持性进行形式化验证。为此，我们使用Coq Proof Assistant应用形式规范和验证技术。我们使用并扩展了Coq中一种简单命令式语言的现有编码，以及用于推理这种语言的Hoare逻辑编码。我们阐述了程序的语义被模糊变换保留意味着什么，并给出了这些行为或属性成立的正式的机器检查证明。我们还定义了一种低级的块结构语言，它“包裹”着我们的命令式语言，允许我们对某些扁平化转换进行建模，并将代码块视为具有自身权利的对象。
papers.title_zh: 面向程序混淆的形式化验证

papers.title: SecWeb 2020 Preface
papers.authors: Stefano Calzavara, Ben Stock
papers.abstract: The Web has become the key access point to a plethora of security-sensitive services, which we use on a daily basis, yet it was not designed with security or privacy in mind. Many key mechanisms we typically rely on today for critical functionality were arguably not designed for security (such as cookies for authentication purposes) and numerous mechanisms have been piecemeal retrofitted to the Web to add security to it. These mechanisms often represent sub-optimal solutions, since they are primarily designed as lightweight security patches intended to not cause breakage to existing web applications. In this workshop, we want to move away from augmenting the Web with Se curity and rather design Se curity for the Web.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络已经成为我们日常使用的大量安全敏感服务的关键访问点，但它在设计时并没有考虑安全性或隐私。我们今天通常依赖于关键功能的许多关键机制可以说并不是为安全性而设计的(例如用于身份验证目的的cookies ),许多机制已经被逐段地改造到Web上以增加安全性。这些机制通常代表次优的解决方案，因为它们主要被设计为轻量级的安全补丁，目的是不破坏现有的web应用程序。在本次研讨会中，我们希望从增强Web的安全性转移到为Web设计安全性。
papers.title_zh: SecWeb 2020前言

papers.title: No Phishing With the Wrong Bait: Reducing the Phishing Risk by Address Separation
papers.authors: Vincent Drury, Ulrike Meyer
papers.abstract: Email-based phishing is still a widespread problem, that affects many users worldwide. Although many aspects of phishing have been extensively studied in the past, they mainly focus on the execution and prevention of different types of phishing and do not consider the process how attackers collect the contact information of potential victims. In this paper, we analyze the collection process of email addresses in more detail. Based on the results of this analysis, we propose email address separation as a way for users to detect phishing emails, and reason about its effectiveness against several typical types of phishing attacks. We find, that email address separation has the potential to greatly reduce the perceived authenticity of general phishing emails, that target a large amount of users, e.g., by impersonating a popular service and spreading malware or links to phishing websites. It is, however, not likely to prevent more sophisticated phishing attacks, that do not depend on the impersonation of a previously known organization or entity. Our results motivate further studies to analyze the usability and applicability of the proposed method, and to determine, whether address separation has additional positive effects on users’ phishing awareness or automated phishing detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于电子邮件的网络钓鱼仍然是一个普遍存在的问题，影响着全球的许多用户。尽管过去已经广泛研究了网络钓鱼的许多方面，但是它们主要集中在不同类型的网络钓鱼的执行和预防上，而没有考虑攻击者如何收集潜在受害者的联系信息的过程。在本文中，我们更详细地分析了电子邮件地址的收集过程。基于这一分析的结果，我们提出了电子邮件地址分离作为用户检测钓鱼电子邮件的一种方法，并论证了它对几种典型类型的钓鱼攻击的有效性。我们发现，电子邮件地址分离有可能极大地降低一般网络钓鱼电子邮件的感知真实性，这些电子邮件以大量用户为目标，例如，通过冒充流行服务和传播恶意软件或网络钓鱼网站的链接。然而，它不可能防止更复杂的网络钓鱼攻击，这些攻击不依赖于先前已知的组织或实体的模仿。我们的结果激发了进一步的研究，以分析所提出的方法的可用性和适用性，并确定地址分离是否对用户的网络钓鱼意识或自动网络钓鱼检测有额外的积极影响。
papers.title_zh: 没有使用错误诱饵的网络钓鱼:通过地址分离降低网络钓鱼风险

papers.title: Hardening Firefox against Injection Attacks
papers.authors: Christoph Kerschbaumer, Tom Ritter, Frederik Braun
papers.abstract: Web browsers display content in the form of HTML, CSS and JavaScript retrieved from the world wide web. The loaded content is subject to the web security model and considered untrusted and potentially malicious. To complicate security matters, Firefox uses the same technologies to render its user interface as it does to render untrusted web content which blurs the distinction between the two privilege levels.Getting interactions between the two correct turns out to be complicated and has led to numerous real-world security vulnerabilities. We study those vulnerabilities to discover common threats and explain how we address them systematically to harden Firefox.
papers.abstract_zh: Web浏览器以HTML、CSS和JavaScript的形式显示从万维网检索的内容。加载的内容受web安全模型的约束，被认为是不可信的和潜在的恶意内容。让安全问题变得复杂的是，Firefox使用相同的技术来呈现其用户界面，就像它呈现不可信的web内容一样，这模糊了两种权限级别之间的区别。正确处理这两者之间的交互被证明是复杂的，并导致了许多现实世界中的安全漏洞。我们研究这些漏洞以发现常见的威胁，并解释我们如何系统地解决它们以强化Firefox。
papers.title_zh: 增强Firefox抵御注入攻击的能力

papers.title: User Access Privacy in OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect
papers.authors: Wanpeng Li, Chris J. Mitchell
papers.abstract: Currently widely used federated login (single sign-on) systems, notably those based on OAuth 2.0, offer very little privacy for the user, and as a result the identity provider (e.g. Google or Facebook) can learn a great deal about user web behaviour, in particular which sites they access. This is clearly not desirable for privacy reasons, and in particular for privacy-conscious users who wish to minimise the information about web access behaviour that they reveal to third party organisations. In this paper we give a systematic analysis of the user access privacy properties of OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect systems, and in doing so describe how simple it is for an identity provider to track user accesses. We also propose possible ways in which these privacy issues could to some extent be mitigated, although we conclude that to make the protocols truly privacy-respecting requires significant changes to the way in which they operate. In particular, it seems impossible to develop simple browser-based mitigations without modifying the protocol behaviour. We also briefly examine parallel research by Hammann et al., who have proposed a means of improving the privacy properties of OpenID Connect.
papers.abstract_zh: 目前广泛使用的联合登录(单点登录)系统，特别是那些基于OAuth 2.0的系统，为用户提供的隐私非常少，因此身份提供商(例如谷歌或脸书)可以了解大量关于用户网络行为的信息，特别是他们访问了哪些网站。出于隐私原因，这显然是不可取的，特别是对于希望将他们向第三方机构透露的关于网络访问行为的信息最小化的注重隐私的用户。在本文中，我们对OAuth 2.0和OpenID Connect系统的用户访问隐私属性进行了系统分析，并在此过程中描述了身份提供商跟踪用户访问是多么简单。我们还提出了在某种程度上缓解这些隐私问题的可能方法，尽管我们得出结论，要使协议真正尊重隐私，需要对其操作方式进行重大改变。特别是，如果不修改协议行为，开发简单的基于浏览器的缓解措施似乎是不可能的。我们还简要考察了Hammann等人的平行研究，他们提出了一种改进OpenID Connect的隐私属性的方法。
papers.title_zh: OAuth 2.0和OpenID Connect中的用户访问隐私

papers.title: Oh, the Places You'll Go! Finding Our Way Back from the Web Platform's Ill-conceived Jaunts
papers.authors: Artur Janc, Mike West
papers.abstract: In its transition from the original concept of a mesh of hypertext documents [2] into the world’s most successful application ecosystem, the open web platform [3] has steadily, iteratively, accumulated a large number of unsafe features and behaviors. These features lead to vulnerabilities in web applications, enable attacks on web users, and often add significant complexity to developers’ mental models of the web and to user-agent implementations.In this paper, we start from a scattered list of concrete grievances about the web platform based on informal discussions among browser– and web security engineers. After reviewing the details of these issues, we work towards a model of the root causes of the problems, categorizing them based on the type of risk they introduce to the platform. We then identify possible solutions for each class of issues, dividing them by the most effective approach to address it.In the end, we arrive at a general blueprint for backing out of these dead ends. We propose a three-pronged approach which includes changing web browser defaults, creating a slew of features for web authors to opt out of dangerous behaviors, and adding new security primitives. We then show how this approach can be practically applied to address each of the individual problems, providing a conceptual framework for solving unsafe legacy web platform behaviors.
papers.abstract_zh: 在从超文本文档网格的原始概念[2]转变为世界上最成功的应用程序生态系统的过程中，开放web平台[3]已经稳定地、迭代地积累了大量不安全的特性和行为。这些特性导致了web应用程序中的漏洞，使得对web用户的攻击成为可能，并且通常会给开发人员的web心理模型和用户代理实现增加很大的复杂性。在本文中，我们基于浏览器和web安全工程师之间的非正式讨论，从一个关于web平台的具体不满的分散列表开始。在回顾了这些问题的细节之后，我们朝着问题的根本原因的模型努力，根据它们给平台带来的风险类型对它们进行分类。然后，我们为每一类问题确定可能的解决方案，按照解决问题的最有效方法对它们进行分类。最后，我们得出了一个走出这些死胡同的总体蓝图。我们提出了一个三管齐下的方法，包括改变web浏览器的默认设置，为web作者创建一系列功能来选择退出危险行为，以及添加新的安全原语。然后，我们展示了这种方法如何实际应用于解决每个单独的问题，为解决不安全的遗留web平台行为提供了一个概念框架。
papers.title_zh: 哦，你要去的地方！从网络平台的拙劣尝试中找到我们的归途

papers.title: Preface of the 2nd Workshop on the Security of Software/Hardware Interfaces (SILM 2020)
papers.authors: Guillaume Hiet, Frédéric Tronel, Jean-Louis Lanet
papers.abstract: Message from the SILM 2020 organizers
papers.abstract_zh: 来自SILM 2020组织者的信息
papers.title_zh: 第二届软硬件接口安全研讨会(SILM 2020)前言

papers.title: Reverse Engineering the Stream Prefetcher for Profit
papers.authors: Aditya Rohan, Biswabandan Panda, Prakhar Agarwal
papers.abstract: Micro-architectural attacks exploit timing channels at different micro-architecture units. Some of the micro-architecture units like cache automatically provide the timing difference (the difference between a hit and a miss). However, there are other units that are not documented, and their influence on the timing difference is not fully understood. One such micro-architecture unit is an L2 hardware prefetcher named Streamer. In this paper, we reverse-engineer the Stream prefetcher, which is commercially available in the Intel machines. We perform a set of experiments and provide our observations and insights. Further, we use these observations to construct a cross-thread covert channel using the Stream prefetcher, with an accuracy of 91.3% and a bandwidth of 54.44 KBps.
papers.abstract_zh: 微体系结构攻击利用不同微体系结构单元的定时信道。一些微体系结构单元，如高速缓存，会自动提供定时差异(命中和未命中之间的差异)。但是，还有其他单位没有记录下来，它们对时差的影响也没有完全弄清楚。一个这样的微架构单元是名为Streamer的L2硬件预取器。在本文中，我们逆向工程的流预取，这是商业上可用的英特尔机器。我们进行了一系列实验，并提供了我们的观察和见解。此外，我们使用这些观察结果构建了一个使用流预取器的跨线程隐蔽通道，准确率为91.3%，带宽为54.44 KBps。
papers.title_zh: 逆向工程的流偏好为利润

papers.title: CHERI Macaroons: Efficient, host-based access control for cyber-physical systems
papers.authors: Michael Dodson, Alastair R. Beresford, Alexander Richardson, Jessica Clarke, Robert N. M. Watson
papers.abstract: Cyber-Physical Systems (CPS) often rely on network boundary defence as a primary means of access control; therefore, the compromise of one device threatens the security of all devices within the boundary. Resource and real-time constraints, tight hardware/software coupling, and decades-long service lifetimes complicate efforts for more robust, host-based access control mechanisms. Distributed capability systems provide opportunities for restoring access control to resource-owning devices; however, such a protection model requires a capability-based architecture for CPS devices as well as task compartmentalisation to be effective.This paper demonstrates hardware enforcement of network bearer tokens using an efficient translation between CHERI (Capability Hardware Enhanced RISC Instructions) architectural capabilities and Macaroon network tokens. While this method appears to generalise to any network-based access control problem, we specifically consider CPS, as our method is well-suited for controlling resources in the physical domain. We demonstrate the method in a distributed robotics application and in a hierarchical industrial control application, and discuss our plans to evaluate and extend the method.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络物理系统(CPS)通常依赖网络边界防御作为访问控制的主要手段；因此，一个设备的危害威胁到边界内所有设备的安全。资源和实时约束、紧密的硬件/软件耦合以及长达数十年的服务生命周期使得更加健壮的基于主机的访问控制机制的努力变得更加复杂。分布式能力系统为恢复对资源拥有设备的访问控制提供了机会；然而，这种保护模式需要CPS设备的基于功能的架构以及有效的任务划分。本文使用CHERI(能力硬件增强RISC指令)架构能力和Macaroon网络令牌之间的有效转换来演示网络承载令牌的硬件实施。虽然这种方法似乎适用于任何基于网络的访问控制问题，但我们特别考虑CPS，因为我们的方法非常适合控制物理域中的资源。我们在分布式机器人应用和分层工业控制应用中演示了该方法，并讨论了我们评估和扩展该方法的计划。
papers.title_zh: CHERI Macaroons:基于主机的高效网络物理系统访问控制

papers.title: NOP-Oriented Programming: Should we Care?
papers.authors: Pierre-Yves Péneau, Ludovic Claudepierre, Damien Hardy, Erven Rohou
papers.abstract: Many fault injection techniques have been proposed in the recent years to attack computing systems, as well as the corresponding countermeasures. Most of published attacks are limited to one or a few faults. We provide a theoretical analysis of instruction skip attacks to show how an attacker can modify an application behavior at run-time when thousands of instruction skips are possible. Our main result is that instruction skip is Turing-complete under our theoretical model while requiring the presence of only common instructions in the binary. As a consequence, we show that current software-based countermeasures are fragile. In addition, we release a modification of gem5 that implements a classical instruction skip fault model that we used for our experiments. We believe this kind of simulation tools are useful to help the community explore attacks and hardware and software countermeasures.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来已经提出了许多攻击计算系统的故障注入技术以及相应的对策。大多数已发表的攻击仅限于一个或几个错误。我们提供了对指令跳过攻击的理论分析，以展示当数千条指令可能跳过时，攻击者如何在运行时修改应用程序行为。我们的主要结果是，在我们的理论模型下，指令跳过是图灵完全的，同时要求二进制中只存在公共指令。因此，我们表明当前基于软件的对策是脆弱的。此外，我们发布了对gem5的修改，实现了我们在实验中使用的经典指令跳过故障模型。我们相信这种模拟工具有助于社区探索攻击和软硬件对策。
papers.title_zh: 面向NOP的编程:我们应该关心吗？

papers.title: REHAD: Using Low-Frequency Reconfigurable Hardware for Cache Side-Channel Attacks Detection
papers.authors: Yuxiao Mao, Vincent Migliore, Vincent Nicomette
papers.abstract: Cache side-channel attacks consist, for a malicious process, to infer the current state of the cache by measuring the time it takes to access the memory, and indirectly gain knowledge about other processes sharing this same physical cache. Because cache side-channel attacks leverage a hardware leakage without requiring any physical access to the devices, they represent very serious threats. Among the runtime detection techniques for cache side-channel attacks, hardware solutions are usually fine-grained and benefit from less performance overhead than software solutions. However, they are not flexible enough to suit the rapid evolution and appearance of software attacks. In this paper we describe REHAD, a novel attack detection architecture that uses reconfigurable hardware. More precisely, it includes a hardware detection module that can be reconfigured by means of a trusted software kernel, to adapt to the level of threats and to detect new attacks. This architecture also benefits from hardware parallelism to fill the frequency gap between reconfigurable hardware and core processor. REHAD has been integrated into the ORCA softcore RISCV on a FPGA and two common cache side-channel attacks have been successfully detected.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于恶意进程来说，高速缓存旁路攻击包括通过测量访问存储器所花费的时间来推断高速缓存的当前状态，并间接获得关于共享该相同物理高速缓存的其他进程的知识。因为高速缓存旁路攻击利用硬件泄漏而不需要对设备进行任何物理访问，所以它们代表非常严重的威胁。在针对缓存旁路攻击的运行时检测技术中，硬件解决方案通常是细粒度的，并且比软件解决方案受益于更少的性能开销。然而，它们不够灵活，无法适应软件攻击的快速发展和出现。在本文中，我们描述了REHAD，一种使用可重新配置硬件的新型攻击检测架构。更准确地说，它包括一个硬件检测模块，可以通过可信的软件内核重新配置，以适应威胁的级别并检测新的攻击。这种架构还受益于硬件并行性，以填补可重构硬件和核心处理器之间的频率差距。REHAD已经集成到FPGA上的ORCA软核RISCV中，并且已经成功检测到两种常见的高速缓存旁路攻击。
papers.title_zh: REHAD:使用低频可重构硬件检测缓存旁路攻击

papers.title: Nethammer: Inducing Rowhammer Faults through Network Requests
papers.authors: Moritz Lipp, Michael Schwarz, Lukas Raab, Lukas Lamster, Misiker Tadesse Aga, Clémentine Maurice, Daniel Gruss
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present Nethammer, a remote Rowhammer attack without a single attacker-controlled line of code on the targeted system, i.e., not even JavaScript. Nethammer works on commodity consumer-grade systems that either are protected with quality-of-service techniques like Intel CAT or that use uncached memory, flush instructions, or non-temporal instructions while handling network requests (e.g., for interaction with the network device). We demonstrate that the frequency of the cache misses is in all three cases high enough to induce bit flips. Our evaluation showed that depending on the location, the bit flip compromises either the security and integrity of the system and the data of its users, or it can leave persistent damage on the system, i.e., persistent denial of service. We invalidate threat models of Rowhammer defenses building upon the assumption of a local attacker. Consequently, we show that most state-of-the-art defenses do not affect our attack. In particular, we demonstrate that target-row-refresh (TRR) implemented in DDR4 has no aggravating effect on local or remote Rowhammer attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们介绍了Nethammer，这是一种远程Rowhammer攻击，在目标系统上没有一行攻击者控制的代码，也就是说，甚至没有JavaScript。Nethammer在商用消费级系统上工作，这些系统要么受到英特尔CAT等服务质量技术的保护，要么在处理网络请求时使用非缓存内存、刷新指令或非临时指令(例如，用于与网络设备交互)。我们证明，在所有三种情况下，高速缓存未命中的频率都足够高，足以引发位翻转。我们的评估表明，根据位置的不同，位翻转会损害系统及其用户数据的安全性和完整性，或者会对系统造成持续的损害，即持续的拒绝服务。我们使建立在本地攻击者假设上的Rowhammer防御的威胁模型无效。因此，我们表明大多数最先进的防御不会影响我们的攻击。特别是，我们证明了在DDR4中实现的目标行刷新(TRR)对本地或远程行锤攻击没有加重影响。
papers.title_zh: Nethammer:通过网络请求引发Rowhammer故障

papers.title: Libel Inc: An Analysis of the Libel Site Ecosystem
papers.authors: Rasika Bhalerao, Damon McCoy
papers.abstract: Libel sites publish anonymously submitted un-proven libelous claims about individuals that often include personal information about the subject. The stated goal of the sites is to “warn” the public about an individual but the impact is harassment and ruining the subject's reputation. These individual libelous posts are surfaced when searching for a person's name using an online search engine and can cause a range of harms from emotional to economic. For example, the libelous posts might surface if a potential employer performs a Google search as part of a “background check.” There have been prior news reports of this troubling phenomena but no systematic analysis of the ecosystem. In this paper, we conduct a rigorous analysis of these libel sites, supporting services, and intervention by Google. We discovered and analyzed 9 libel sites, 7 websites for reputation management services, and 12 related websites. We found that all of the libel websites included at least one method of generating revenue. The most common revenue generation method was including advertisements for “reputation management services” which require payment for the removal of a post. We found that all of these removal services were dubious in nature and that the removal policies were akin to extortion. Our analysis of Google's intervention to reduce the visibility of these websites indicated that it appeared to only reduce the visibility of the specific libel post URL but that other URLs containing links to the post or the headline text of the post were still highly ranked. Based on our findings, we make recommendations to many of the stakeholders about potential approaches for mitigating this abusive ecosystem.
papers.abstract_zh: 诽谤网站发布匿名提交的未经证实的对个人的诽谤声明，通常包括关于该主题的个人信息。这些网站宣称的目标是“警告”公众注意某个人，但其影响却是骚扰和破坏当事人的名誉。当使用在线搜索引擎搜索一个人的名字时，这些个别的诽谤性帖子就会浮出水面，并可能造成从情感到经济的一系列伤害。例如，如果潜在雇主将谷歌搜索作为“背景调查”的一部分，诽谤性的帖子可能会出现。此前有关于这一令人不安的现象的新闻报道，但没有对生态系统进行系统分析。在本文中，我们对这些诽谤网站、支持服务和谷歌的干预进行了严格的分析。我们发现并分析了9个诽谤网站、7个声誉管理服务网站和12个相关网站。我们发现所有诽谤网站都至少包含一种创收方法。最常见的创收方法是加入“声誉管理服务”的广告，这需要为删除帖子付费。我们发现，所有这些搬迁服务在本质上都是可疑的，搬迁政策类似于敲诈。我们对谷歌干预降低这些网站可见性的分析表明，它似乎只是降低了特定诽谤帖子URL的可见性，但包含帖子链接或帖子标题文本的其他URL仍然排名很高。基于我们的发现，我们向许多利益相关者提出了缓解这种滥用生态系统的潜在方法的建议。
papers.title_zh: 诽谤公司:诽谤网站生态系统分析
