papers.title: Blockchain and Federated Learning-enabled Distributed Secure and Privacy-preserving Computing Architecture for IoT Network
papers.authors: Pradip Kumar Sharma, Prosanta Gope, Deepak Puthal
papers.abstract: With the adoption of the 5G network, the exponen-tial increase in the volume of data generated by the Internet of Things (IoT) devices, pushes the system to learn the model locally to support real-time applications. However, it also raises concerns about the security and privacy of local nodes and users. In addition, the approach such as collaborative learning where local nodes participate in the learning process of global model also raise critical concern regarding the cyber resilience of the network architecture. To address these issues, in this article, we identify the research gaps and pro-pose a blockchain and federated learning-enabled distributed secure and privacy-preserving computing architecture for IoT network. The proposed model introduces the lightweight authentication and model training algorithms to build secure and robust system. The proposed model also addresses the reward and penalty issues of the collaborative learning with local nodes and propose a reward system scheme. We con-duct the experimental analysis of the proposed model based on various parametric metrics to assess the effectiveness of the model. The experimental result shows that the proposed model is effective and capable of providing a cyber-resilience system.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着5G网络的采用，物联网(IoT)设备产生的数据量呈指数级增长，推动系统在本地学习模型，以支持实时应用。然而，这也引起了对本地节点和用户的安全性和隐私的关注。此外，诸如本地节点参与全局模型的学习过程的协作学习的方法也引起了关于网络架构的网络弹性的关键关注。为了解决这些问题，在本文中，我们确定了研究差距，并提出了一种支持区块链和联邦学习的物联网分布式安全和隐私保护计算架构。该模型引入了轻量级认证和模型训练算法来构建安全和健壮的系统。该模型还解决了本地节点协作学习的奖惩问题，并提出了一种奖励系统方案。我们基于各种参数度量对所提出的模型进行了实验分析，以评估该模型的有效性。实验结果表明，该模型是有效的，能够提供一个网络弹性系统。
papers.title_zh: 基于区块链和联邦学习的物联网分布式安全隐私保护计算架构

papers.title: An (Un)Necessary Evil - Users' (Un)Certainty about Smartphone App Permissions and Implications for Privacy Engineering
papers.authors: Kerstin Bongard-Blanchy, Jean-Louis Sterckx, Arianna Rossi, Verena Distler, Salvador Rivas, Vincent Koenig
papers.abstract: App permission requests are a control mechanism meant to help users oversee and safeguard access to data and resources on their smartphones. To decide whether to accept or deny such requests and make this consent valid, users need to understand the underlying reasons and judge the relevance of disclosing data in line with their own use of an app. This study investigates people's certainty about app permission requests via an online survey with 400 representative participants of the UK population. The results demonstrate that users are uncertain about the necessity of granting app permissions for about half of the tested permission requests. This implies substantial privacy risks, which are discussed in the paper, resulting in a call for user protecting interventions by privacy engineers.
papers.abstract_zh: 应用程序权限请求是一种控制机制，旨在帮助用户监督和保护对智能手机上数据和资源的访问。为了决定是接受还是拒绝这种请求并使这种同意有效，用户需要了解潜在的原因，并根据他们自己对应用程序的使用来判断披露数据的相关性。这项研究通过对英国人口中400名代表性参与者的在线调查，调查了人们对应用程序权限请求的确定性。结果表明，对于大约一半的测试权限请求，用户不确定授予应用程序权限的必要性。这意味着本文中讨论的大量隐私风险，导致隐私工程师呼吁用户保护干预。
papers.title_zh: 邪恶用户对智能手机应用程序权限的(不)必要(不)确定性以及对隐私工程的影响

papers.title: Two de-anonymization attacks on real-world location data based on a hidden Markov model
papers.authors: Samuel N. Eshun, Paolo Palmieri
papers.abstract: The increasing demand for smart context-aware services and the widespread use of location-based services (LBS) have resulted in the proliferation of mobile devices equipped with geolocation sensors (including GPS, geomagnetic field sensor, accelerometer, proximity sensor, et cetera). As a result, service providers and telecommunications companies can collect massive mobility datasets, often for millions of subscribers. To provide a degree of privacy, dataset owners normally replace personal identifiers such as name, address, and social security number (SSN) with pseudorandom identifiers prior to publication or sale. However, it has been repeatedly shown how sensitive information can be easily extracted or inferred from individuals' mobility data even when personal identifiers are removed. Knowledge of the extent to which location data can be de-anonymized is therefore crucial, in order to design appropriate privacy mechanisms that can prevent re-identification. In this paper, we propose and implement two novel and highly effective de-anonymization techniques: the Forward, and the KL algorithms. Our work utilizes a hidden Markov model (which incorporates spatio-temporal trajectories) in a novel way to generate user mobility profiles for target users. Using a real-world reference dataset containing mobility trajectories from the city of Shanghai (GeoLife, a reference dataset also used in previous studies), we evaluate the robustness of the proposed attack techniques. The results show that our attack techniques successfully re-identify up to 85% anonymized users. This significantly exceeds current comparable de-anonymization techniques, which have a success rate of 40% to 45%.
papers.abstract_zh: 对智能上下文感知服务的日益增长的需求和基于位置的服务(LBS)的广泛使用导致了配备有地理位置传感器(包括GPS、地磁场传感器、加速度计、接近传感器等)的移动设备的激增。因此，服务提供商和电信公司可以收集大量的移动数据集，通常有数百万用户。为了提供一定程度的隐私，数据集所有者通常在发布或销售之前用伪随机标识符替换个人标识符，如姓名、地址和社会保险号(SSN)。然而，事实一再表明，即使删除了个人身份识别信息，也可以很容易地从个人的移动数据中提取或推断出敏感信息。因此，了解位置数据的去匿名化程度至关重要，以便设计适当的隐私机制，防止再次识别。在本文中，我们提出并实现了两种新颖且高效的去匿名化技术:Forward和KL算法。我们的工作以一种新颖的方式利用隐马尔可夫模型(其结合了时空轨迹)来生成目标用户的用户移动性简档。使用包含来自上海市的移动轨迹的真实世界参考数据集(GeoLife，以前的研究中也使用的参考数据集)，我们评估了所提出的攻击技术的鲁棒性。结果表明，我们的攻击技术成功地重新识别了高达85%的匿名用户。这大大超过了当前可比较的去匿名化技术，后者的成功率为40%到45%。
papers.title_zh: 两种基于隐马尔可夫模型的真实位置数据去匿名攻击

papers.title: GNPassGAN: Improved Generative Adversarial Networks For Trawling Offline Password Guessing
papers.authors: Fangyi Yu, Miguel Vargas Martin
papers.abstract: The security of passwords depends on a thorough understanding of the strategies used by attackers. Unfortunately, real-world adversaries use pragmatic guessing tactics like dictionary attacks, which are difficult to simulate in password security research. Dictionary attacks must be carefully configured and modified to represent an actual threat. This approach, however, needs domain-specific knowledge and expertise that are difficult to duplicate. This paper reviews various deep learning-based password guessing approaches that do not require domain knowledge or assumptions about users' password structures and combinations. It also introduces GNPassGAN, a password guessing tool built on generative adversarial networks for trawling offline attacks. In comparison to the state-of-the-art PassGAN model, GNPassGAN is capable of guessing 88.03% more passwords and generating 31.69% fewer duplicates.
papers.abstract_zh: 密码的安全性取决于对攻击者使用的策略的透彻理解。不幸的是，现实世界的对手使用像字典攻击这样的实用猜测策略，这在密码安全研究中很难模拟。字典攻击必须仔细配置和修改，以代表实际的威胁。然而，这种方法需要难以复制的特定领域的知识和专长。本文回顾了各种基于深度学习的密码猜测方法，这些方法不需要领域知识或关于用户密码结构和组合的假设。它还介绍了GNPassGAN，这是一种基于生成式对抗网络的密码猜测工具，用于搜索离线攻击。与最先进的PassGAN模型相比，GNPassGAN猜测密码的能力增加了88.03%，生成重复密码的能力减少了31.69%。
papers.title_zh: GNPassGAN:改进的用于搜索离线密码猜测的生成式对抗网络

papers.title: Improving Software Quality in Cryptography Standardization Projects
papers.authors: Matthias J. Kannwischer, Peter Schwabe, Douglas Stebila, Thom Wiggers
papers.abstract: The NIST post-quantum cryptography (PQC) standardization project is probably the largest and most ambitious cryptography standardization effort to date, and as such it makes an excellent case study of cryptography standardization projects. It is expected that with the end of round 3 in early 2022, NIST will announce the first set of primitives to advance to standardization, so it seems like a good time to look back and see what lessons can be learned from this effort. In this paper, we take a look at one specific aspect of the NIST PQC project: software implementations. We observe that many implementations included as a mandatory part of the submission packages were of poor quality and ignored decades-old standard techniques from software engineering to guarantee a certain baseline quality level. As a consequence, it was not possible to readily use those implementations in experiments for post-quantum protocol migration and software optimization efforts without first spending a significant amount of time to clean up the submitted reference implementations. We do not mean to criticize cryptographers who submitted proposals, including software implementations, to NIST PQC: after all, it cannot reasonably be expected from every cryptographer to also have expertise in software engineering. Instead, we suggest how standardization bodies like NIST can improve the software-submission process in future efforts to avoid such issues with submitted software. More specifically, we present PQClean, an extensive (continuous-integration) testing framework for PQC software, which now also contains “clean” implementations of the NIST round 3 candidate schemes. We argue that the availability of such a framework-either in an online continuous-integration setup, or just as an offline testing system-long before the submission deadline would have resulted in much better implementations included in NIST PQC submissions and overall would have saved the community and probably also NIST a lot of time and effort.
papers.abstract_zh: NIST后量子密码术(PQC)标准化项目可能是迄今为止最大和最雄心勃勃的密码术标准化努力，因此它是密码术标准化项目的极好的案例研究。预计随着2022年初第三轮的结束，NIST将宣布第一组推进到标准化的原语，因此这似乎是一个回顾并看看可以从这项工作中吸取什么教训的好时机。在本文中，我们来看看NIST PQC项目的一个具体方面:软件实现。我们观察到，作为提交包的强制部分的许多实现质量很差，并且忽略了软件工程中几十年前的标准技术，以保证一定的基线质量水平。因此，如果不首先花费大量的时间来清理提交的参考实现，就不可能在后量子协议迁移和软件优化工作的实验中容易地使用这些实现。我们无意批评向NIST PQC提交建议(包括软件实现)的密码学家:毕竟，不可能合理地期望每个密码学家都具备软件工程方面的专业知识。相反，我们建议像NIST这样的标准化机构如何在未来的努力中改进软件提交过程，以避免提交的软件出现这样的问题。更具体地说，我们提出了PQClean，一个用于PQC软件的广泛(持续集成)测试框架，它现在也包含NIST回合3候选方案的“干净”实现。我们认为，在提交截止日期之前很久，这样一个框架的可用性——无论是在在线持续集成设置中，还是作为离线测试系统——将会导致NIST PQC提交中包含的更好的实现，并且总体上可以为社区以及NIST节省大量时间和精力。
papers.title_zh: 在密码学标准化项目中提高软件质量

papers.title: SP 800-22 and GM/T 0005-2012 Tests: Clearly Obsolete, Possibly Harmful
papers.authors: Markku-Juhani O. Saarinen
papers.abstract: When it comes to cryptographic random number generation, poor understanding of the security requirements and “mythical aura” of black-box statistical testing frequently leads it to be used as a substitute for cryptanalysis. To make things worse, a seemingly standard document, NIST SP 800–22, describes 15 statistical tests and suggests that they can be used to evaluate random and pseudorandom number generators in cryptographic applications. The Chi-nese standard GM/T 0005–2012 describes similar tests. These documents have not aged well. The weakest pseudorandom number generators will easily pass these tests, promoting false confidence in insecure systems. We strongly suggest that SP 800–22 be withdrawn by NIST; we consider it to be not just irrelevant but actively harmful. We illustrate this by discussing the “reference generators” contained in the SP 800–22 document itself. None of these generators are suitable for modern cryptography, yet they pass the tests. For future development, we suggest focusing on stochastic modeling of entropy sources instead of model-free statistical tests. Random bit generators should also be reviewed for potential asymmetric backdoors via trapdoor one-way functions, and for security against quantum computing attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 当涉及到加密随机数生成时，对安全性要求和黑盒统计测试的“神话光环”的不理解经常导致它被用作密码分析的替代品。更糟糕的是，一份看似标准的文件《NIST SP 800–22》描述了15种统计测试，并提出它们可用于评估加密应用中的随机和伪随机数发生器。中国标准GM/T 0005–2012描述了类似的测试。这些文件没有放好。最弱的伪随机数发生器将很容易通过这些测试，从而在不安全的系统中产生虚假的信心。我们强烈建议NIST撤销SP 800–22；我们认为它不仅无关紧要，而且非常有害。我们通过讨论SP 800–22文档本身包含的“参考生成器”来说明这一点。这些生成器都不适合现代密码学，但是它们通过了测试。对于未来的发展，我们建议关注熵源的随机建模，而不是无模型的统计测试。随机位生成器也应该通过陷门单向函数检查潜在的非对称后门，以及针对量子计算攻击的安全性。
papers.title_zh: SP 800-22和GM/T 0005-2012测试:明显过时，可能有害

papers.title: Are Our Animals Leaking Information About Us? Security and Privacy Evaluation of Animal-related Apps
papers.authors: Scott Harper, Maryam Mehrnezhad, Matthew Leach
papers.abstract: Novel technologies are increasingly being applied to farm and companion animals, and are proving popular with those who keep animals. Although this rapidly growing industry is introducing cybersecurity risks to both animals and their owners, it remains an under-researched field. In this study, we have identified multiple security and privacy vulnerabilities by evaluating 40 popular Android apps for farm and companion animals. We demonstrated that several of these applications are putting their users at risk by exposing their login details. The apps also perform poorly in terms of protecting the users' privacy with over half of the apps communicating with a tracker before the user can consent, violating the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Accordingly, only 4 of the apps explicitly informed the user of their privacy policy and obtain consent. Our findings are important since they highlight the poor privacy practices present in animal-based applications, as well as the easily preventable security vulnerabilities that were reported to the companies responsible.
papers.abstract_zh: 新技术正越来越多地应用于农场和伴侣动物，并受到那些饲养动物的人的欢迎。尽管这个快速增长的行业给动物和它们的主人都带来了网络安全风险，但它仍然是一个研究不足的领域。在这项研究中，我们通过评估40款用于农场和宠物的流行Android应用程序，发现了多个安全和隐私漏洞。我们证明了这些应用程序中有几个暴露了用户的登录信息，从而将用户置于风险之中。这些应用在保护用户隐私方面也表现不佳，超过一半的应用在用户同意前与追踪器通信，违反了一般数据保护规定(GDPR)。因此，只有4个应用明确告知用户他们的隐私政策并获得同意。我们的发现很重要，因为它们突出了动物应用中存在的不良隐私做法，以及向负责公司报告的容易预防的安全漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 我们的动物泄露了我们的信息吗？动物相关应用的安全性和隐私评估

papers.title: Formalising Linked-Data based Verifiable Credentials for Selective Disclosure
papers.authors: Dan Yamamoto, Yuji Suga, Kazue Sako
papers.abstract: In this paper, we propose a formal definition for Linked-Data based verifiable credential to enable secure selective disclosure among one or multiple verifiable creden-tials a user has. Previous schemes considered using a single verifiable credential and could not hide the user's identifying information when performing selective disclosure. We pro-pose the first Linked-Data based verifiable credentials that can perform selective disclosure free from the restrictions the previous scheme had, and prove its property. We also discuss a novel use of combining multiple certificates issued by independent issuers to still allow users to perform selective disclosure on the set of credentials. Our scheme has been implemented as an open source Web-based application that generates a verifiable presentation for a given selection of attributes. The performance evaluation is also provided in the paper.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个基于链接数据的可验证凭证的形式化定义，以实现用户拥有的一个或多个可验证凭证之间的安全选择性公开。以前的方案考虑使用单个可验证的凭证，并且在执行选择性公开时不能隐藏用户的识别信息。我们提出了第一个基于链接数据的可验证证书，该证书可以进行选择性的公开而不受以前方案的限制，并证明了它的性质。我们还讨论了一种新的使用方法，将独立发行者发行的多个证书组合起来，仍然允许用户对这组证书执行选择性的公开。我们的方案已经被实现为一个开源的基于Web的应用程序，它为给定的属性选择生成一个可验证的表示。文中给出了性能评估。
papers.title_zh: 用于选择性公开的基于关联数据的可验证凭证的形式化

papers.title: SenSig: Practical IoT Sensor Fingerprinting Using Calibration Data
papers.authors: Dévanté Gray, Maryam Mehrnezhad, Rishad A. Shafik
papers.abstract: Sensing technologies are becoming ever more ubiquitous in society and increasingly finding their way into important and intimate aspects of our lives such as Industrial Internet of Things (IIOT) and Smart Homes. Accordingly, it's vital to fingerprint these sensors and devices enabling the detection of any malicious or malfunctioning sensors that may be present. The aim of this paper is to provide a simple and lightweight means of fingerprinting motion sensors, and by extension the devices these sensors reside in. To generate our fingerprints, we use the data produced by motion sensors (more specifically, the gyroscope) during the calibration process on start-up. Subsequently, we employ the use of a novel form of quantisation, and various signal processing techniques on this sensor data to generate our sensor fingerprints. Our results show that such calibration data is fingerprintable, and we demonstrate the effectiveness of a potential use case of our fingerprints: identification, where we are able to uniquely identify a sensor with a 0 % EER and 38-bits of entropy.
papers.abstract_zh: 传感技术在社会中变得越来越普遍，并越来越多地进入我们生活中重要而密切的方面，如工业物联网(IIOT)和智能家居。因此，对这些传感器和设备进行指纹识别至关重要，以便检测可能存在的任何恶意或故障传感器。本文的目的是提供一种简单、轻量级的运动传感器指纹识别方法，并扩展到这些传感器所在的设备。为了生成我们的指纹，我们在启动校准过程中使用运动传感器(更具体地说是陀螺仪)产生的数据。随后，我们采用一种新的量化形式，并对这种传感器数据进行各种信号处理技术，以生成我们的传感器指纹。我们的结果表明，这样的校准数据是指纹可打印的，并且我们证明了我们的指纹的潜在用例的有效性:识别，其中我们能够唯一地识别具有0 % EER和38位熵的传感器。
papers.title_zh: SenSig:使用校准数据的实用物联网传感器指纹识别

papers.title: A Bad IDEa: Weaponizing uncontrolled online-IDEs in availability attacks
papers.authors: Shreyas Srinivasa, Dimitrios Georgoulias, Jens Myrup Pedersen, Emmanouil Vasilomanolakis
papers.abstract: Botnets are an ongoing threat to the cyber world and can be utilized to carry out DDoS attacks of high magnitude. From the botmaster's perspective, there is a constant need for deploying more effective botnets and discovering new ways to bolster their bot ranks. Integrated Development Environments (IDEs) have been essential for software developers to write and compile source code. The increasing need for remote work and collaborative workspaces have led to the IDE-as-a-service paradigm that offers online code editing and compilation with multiple language support. In this paper, we show that a multitude of online IDEs do not run control checks on the user code and can be therefore lever-aged by a botnet. We examine the concept of uncontrolled execution environments and present a proof of concept to show how uncontrolled online-IDEs can be weaponized to perform large-scale attacks by a botnet. Overall, we detect a total of 719 online-IDEs with uncontrolled execution environments and limited sandboxing. Lastly, as ethical disclosure, we inform the IDE developers and service providers of the vulnerabilities and propose countermeasures.
papers.abstract_zh: 僵尸网络是对网络世界的持续威胁，可用于实施大规模的DDoS攻击。从僵尸主控机的角度来看，部署更有效的僵尸网络和发现新的方法来支持他们的僵尸队伍是一个持续的需求。集成开发环境(ide)对于软件开发人员编写和编译源代码至关重要。对远程工作和协作工作区日益增长的需求导致了IDE即服务范式的出现，这种范式提供了支持多种语言的在线代码编辑和编译。在本文中，我们展示了大量的在线ide不会对用户代码进行控制检查，因此会被僵尸网络利用。我们研究了不受控制的执行环境的概念，并提出了一个概念证明，以显示不受控制的在线ide如何被武器化，以执行僵尸网络的大规模攻击。总的来说，我们总共检测到719个在线ide具有不受控制的执行环境和有限的沙箱。最后，作为道德披露，我们通知IDE开发人员和服务提供商漏洞并提出对策。
papers.title_zh: 一个坏主意:在可用性攻击中将不受控制的在线IDEs武器化

papers.title: PostCog: A tool for interdisciplinary research into underground forums at scale
papers.authors: Ildiko Pete, Jack Hughes, Andrew Caines, Anh V. Vu, Harshad Gupta, Alice Hutchings, Ross J. Anderson, Paula Buttery
papers.abstract: Underground forums provide useful insights into cybercrime, where researchers analyse underlying economies, key actors, their discussions and interactions, as well as different types of cybercrime. This interdisciplinary topic of study incorporates expertise from diverse areas, including computer science, criminology, economics, psychol-ogy, and other social sciences. Historically, there were sig-nificant challenges around access to data, but there are now research datasets of millions of messages scraped from underground forums. The problems now stem from the size of these datasets and the technical nature of methods and tools available for data sampling and analysis at scale, which make data exploration difficult for non-technical users. Postcoghas been developed to solve this problem. We first provide a survey of prior work into underground forums; this was used to understand the requirements and functionalities valued by researchers, and to inform the design of a data exploration tool. We then describe Postcog,a web application developed to support users from both technical and non-technical backgrounds in forum analyses, such as search, information extraction and cross-forum comparison. The prototype's usability is then evaluated through two user studies with expert users of the Crimebbdataset. Postcogis made available for academic research upon signing an agreement with the Cambridge Cybercrime Centre.
papers.abstract_zh: 地下论坛提供了对网络犯罪的有用见解，研究人员在这里分析基础经济、关键行为者、他们的讨论和互动，以及不同类型的网络犯罪。这个跨学科的研究课题融合了不同领域的专业知识，包括计算机科学、犯罪学、经济学、心理学和其他社会科学。从历史上看，围绕数据访问存在重大挑战，但现在有从地下论坛搜集的数百万条信息的研究数据集。现在的问题源于这些数据集的规模以及可用于大规模数据采样和分析的方法和工具的技术性质，这使得非技术用户难以进行数据探索。邮政编码就是为了解决这个问题而开发的。我们首先提供了地下论坛的前期工作调查；这用于了解研究人员重视的需求和功能，并为数据探索工具的设计提供信息。然后我们描述Postcog，这是一个web应用程序，用于支持技术和非技术背景的用户进行论坛分析，如搜索、信息提取和跨论坛比较。然后，通过对Crimebbdataset的专家用户进行两次用户研究，对原型的可用性进行评估。与剑桥网络犯罪中心签署协议后，Postcogis可用于学术研究。
papers.title_zh: PostCog:对地下论坛进行大规模跨学科研究的工具

papers.title: Investigating the concentration of High Yield Investment Programs in the United Kingdom
papers.authors: Sharad Agarwal, Marie Vasek
papers.abstract: Ponzi schemes that offer absurdly high rates of return by relying on more and more people paying into the scheme have been documented since at least the mid-1800s. Ponzi schemes have shifted online in the Internet age, and some are re-branded as HYIPs or High Yield Investment Programs. This paper focuses on understanding HYIPs' continuous presence and presents various possible reasons behind their existence in today's world. A look into the countries where these schemes purport to exist, we find that 62.89% of all collected HYIPs claim to be in the United Kingdom (UK), and a further 55.56% are officially registered in the UK as a ‘limited company’ with a registration number provided by the UK Companies House, a UK agency that registers companies. We investigate other factors influencing these schemes, including the HYIPs' social media platforms and payment processors. The lifetime of the HYIPs helps to understand the success/failure of the investment schemes and helps indicate the schemes that could attract more investors. Using Cox proportional regression analysis, we find that having a valid UK address significantly affects the lifetime of an HYIP.
papers.abstract_zh: 庞氏骗局依靠越来越多的人支付费用来提供高得离谱的回报率，这至少在19世纪中期就有记录。在互联网时代，庞氏骗局已经转移到网上，一些被重新命名为高收益投资计划。本文着重于理解HYIPs的持续存在，并提出了它们在当今世界存在背后的各种可能的原因。在这些计划声称存在的国家中，我们发现62.89%的收集的HYIPs声称在英国(UK)，另外55.56%在英国正式注册为“有限公司”，注册号由英国公司之家提供，英国公司注册机构负责公司注册。我们调查了影响这些方案的其他因素，包括HYIPs的社交媒体平台和支付处理器。HYIPs的寿命有助于理解投资计划的成功/失败，并有助于指出可以吸引更多投资者的计划。使用Cox比例回归分析，我们发现拥有一个有效的英国地址会显著影响HYIP的寿命。
papers.title_zh: 调查英国高收益投资项目的集中程度

papers.title: Investigating the Effect of Phishing Believability on Phishing Reporting
papers.authors: Leon Kersten, Pavlo Burda, Luca Allodi, Nicola Zannone
papers.abstract: Phishing emails are becoming more and more sophisticated, making current detection techniques ineffective. The reporting of phishing emails from users is, thus, crucial for organizations to detect phishing attacks and mitigate their effect. Despite extensive research on how the believability of a phishing email affects detection rates, there is little to no research about the relationship between the believability of a phishing email and the associated reporting rate. In this work, we present a controlled experiment with 446 subjects to evaluate how the reporting rate of a phishing email is linked to its believability and detection rate. Our results show that the reporting rate decreases as the believability of the email increases and that around half of the subjects who detect the mail as phishing, have an intention to report the email. However, the group intending to report an email is not a subset of the group detecting the mail as phishing, suggesting that reporting is still a concept misunderstood by many.
papers.abstract_zh: 钓鱼邮件变得越来越复杂，使得当前的检测技术失效。因此，报告来自用户的网络钓鱼电子邮件对于组织检测网络钓鱼攻击并减轻其影响至关重要。尽管对网络钓鱼电子邮件的可信度如何影响检测率进行了广泛的研究，但是对于网络钓鱼电子邮件的可信度和相关联的报告率之间的关系几乎没有研究。在这项工作中，我们提供了一个有446名受试者的对照实验，以评估网络钓鱼电子邮件的报告率与其可信度和检测率之间的关系。我们的结果显示，报告率随着电子邮件可信度的增加而降低，并且大约一半检测到邮件为网络钓鱼的受试者有报告该电子邮件的意图。然而，打算报告电子邮件的群体并不是将该邮件检测为网络钓鱼的群体的子集，这表明报告仍然是被许多人误解的概念。
papers.title_zh: 调查网络钓鱼可信度对网络钓鱼报告的影响

papers.title: Characterizing Building Automation System Attacks and Attackers
papers.authors: Martino Tommasini, Martin Rosso, Emmanuele Zambon, Luca Allodi, Jerry den Hartog
papers.abstract: A building automation system (BAS) is an instance of a cyber-physical-system (CPS) in control of building functionalities like lighting, ventilation, CCTVs, and access control. The amount of “smart” buildings has been growing over the years, introducing new technologies which are now being targeted by attackers. In this work, we present the first collection of publicly disclosed security incidents involving Building Automation Systems (BAS). We then provide a qualitative study of attackers targeting BAS and unveil their main characteristics and differences to traditional CPS attackers. We learn that, generally speaking, BAS attackers show a lower sophistication level and that most BAS attacks target the smart IoT components present in modern buildings. Further, access to the BAS is often not the attacker's final goal but “just” a mean to achieve their actual goal. Lastly, we do not observe any advanced, state-sponsored BAS attacks hinting that these play less of a role in BAS (compared to CPS).
papers.abstract_zh: 楼宇自动化系统(BAS)是控制照明、通风、闭路电视和门禁控制等楼宇功能的信息物理系统(CPS)的一个实例。“智能”建筑的数量近年来一直在增长，引入了新的技术，现在成为攻击者的目标。在本文中，我们首次收集了公开披露的涉及楼宇自动化系统(BAS)的安全事件。然后，我们对针对BAS的攻击者进行了定性研究，揭示了他们的主要特征以及与传统CPS攻击者的区别。我们了解到，一般来说，BAS攻击者的复杂程度较低，大多数BAS攻击的目标是现代建筑中的智能物联网组件。此外，访问BAS通常不是攻击者的最终目标，而“只是”实现其实际目标的一种手段。最后，我们没有观察到任何高级的、国家支持的BAS攻击，这表明这些攻击在BAS中的作用较小(与CPS相比)。
papers.title_zh: 描述楼宇自动化系统攻击和攻击者的特征

papers.title: Reviewing Estimates of Cybercrime Victimisation and Cyber Risk Likelihood
papers.authors: Daniel W. Woods, Lukas Walter
papers.abstract: Across both the public and private sector, cyberse-curity decisions could be informed by estimates of the likelihood of different types of exploitation and the corresponding harms. Law enforcement should focus on investigating and disrupting those cybercrimes that are relatively more frequent, all else being equal. Similarly, firms should account for the likelihood of different forms of cyber incident when tailoring risk management policies. This paper reviews the quantitative evidence available for both cybercrime victimi-sation and cyber risk likelihood, providing a bridge between the academic fields of criminology and cybersecurity. We extract estimates from 48 studies conducted by a mix of academics, statistical institutes, and cybersecurity vendors using a range of data sources including victim surveys, case-control studies, and the insurance market. The victimisation estimates are categorised into: cyber attack; malware; ran-somware; fraudulent email; online banking fraud; online sales fraud; unauthorised access; Denial of Service; and identity theft. For each category, we display all estimates in the years 2017–2021. Our review shows: (i) firms face higher victimisation rates than individuals, which increases in the number of employees; (ii) global surveys reveal a consistent relative ranking of countries in ransomware victimisation; (iii) although trends could be identified within studies that collect longitudinal data, these trends tended to contradict each other when compared across studies; and (iv) broad categories with unclear consequences (e.g. malware and fraudulent emails) displayed higher variance and average values than categories associated with specific outcomes (e.g. identity theft or online banking fraud). We discuss the outlook for cybercrime and cyber risk research.
papers.abstract_zh: 在公共和私营部门，网络安全决策可以通过对不同类型的利用和相应危害的可能性的估计来提供信息。在其他条件不变的情况下，执法部门应重点调查和瓦解那些相对更频繁的网络犯罪。同样，企业在制定风险管理政策时，应该考虑不同形式的网络事件的可能性。本文回顾了可用于网络犯罪受害和网络风险可能性的定量证据，为犯罪学和网络安全的学术领域提供了一座桥梁。我们从由学者、统计机构和网络安全供应商进行的48项研究中提取估计值，这些研究使用了一系列数据源，包括受害者调查、病例对照研究和保险市场。受害估计分为:网络攻击；恶意软件；ran-somware；欺诈邮件；网银诈骗；网络销售欺诈；未经授权的访问；拒绝服务；和身份盗窃。对于每个类别，我们显示了2017-2021年的所有估计值。我们的研究表明:(一)公司比个人面临更高的受害率，这增加了雇员的数量；㈡全球调查显示，勒索软件受害国家的相对排名一致；(iii)虽然可以在收集纵向数据的研究中确定趋势，但在跨研究进行比较时，这些趋势往往相互矛盾；以及(iv)后果不明确的大类(如恶意软件和欺诈性电子邮件)比与特定后果相关的类别(如身份盗窃或网上银行欺诈)显示出更高的方差和平均值。我们讨论了网络犯罪和网络风险研究的前景。
papers.title_zh: 审查对网络犯罪受害和网络风险可能性的估计

papers.title: Examining the trends and operations of modern Dark-Web marketplaces
papers.authors: Víctor Labrador, Sergio Pastrana
papers.abstract: Currently, the Dark Web is one key platform for the online trading of illegal products and services. Analysing the .onion sites hosting marketplaces is of interest for law enforcement and security researchers. This paper presents a study on 123k listings obtained from 6 different Dark Web markets. While most of current works leverage existing datasets, these are outdated and might not contain new products, e.g., those related to the 2020 COVID pandemic. Thus, we build a custom focused crawler to collect the data. Being able to conduct analyses on current data is of considerable importance as these marketplaces continue to change and grow, both in terms of products offered and users. Also, there are several anti-crawling mechanisms being improved, making this task more difficult and, consequently, reducing the amount of data obtained in recent years on these marketplaces. We conduct a data analysis evaluating multiple characteristics regarding the products, sellers, and markets. These characteristics include, among others, the number of sales, existing categories in the markets, the origin of the products and the sellers. Our study sheds light on the products and services being offered in these markets nowadays. Moreover, we have conducted a case study on one particular productive and dynamic drug market, i.e., Cannazon. Our initial goal was to understand its evolution over time, analyzing the variation of products in stock and their price longitudinally. We realized, though, that during the period of study the market suffered a DDoS attack which damaged its reputation and affected users' trust on it, which was a potential reason which lead to the subsequent closure of the market by its operators. Consequently, our study provides insights regarding the last days of operation of such a productive market, and showcases the effectiveness of a potential intervention approach by means of disrupting the service and fostering mistrust.
papers.abstract_zh: 目前，暗网是非法产品和服务在线交易的一个重要平台。正在分析。洋葱网站托管市场是执法和安全研究人员感兴趣的。本文对6个不同的暗网市场获得的123，000个列表进行了研究。虽然目前的大多数工作利用了现有的数据集，但这些数据集已经过时，可能不包含新产品，例如，与2020年柯维德疫情相关的产品。因此，我们构建了一个定制的聚焦爬虫来收集数据。随着这些市场在所提供的产品和用户方面不断变化和发展，能够对当前数据进行分析是相当重要的。此外，有几个反爬行机制正在改进，使这项任务更加困难，因此，减少了近年来在这些市场上获得的数据量。我们进行数据分析，评估关于产品、卖家和市场的多个特征。除其他外，这些特征包括销售数量、市场上现有的类别、产品的原产地和销售者。我们的研究揭示了如今这些市场上提供的产品和服务。此外，我们还对一个特定的多产且活跃的药物市场，即Cannazon，进行了案例研究。我们最初的目标是了解它随时间的演变，纵向分析库存产品及其价格的变化。然而，我们意识到，在研究期间，市场遭受了DDoS攻击，损害了它的声誉，影响了用户对它的信任，这是导致运营商随后关闭市场的潜在原因。因此，我们的研究提供了关于这样一个生产性市场运作的最后几天的见解，并展示了通过中断服务和培养不信任来进行潜在干预的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 研究现代暗网市场的趋势和运作

papers.title: Reliability of IP Geolocation Services for Assessing the Compliance of International Data Transfers
papers.authors: Miguel Cozar, David Rodriguez, José M. del Álamo, Danny S. Guamán
papers.abstract: The General Data Protection Regulation sets strict requirements to allow personal data transfers outside the European Economic Area. Thus, knowing the geographical destination of data transfers is becoming increasingly important for different stakeholders such as data controllers that may become data exporters or data protection authorities who need to assess data processing compliance. To this end, several online databases and services provide geolocation data for IP addresses with different accuracy and reliability levels. This paper analyzes ten different IP geolocation services to understand their reliability against known ground truth and applies them to further assess whether 767 Android apps indeed carry out international personal data transfers. Our results show great discrepancy depending on the service used, thus demonstrating the uncertainty data controllers and supervisory authorities face to assess these data flows.
papers.abstract_zh: 《一般数据保护条例》规定了严格的要求，允许将个人数据转移到欧洲经济区之外。因此，了解数据传输的地理目的地对于不同的利益相关者变得越来越重要，例如可能成为数据导出者的数据控制者或需要评估数据处理合规性的数据保护机构。为此，一些在线数据库和服务以不同的准确度和可靠性水平为IP地址提供地理定位数据。本文分析了十种不同的IP地理定位服务，以了解它们相对于已知事实的可靠性，并应用它们来进一步评估767个Android应用程序是否确实进行国际个人数据传输。我们的结果显示了很大的差异，取决于所使用的服务，从而证明了数据控制者和监管当局在评估这些数据流时所面临的不确定性。
papers.title_zh: 评估国际数据传输合规性的IP地理定位服务的可靠性

papers.title: Anonymity test attacks and vulnerability indicators for the "Patient characteristics" disclosure in medical articles
papers.authors: Kenta Kitamura, Mhd Irvan, Rie Shigetomi Yamaguchi
papers.abstract: In the field of Privacy-Preserving Data Publishing (PPDP), a privacy violation attack based on a bias in the ratio of sensitive attribute values of disclosed information is called a homogeneity attack, and l-diversity has been proposed as an indicator of this vulnerability. In medical articles, especially in clinical trial, the ratio of attribute values is disclosed as “patient characteristics” which include statistical information such as the number of hypertension patients and age distribution of the patient group subject to clinical research. The patient characteristics could also be vulnerable to homogeneity attack but have not been studied. In this paper, we propose three new attack methods similar to the homogeneity attack that violate the anonymity of patient characteristics. We also propose three new indicators similar to l-diversity to evaluate anonymity against such attacks. Experimental results show that our new attacks can point out that actual patient characteristics leaks patient information that should be kept confidential. And the results also show that the new proposed indicators can measure the vulnerability to such attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 在隐私保护数据发布(PPDP)领域，基于所公开信息的敏感属性值的比率中的偏差的隐私侵犯攻击被称为同质性攻击，并且l多样性已经被提议作为该脆弱性的指标。在医学文章中，特别是在临床试验中，属性值的比率被公开为“患者特征”，其包括统计信息，例如作为临床研究对象的高血压患者的数量和患者组的年龄分布。患者特征也可能易受同质性攻击，但尚未进行研究。在本文中，我们提出了三种新的攻击方法，类似于违反患者特征匿名性的同质性攻击。我们还提出了三个类似于l-diversity的新指标来评估匿名性对这类攻击的抵抗能力。实验结果表明，我们的新攻击可以指出实际的病人特征泄露了应该保密的病人信息。研究结果还表明，新提出的指标可以衡量对这种攻击的脆弱性。
papers.title_zh: 医学论文中“患者特征”泄露的匿名测试攻击和脆弱性指标

papers.title: CampusTracer: A Privacy-Aware Contact Tracing Protocol for Campus Environments
papers.authors: Ken Ahrens, Jonas Palm, Meiko Jensen
papers.abstract: Contact tracing has become a major weapon against fighting the spread of diseases like SARS-CoV-2. Unfortunately, the ability to inform potentially infected people always comes with a downside to privacy, as contacts traced could also be misused in other contexts. In this paper, we present CampusTracer, a novel contact tracing system specialized for university campus environments. Based on an in-depth analysis of existing contact tracing approaches and university-specific requirements, we elaborate a Privacy-by-Design solution to contact tracing that caters for most real-world requirements while preserving the privacy of its users in a best-possible way.
papers.abstract_zh: 接触追踪已经成为对抗新型冠状病毒等疾病传播的主要武器。不幸的是，通知潜在感染者的能力总是伴随着隐私的负面影响，因为被追踪的接触也可能在其他情况下被滥用。在本文中，我们介绍了CampusTracer，一种专门用于大学校园环境的新型联系人跟踪系统。基于对现有联系追踪方法和大学特定要求的深入分析，我们精心设计了一个隐私设计的联系追踪解决方案，该解决方案满足大多数现实世界的要求，同时以最佳方式保护其用户的隐私。
papers.title_zh: CampusTracer:一种面向校园环境的隐私感知联系追踪协议

papers.title: A New Generic Representation for Modeling Privacy
papers.authors: Myriam Clouet, Thibaud Antignac, Mathilde Arnaud, Gabriel Pedroza, Julien Signoles
papers.abstract: Verifying how personal data is used in industrial applications is of utmost importance for evaluating privacy. Existing works propose many definitions of privacy and offer a wide variety of approaches for verifying privacy properties. Yet, as far as we know, there is currently no generic setting allowing to model all these concepts, as well as to express and verify related privacy properties, whilst taking into account the various abstraction levels involved when designing and implementing a computer system. This work proposes a generic representation for modeling privacy relying on a new classification scheme and a new ontology. These aim to be generic enough for modeling key privacy concepts and their relationships, as well as helping express and verify related properties at different levels of abstractions. Our representation of privacy can also be specialized into various existing ones, according to different criteria, whilst allowing us to instantiate it for mapping its generic elements to existing examples or concrete use cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 验证个人数据在工业应用中的使用方式对于评估隐私至关重要。现有的工作提出了许多隐私的定义，并提供了多种验证隐私属性的方法。然而，据我们所知，目前还没有通用的设置允许对所有这些概念进行建模，以及表达和验证相关的隐私属性，同时考虑在设计和实现计算机系统时所涉及的各种抽象级别。这项工作提出了一个依赖于新的分类方案和新的本体的隐私建模的一般表示。这些标准旨在对关键隐私概念及其关系进行建模时足够通用，同时帮助在不同的抽象层次上表达和验证相关属性。根据不同的标准，我们对隐私的表述也可以专门化为各种现有的表述，同时允许我们实例化它，以将其通用元素映射到现有的示例或具体的用例。
papers.title_zh: 一种新的隐私建模通用表示方法

papers.title: Helping Mobile Application Developers Create Accurate Privacy Labels
papers.authors: Jack Gardner, Yuanyuan Feng, Kayla Reiman, Zhi Lin, Akshath Jain, Norman Sadeh
papers.abstract: In December, 2020, Apple began requiring developers to disclose their data collection and use practices to generate a “privacy label” for their application. The use of mobile application Software Development Kits (SDKs) and third-party libraries, coupled with a typical lack of expertise in privacy, makes it challenging for developers to accurately report their data collection and use practices. In this work we discuss the design and evaluation of a tool to help iOS developers generate privacy labels. The tool combines static code analysis to identify likely data collection and use practices with interactive functionality designed to prompt developers to elucidate analysis results and carefully reflect on their applications' data practices. We conducted semi-structured interviews with iOS developers as they used an initial version of the tool. We discuss how these results motivated us to develop an enhanced software tool, Privacy Label Wiz, that more closely resembles interactions developers reported to be most useful in our semi-structured interviews. We present findings from our interviews and the enhanced tool motivated by our study. We also outline future directions for software tools to better assist developers communicating their mobile app's data practices to different audiences.
papers.abstract_zh: 2020年12月，苹果开始要求开发者公开他们的数据收集和使用实践，为他们的应用程序生成“隐私标签”。移动应用软件开发工具包(SDK)和第三方库的使用，加上隐私方面专业知识的典型缺乏，使得开发人员很难准确报告他们的数据收集和使用实践。在这项工作中，我们讨论了帮助iOS开发者生成隐私标签的工具的设计和评估。该工具将静态代码分析与交互式功能相结合，前者用于识别可能的数据收集和使用实践，后者旨在提示开发人员阐明分析结果并仔细思考其应用程序的数据实践。当iOS开发者使用该工具的初始版本时，我们对他们进行了半结构化的采访。我们讨论了这些结果如何激励我们开发一个增强的软件工具，隐私标签Wiz，它更类似于开发人员在我们的半结构化访谈中报告的最有用的交互。我们展示了我们的采访结果和由我们的研究激发的增强工具。我们还概述了软件工具的未来方向，以更好地帮助开发人员向不同的受众传达他们的移动应用程序的数据实践。
papers.title_zh: 帮助移动应用程序开发人员创建准确的隐私标签

papers.title: Data Protection and Consenting Communication Mechanisms: Current Open Proposals and Challenges
papers.authors: Soheil Human, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Victor Morel, Cristiana Santos, Martin Degeling, Arianna Rossi, Maria Wilhelmina Botes, Vitor Jesus, Irene Kamara
papers.abstract: Data Protection and Consenting Communication Mechanisms (DPCCMs) enable users to express their privacy decisions and manage their online consent. Thus, they can become a crucial means of protecting individuals' online privacy and agency, thereby replacing the current problematic practices such as “consent dialogues”. Based on an in-depth analysis of different DPCCMs, we propose an interdisciplinary set of factors that can be used for a comparison of such mechanisms. Moreover, we use the results from a qualitative expert study to identify some of the main multidisciplinary challenges that DPCCMs should address to become widely adopted data privacy mechanisms. We leverage both the factors and the challenges to compare two current open specifications, i.e. the Advanced Data Protection Control (ADPC) and the Global Privacy Control (GPC), and discuss future work.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据保护和同意通信机制(DPCCMs)使用户能够表达他们的隐私决定并管理他们的在线同意。因此，它们可以成为保护个人在线隐私和代理的重要手段，从而取代目前存在问题的做法，如"同意对话"。基于对不同DPCCMs的深入分析，我们提出了一组跨学科的因素，可用于比较这些机制。此外，我们使用定性专家研究的结果来确定一些主要的多学科挑战，DPCCMs应该解决这些挑战，以成为广泛采用的数据隐私机制。我们利用这些因素和挑战来比较当前的两个开放规范，即高级数据保护控制(ADPC)和全球隐私控制(GPC)，并讨论未来的工作。
papers.title_zh: 数据保护和同意通信机制:当前开放的建议和挑战

papers.title: Applying Machine Learning to use security oracles: a case study in virus and malware detection
papers.authors: Davy Preuveneers, Emma Lavens, Wouter Joosen
papers.abstract: Machine Learning (ML) has a significant potential to enhance the security posture of an organization by improving threat detection and discovery. The growing quality and quantity of data through measurements creates opportunities in this context. However, when an organization does not have sufficient labeled data to make predictions, it can rely on third parties for expert advise. In this work, we present a real-world case study of a company offering security services to other businesses on top of its portfolio of internal security assets. The security provider adopts ML to learn when to cost-effectively invoke a third party service/oracle (i.e. VirusTotal), first to boost its own detection rate in order to protect its customers, and second to obtain new ground truth to further optimize its future oracle use, all under fixed query budget constraints. While the decision making of the ML system was very successful in terms of avoiding false positives and false negatives, we nonetheless identified several security challenges when adopting ML for a cost-effective use of security oracles. We evaluate our ML solution on real data, elicit various lessons learned about the increased attack surface when using ML in security applications, and identify countermeasures to secure this ML pipeline.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习(ML)具有通过改进威胁检测和发现来增强组织的安全态势的巨大潜力。在这种情况下，通过测量获得的数据质量和数量不断提高，创造了机会。然而，当一个组织没有足够的标记数据来进行预测时，它可以依赖第三方的专家建议。在这项工作中，我们展示了一个真实世界的案例研究，一家公司在其内部安全资产组合的基础上向其他企业提供安全服务。安全提供商采用ML来了解何时经济高效地调用第三方服务/oracle(即VirusTotal)，首先提高其自身的检测率以保护其客户，其次获得新的基本事实以进一步优化其未来的oracle使用，所有这些都在固定的查询预算约束下。虽然ML系统的决策在避免误报和漏报方面非常成功，但我们在采用ML以经济高效地使用安全oracles时发现了几个安全挑战。我们在真实数据上评估了我们的ML解决方案，得出了在安全应用中使用ML时关于攻击面增加的各种教训，并确定了保护此ML管道的对策。
papers.title_zh: 应用机器学习来使用安全预言:病毒和恶意软件检测的案例研究

papers.title: SRv6: Is There Anybody Out There?
papers.authors: Victor-Alexandru Padurean, Oliver Gasser, Randy Bush, Anja Feldmann
papers.abstract: Segment routing is a modern form of source-based routing, i.e., a routing technique where all or part of the routing decision is predetermined by the source or a hop on the path. Since initial standardization efforts in 2013, segment routing seems to have garnered substantial industry and operator support. Especially segment routing over IPv6 (SRv6) is advertised as having several advantages for easy deployment and flexibility in operations in networks. Many people, however, argue that the deployment of segment routing and SRv6 in particular poses a significant security threat if not done with the utmost care. In this paper we conduct a first empirical analysis of SRv6 deployment in the Internet. First, we analyze SRv6 behavior in an emulation environment and find that different SRv6 implementations have the potential to leak information to the outside. Second, we search for signs of SRv6 deployment in publicly available route collector data, but could not find any traces. Third, we run large-scale traceroute campaigns to investigate possible SRv6 deployments. In this first empirical study on SRv6 we are unable to find traces of SRv6 deployment even for companies that claim to have it deployed in their networks. This lack of leakage might be an indication of good security practices being followed by network operators when deploying SRv6.
papers.abstract_zh: 分段路由是基于源的路由的一种现代形式，即一种路由技术，其中全部或部分路由决策由源或路径上的一跳预先确定。自2013年开始标准化工作以来，分段路由似乎已经获得了行业和运营商的大力支持。特别是IPv6上的分段路由(SRv6)被宣传为具有易于部署和在网络中操作的灵活性的几个优点。然而，许多人认为，如果不小心使用，段路由和SRv6的部署会造成严重的安全威胁。在本文中，我们对互联网中的SRv6部署进行了首次实证分析。首先，我们分析了仿真环境中的SRv6行为，发现不同的SRv6实现都有可能向外部泄露信息。其次，我们在公开可用的路由收集器数据中搜索SRv6部署的迹象，但是找不到任何踪迹。第三，我们开展大规模的跟踪路由活动，调查可能的SRv6部署。在关于SRv6的第一项实证研究中，我们找不到部署SRv6的痕迹，即使是那些声称已在其网络中部署了Sr V6的公司也是如此。这种泄漏的缺失可能表明网络运营商在部署SRv6时遵循了良好的安全实践。
papers.title_zh: 有人在外面吗？

papers.title: Temporal Analysis of X.509 Revocations and their Statuses
papers.authors: Adam Halim, Max Danielsson, Martin F. Arlitt, Niklas Carlsson
papers.abstract: Despite the X.509 public key infrastructure (PKI) being essential for ensuring the trust we place in our communication with web servers, the revocation of the trust placed in individual X.509 certificates is neither transparent nor well-studied, leaving many unanswered questions. In this paper, we present a temporal analysis of 36 million certificates, whose revocation statuses we followed for 120 days since first being issued. We characterize the revocation rates of different certificate authorities (CAs) and how the rates change over the lifetime of the certificates. We identify and discuss several instances where the status changes from “revoked” to “good”, “unauthorized” or “unknown”, respectively, before the certificate's expiry. This complements prior work that has observed such inconsistencies in some CAs' behavior after expiry but also highlight a potentially more severe problem. Our results highlight heterogeneous revocation practices among the CAs.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管X.509公钥基础设施(PKI)对于确保我们在与web服务器的通信中的信任是必不可少的，但是撤销对单个X.509证书的信任既不透明也没有得到很好的研究，留下了许多未回答的问题。在本文中，我们对3600万个证书进行了时间分析，这些证书的撤销状态我们跟踪了120天。我们描述了不同证书颁发机构(ca)的撤销率，以及这些撤销率在证书的生命周期中是如何变化的。我们识别并讨论了证书到期前状态分别从“已撤销”变为“良好”、“未授权”或“未知”的几种情况。这补充了先前的工作，先前的工作已经观察到一些ca在到期后的行为中的这种不一致，但是也强调了潜在的更严重的问题。我们的结果强调了ca之间的异构撤销实践。
papers.title_zh: X.509撤销及其状态的时间分析

papers.title: Looking for Honey Once Again: Detecting RDP and SMB Honeypots on the Internet
papers.authors: Fabian Franzen, Lion Steger, Johannes Zirngibl, Patrick Sattler
papers.abstract: Honeypots are a widely used technique to observe the spread of malware and the emergence of new exploits. Attackers try to avoid connecting to honeypots as they reveal the attacker's methods, tools, and exploits. While different honeypot implementations have been fingerprinted in the past, we see a lack of studies covering Windows-related protocols such as Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) and Server Message Block (SMB) honeypots. However, these protocols have seen at least two major security vulnerabilities in the past 5 years and are commonly exploited. We adapted existing fingerprinting algorithms to allow an accurate identification of RDP and SMB honeypots checking how implementations behave in error conditions. We present a new improvement, namely the inclusion of system TLS stack features previously not used for honeypot detection. We are the first to perform an internet-wide scan searching for RDP and SMB honeypots. We are able to effectively uncover the presence of two common open-source honeypots for RDP and SMB each. We identified 84 instances of Heralding (RDP), 1123 instances of RDPY (RDP), 60 instances of Impacket (SMB), and 1461 instances of Dionaea (SMB) during our scans. Furthermore, we found several hosts, which do not use Microsoft's SChannel TLS stack, but advertise themselves as Windows machines. This indicates the presence of a Man-in-the-Middle (MitM) box and could be a sign of a honeypot. Eventually, we analyzed how attackers interact with detectable honeypots. We deployed instances of RDP honeypots ourselves and found that credential guessing attackers seem to avoid them. This proves that RDP and SMB honeypots are finger-printable and that even MitM-box-based high-interaction honeypots leave detectable traces.
papers.abstract_zh: 蜜罐是一种广泛使用的技术，用于观察恶意软件的传播和新漏洞的出现。攻击者试图避免连接到蜜罐，因为它们会暴露攻击者的方法、工具和漏洞。虽然过去已经对不同的蜜罐实现进行了指纹分析，但我们发现缺乏涵盖Windows相关协议的研究，如远程桌面协议(RDP)和服务器消息块(SMB)蜜罐。然而，这些协议在过去5年中至少出现了两个主要的安全漏洞，并且经常被利用。我们调整了现有的指纹算法，以允许准确识别RDP和中小企业的蜜罐，检查实施在错误条件下的行为。我们提出了一个新的改进，即包括系统TLS堆栈功能，以前没有用于蜜罐检测。我们是第一个在互联网范围内搜索RDP和中小企业蜜罐的公司。我们能够有效地发现RDP和中小型企业各有两个常见的开源蜜罐。在扫描过程中，我们发现了84个预示实例(RDP)、1123个RDPY实例(RDP)、60个Impacket实例(SMB)和1461个Dionaea实例(SMB)。此外，我们发现了几台主机，它们不使用微软的SChannel TLS堆栈，但自称是Windows机器。这表明存在中间人(MitM)盒子，可能是蜜罐的迹象。最后，我们分析了攻击者如何与可检测的蜜罐进行交互。我们自己部署了RDP蜜罐的实例，发现凭据猜测攻击者似乎会避开它们。这证明了RDP和SMB蜜罐是指纹可打印的，甚至基于MitM-box的高交互蜜罐也会留下可检测的痕迹。
papers.title_zh: 再次寻找蜂蜜:检测互联网上的RDP和中小企业蜜罐

papers.title: Got Sick and Tracked: Privacy Analysis of Hospital Websites
papers.authors: Xiufen Yu, Nayanamana Samarasinghe, Mohammad Mannan, Amr M. Youssef
papers.abstract: Many healthcare organizations, including hospitals, are moving some of their services to digital space. While web privacy in popular sites including commercial and social media sites has been widely studied, privacy and security issues of hospital websites have not been studied at a global scale, which we target for our analysis in this paper. We successfully crawl 19,483 hospital web sites from 152 countries and provincial jurisdictions located in Asia, Europe, North America, Latin America, Africa and Oceania. We identify wide-spread use of trackers on hospital web-sites - 10,417 (53.5 %) hospital web sites included tracking scripts/cookies; Beside privacy issues, we also identify sites with potential security issues - 33 hospital sites were flagged as malicious by VirusTotal (by at least 3 security engines); and 699 hospital web sites included FullStory, Yandex, Hotjar session replay services that sent sensitive information to external servers. We hope our findings will raise awareness in improving privacy and security posture of hospital websites, as the number of online hospital services is expected to increase in the future.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多医疗保健组织，包括医院，正在将他们的一些服务转移到数字空间。虽然包括商业和社交媒体网站在内的流行网站的网络隐私已得到广泛研究，但尚未在全球范围内研究医院网站的隐私和安全问题，而这正是我们在本文中分析的目标。我们成功抓取了亚洲、欧洲、北美、拉丁美洲、非洲和大洋洲152个国家和地区的19，483个医院网站。我们发现医院网站广泛使用追踪器——10，417个(53.5 %)医院网站包含追踪脚本/cookie；除了隐私问题之外，我们还发现了存在潜在安全问题的网站——33个医院网站被VirusTotal标记为恶意网站(至少被3个安全引擎标记为恶意网站);699家医院的网站包括FullStory、Yandex、Hotjar会话重放服务，这些服务会将敏感信息发送到外部服务器。我们希望我们的发现将提高人们对改善医院网站隐私和安全状况的认识，因为预计未来在线医院服务的数量将会增加。
papers.title_zh: 生病并被追踪:医院网站的隐私分析

papers.title: DC-VAE, Fine-grained Anomaly Detection in Multivariate Time-Series with Dilated Convolutions and Variational Auto Encoders
papers.authors: Gastón García González, Sergio Martinez Tagliafico, Alicia Fernández, Gabriel Gómez, José Acuña, Pedro Casas
papers.abstract: Due to its unsupervised nature, anomaly detection plays a central role in cybersecurity, in particular on the detection of unknown attacks. A major source of cybersecurity data comes in the form of multivariate time-series (MTS), representing the temporal evolution of multiple, usually correlated measurements. Despite the many approaches available in the literature for time-series anomaly detection, the automatic detection of abnormal events in MTS remains a complex problem. In this paper we introduce DC-VAE, a novel approach to anomaly detection in MTS, leveraging convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and variational auto encoders (VAEs). DC-VAE detects anomalies in time-series data, exploiting temporal information without sacrificing computational and memory resources. In particular, instead of using recursive neural networks, large causal filters, or many layers, DC-VAE relies on dilated convolutions (dc) to capture long and short term phenomena in the data, avoiding complex and less-efficient deep architectures, simplifying learning. We evaluate dc-vae on the detection of anoma-lies on a large-scale, multi-dimensional network monitoring dataset collected at an operational mobile internet service provider (isp), where anomalous events were manually labeled during a time span of 7-months, at a five-minutes granularity. Results show the main properties and advantages introduced by VAEs for time-series anomaly detection, as well as the out-performance of dilated convolutions as compared to standard VAEs for time-series modeling.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于其不受监督的性质，异常检测在网络安全中起着重要作用，特别是在检测未知攻击方面。网络安全数据的一个主要来源是多变量时间序列(MTS ),代表多个通常相关的测量值的时间演变。尽管在文献中有许多方法可用于时间序列异常检测，但自动检测MTS中的异常事件仍然是一个复杂的问题。在本文中，我们介绍了DC-VAE，一种新的方法来异常检测的MTS，杠杆卷积神经网络(CNN)和变分自动编码器(VAEs)。DC-VAE检测时间序列数据中的异常，利用时间信息而不牺牲计算和内存资源。特别是，DC-VAE没有使用递归神经网络、大型因果滤波器或许多层，而是依靠扩张卷积(DC)来捕捉数据中的长期和短期现象，避免了复杂和低效的深度架构，简化了学习。我们评估了dc-vae在大规模多维网络监控数据集上的异常检测，该数据集是在一个可运营的移动互联网服务提供商(isp)处收集的，其中异常事件是在7个月的时间跨度内以5分钟的粒度手动标记的。结果显示了VAEs在时间序列异常检测中的主要特性和优势，以及与时间序列建模的标准VAEs相比，膨胀卷积的性能更好。
papers.title_zh: DC-VAE，用扩张卷积和变分自动编码器在多变量时间序列中的细粒度异常检测

papers.title: Measuring and Clustering Network Attackers using Medium-Interaction Honeypots
papers.authors: Zain Shamsi, Daniel Zhang, Daehyun Kyoung, Alex Liu
papers.abstract: Network honeypots are often used by information security teams to measure the threat landscape in order to secure their networks. With the advancement of honeypot development, today's medium-interaction honeypots provide a way for security teams and researchers to deploy these active defense tools that require little maintenance on a variety of protocols. In this work, we deploy such honeypots on five different protocols on the public Internet and study the intent and sophistication of the attacks we observe. We then use the information gained to develop a clustering approach that identifies correlations in attacker behavior to discover IPs that are highly likely to be controlled by a single operator, illustrating the advantage of using these honeypots for data collection.
papers.abstract_zh: 信息安全团队经常使用网络蜜罐来衡量威胁形势，以保护他们的网络。随着蜜罐开发的进步，今天的中等交互蜜罐为安全团队和研究人员提供了一种部署这些主动防御工具的方式，这些工具在各种协议上几乎不需要维护。在这项工作中，我们在公共互联网上的五种不同协议上部署了这样的蜜罐，并研究了我们观察到的攻击的意图和复杂性。然后，我们使用获得的信息开发一种聚类方法，识别攻击者行为的相关性，以发现极有可能由单个运营商控制的IP，说明使用这些蜜罐进行数据收集的优势。
papers.title_zh: 使用中等交互蜜罐测量和聚类网络攻击者

papers.title: What Scanners do at L7? Exploring Horizontal Honeypots for Security Monitoring
papers.authors: Thomas Favale, Danilo Giordano, Idilio Drago, Marco Mellia
papers.abstract: Honeypots are a common means to collect data useful for threat intelligence. Most efforts in this area rely on vertical systems and target a specific scenario or service to analyse data collected in such deployment. We here extend the analysis of the visibility of honeypots, by revisiting the problem from a horizontal perspective. We deploy a flexible honeypot system hosting multiple services, relying on the T-Pot project. We collect data for 5 months, recording millions of application requests from tens of thousands of sources. We compare if and how the attackers interact with multiple services. We observe attackers that always focus on one or few services, and others that target tens of services simultaneously. We dig further into the dataset, providing an initial horizontal analysis of brute-force attacks against multiple services. We show, for example, clear groups of attackers that rely on different password lists on different services. All in all, this work is our initial effort to build a horizontal system that can provide insights on attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 蜜罐是收集对威胁情报有用的数据的常用手段。该领域的大部分工作依赖于垂直系统，并针对特定场景或服务来分析在这种部署中收集的数据。我们在这里扩展了蜜罐可见性的分析，从水平的角度重新审视这个问题。我们依靠T-Pot项目部署了一个灵活的托管多种服务的蜜罐系统。我们收集了5个月的数据，记录了来自数万个来源的数百万个应用程序请求。我们比较攻击者是否以及如何与多个服务交互。我们观察到攻击者总是专注于一个或几个服务，而其他人则同时针对几十个服务。我们进一步挖掘数据集，提供了针对多个服务的暴力攻击的初步横向分析。例如，我们展示了依赖不同服务的不同密码列表的明确的攻击者群体。总而言之，这项工作是我们建立一个可以提供攻击洞察的横向系统的初步努力。
papers.title_zh: L7的扫描仪做什么？探索用于安全监控的水平蜜罐

papers.title: Towards NLP-based Processing of Honeypot Logs
papers.authors: Matteo Boffa, Giulia Milan, Luca Vassio, Idilio Drago, Marco Mellia, Zied Ben-Houidi
papers.abstract: Honeypots are active sensors deployed to obtain information about attacks. In their search for vulnerabilities, attackers generate large volumes of logs, whose analysis is time consuming and cumbersome. We here evaluate whether Natural Language Processing (NLP) approaches can provide meaningful representations to find common traits in attackers' activity. We consider a widely used SSH/Telnet honeypot to record more than 200000 sessions, including 61000 unique shell scripts, some containing sequences of more than 100 Bash commands. We first parse the sessions to separate Bash commands, options and parameters. Next, we project each session in a metric space opposing two common tools used in NLP: Bag of Words and Word2Vec. Last, we leverage a clustering algorithm to aggregate the sessions while offering an instrumental representation of the clustering process. In the end, we obtain few tens of clusters that we analyze to explain the attackers' goals, i.e., obtain system information, inject malicious accounts, download and run executables, etc. Our work is a first step towards automatically identifying attack patterns on honeypots, thus effectively supporting security activities.
papers.abstract_zh: 蜜罐是主动传感器，用于获取攻击信息。在寻找漏洞的过程中，攻击者会生成大量的日志，对这些日志的分析既耗时又繁琐。我们在这里评估自然语言处理(NLP)方法是否可以提供有意义的表示来发现攻击者活动中的共同特征。我们考虑一个广泛使用的SSH/Telnet蜜罐来记录超过200000个会话，包括61000个唯一的shell脚本，有些脚本包含超过100个Bash命令的序列。我们首先解析会话以分离Bash命令、选项和参数。接下来，我们将每个会话投影到一个度量空间中，与NLP中使用的两个常用工具相对:单词包和Word2Vec。最后，我们利用聚类算法来聚合会话，同时提供聚类过程的工具性表示。最后，我们获得了几十个群集，我们分析这些群集来解释攻击者的目标，即获取系统信息、注入恶意帐户、下载和运行可执行文件等。我们的工作是自动识别蜜罐攻击模式的第一步，从而有效地支持安全活动。
papers.title_zh: 基于自然语言处理的蜜罐日志

papers.title: No Time for Downtime: Understanding Post-Attack Behaviors by Customers of Managed DNS Providers
papers.authors: Muhammad Yasir Muzayan Haq, Mattijs Jonker, Roland van Rijswijk-Deij, kc claffy, Lambert J. M. Nieuwenhuis, Abhishta Abhishta
papers.abstract: We leverage large-scale DNS measurement data on authoritative name servers to study the reactions of domain owners affected by the 2016 DDoS attack on Dyn. We use industry sources of information about domain names to study the influence of factors such as industry sector and website popularity on the willingness of domain managers to invest in high availability of online services. Specifically, we correlate business characteristics of domain owners with their resilience strategies in the wake of DoS attacks affecting their domains. Our analysis revealed correlations between two properties of domains - industry sector and popularity - and post-attack strategies. Specifically, owners of more popular domains were more likely to re-act to increase the diversity of their authoritative DNS service for their domains. Similarly, domains in certain industry sectors were more likely to seek out such diversity in their DNS service. For example, domains categorized as General News were nearly 6 times more likely to re-act than domains categorized as Internet Services. Our results can inform managed DNS and other network service providers regarding the potential impact of downtime on their customer portfolio.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们利用权威名称服务器上的大规模DNS测量数据，研究受2016年Dyn DDoS攻击影响的域名所有者的反应。我们使用有关域名的行业信息来源来研究行业部门和网站受欢迎程度等因素对域名管理人员投资高可用性在线服务的意愿的影响。具体来说，我们将域所有者的业务特征与其在DoS攻击影响其域后的弹性策略相关联。我们的分析揭示了域名的两个属性——行业和受欢迎程度——与攻击后策略之间的相关性。具体来说，更受欢迎的域名的所有者更有可能采取行动，增加其域名的权威DNS服务的多样性。同样，某些行业领域更有可能在其DNS服务中寻求这种多样性。例如，归类为一般新闻的领域比归类为互联网服务的领域更有可能再次行动。我们的结果可以告知托管DNS和其他网络服务提供商停机对其客户组合的潜在影响。
papers.title_zh: 没有停机时间:了解托管DNS提供商客户的攻击后行为

papers.title: BEERR: Bench of Embedded system Experiments for Reproducible Research
papers.authors: Paul Olivier, Xuan-Huy Ngo, Aurélien Francillon
papers.abstract: Reproducing experiments is a key component to further research and knowledge. Testbeds provide a controlled and configurable environment in which experiments can be conducted in a repeatable and observable manner. In the field of system security, and binary analysis, several challenges hinder reproducible research, in particular when code is interacting tightly with low level hardware and physical devices. In those conditions, dynamic analysis techniques often require the physical device to correctly complete (hardware-in-the-loop). In recent years many re-hosting techniques have been developed and evaluating their respective performance requires to compare them with an hardware-in-the-loop evaluation. However, it is challenging to share, acquire or maintain the original devices. In this paper, we tackle this problem by proposing a new infrastructure, and online service called “Bench of Embedded system Experiments for Reproducible Research” (BEERR). It aims to both make physical devices available remotely and facilitate the setup and reproduction of published experiments.
papers.abstract_zh: 再现实验是进一步研究和知识的关键组成部分。测试床提供了一个受控和可配置的环境，在其中可以以可重复和可观察的方式进行实验。在系统安全和二进制分析领域，一些挑战阻碍了可重复的研究，特别是当代码与低级硬件和物理设备紧密交互时。在这些条件下，动态分析技术通常需要物理设备来正确完成(硬件在环)。近年来，已经开发了许多重新托管技术，评估它们各自的性能需要将它们与硬件在环评估进行比较。然而，共享、获取或维护原始设备是一项挑战。在本文中，我们通过提出一种新的基础设施和在线服务来解决这个问题，这种服务被称为“用于可再现研究的嵌入式系统实验平台”(BEERR)。它的目标是使物理设备可以远程使用，并促进已发表实验的建立和复制。
papers.title_zh: BEERR:可重复研究的嵌入式系统实验平台

papers.title: A Comparative Analysis of UNECE WP.29 R155 and ISO/SAE 21434
papers.authors: Gianpiero Costantino, Marco De Vincenzi, Ilaria Matteucci
papers.abstract: In the last years, the increasing number of cyber-attacks on vehicles has shown the importance to implement security solutions within the automotive domain. To reduce the risk that a vehicle or its components get attacked and compromised, two cybersecurity references have been released: UNECE WP.29 R155 and ISO/SAE 21434. In March 2021, the United Nations Economic Commission for Europe (UNECE) published the WP.29 R155 regulation, mandatory in some countries from July 2022 to homologate vehicles' cybersecurity. Officially released in August 2021, ISO/SAE 21434 is a cybersecurity standard which aims to be widely accepted and applied in the engineering of electrical and electronic (E/E) systems for road vehicles. In this work, we describe and analyze the two norms, comparing them to show their points of contact and differences. From our analysis, the two documents, spanned both along the entire life-cycle of a vehicle, can be considered overlapped in some processes, but also complementary to increase the cybersecurity of the vehicle. Finally, we provide a use case of application of the regulation and the standard on an E/E system, reporting the possible limits and implementations.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的几年里，针对汽车的网络攻击越来越多，这表明了在汽车领域实施安全解决方案的重要性。为了降低车辆或其组件受到攻击和危害的风险，发布了两个网络安全参考:UNECE WP.29 R155和ISO/SAE 21434。2021年3月，联合国欧洲经济委员会(UNECE)发布了WP.29 R155法规，从2022年7月起在一些国家强制认证车辆的网络安全。ISO/SAE 21434于2021年8月正式发布，是一项网络安全标准，旨在被广泛接受并应用于道路车辆的电气和电子(E/E)系统工程。在这篇文章中，我们描述和分析了这两个规范，比较了它们的联系点和不同点。从我们的分析来看，这两个文件跨越了车辆的整个生命周期，在某些过程中可以被认为是重叠的，但在增加车辆的网络安全方面也是互补的。最后，我们提供了一个在E/E系统上应用法规和标准的用例，报告了可能的限制和实现。
papers.title_zh: 欧洲经委会WP.29 R155和ISO/SAE 21434的比较分析

papers.title: ATVSA: Vehicle Driver Profiling for Situational Awareness
papers.authors: Rashid Khan, Neetesh Saxena, Omer F. Rana, Prosanta Gope
papers.abstract: Increasing connectivity and automation in vehicles leads to a greater potential attack surface. Such vulnerabilities within vehicles can also be used for auto-theft, increasing the potential for attackers to disable anti-theft mechanisms implemented by vehicle manufacturers. We utilize patterns derived from Controller Area Network (CAN) bus traffic to verify driver “behavior”, as a basis to prevent vehicle theft. Our proposed model uses semi-supervised learning that continuously profiles a driver, using features extracted from CAN bus traffic. We have selected 15 key features and obtained an accuracy of 99% using a dataset comprising a total of 51 features across 10 different drivers. We use a number of data analysis algorithms, such as J48, Random Forest, JRip and clustering, using 94K records. Our results show that J48 is the best performing algorithm in terms of training and testing (1.95 seconds and 0.44 seconds recorded, respectively). We also analyze the effect of using a sliding window on algorithm performance, altering the size of the window to identify the impact on prediction accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 车辆的连通性和自动化程度越来越高，导致潜在的攻击面越来越大。车辆内的这种漏洞也可用于汽车盗窃，增加了攻击者使车辆制造商实施的防盗机制失效的可能性。我们利用来自控制器局域网(CAN)总线流量的模式来验证驾驶员的“行为”，作为防止车辆盗窃的基础。我们提出的模型使用半监督学习，利用从CAN总线流量中提取的特征，连续描述驾驶员。我们选择了15个关键特征，并使用包含10个不同驾驶员的总共51个特征的数据集获得了99%的准确度。我们使用了许多数据分析算法，如J48、随机森林、JRip和聚类，使用了94K记录。我们的结果表明，J48是在训练和测试方面表现最好的算法(分别记录了1.95秒和0.44秒)。我们还分析了使用滑动窗口对算法性能的影响，改变窗口的大小以确定对预测准确性的影响。
papers.title_zh: ATVSA:用于态势感知的车辆驾驶员特征分析

papers.title: Tampering Detection for Automotive Exhaust Aftertreatment Systems using Long Short-Term Memory Predictive Networks
papers.authors: Roland Bolboaca, Piroska Haller, Dimitris Kontses, Alexandros Papageorgiou-Koutoulas, Stylianos Doulgeris, Nikolaos Zingopis, Zissis Samaras
papers.abstract: The act of tampering can be defined as a single event ranging from actions such as resetting the reading of an odometer to more advanced and long-term actions such as manipulation of the vehicle's emission control systems. Tampering, however, requires certain interventions and changes to be made on the vehicle. Recently, the sophistication of certain vehicle sub-systems such as the emission control system, have also increased the sophistication of the tampering devices. Nowadays, tampering involves not only physical changes to certain automotive sub-systems, but also the manipulation of communication signals in order to hide the presence of tampering devices. This paper presents a detection method addressing tampering of the Automotive Exhaust Aftertreatment Systems. The proposed approach leverages Long Short-Term Memory predictive networks as detection models together with Cumulative Sum control charts. The proposed detectors were validated on datasets produced by a state-of-the-art aftertreatment simulation model of a heavy-duty vehicle. The datasets encompass diverse driving scenarios alongside known and unknown (e.g., possible future) tampering methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 篡改行为可定义为单个事件，从重置里程表读数等行为到更高级和长期的行为，如操纵车辆的排放控制系统。然而，篡改需要对车辆进行某些干预和改变。最近，诸如排放控制系统的某些车辆子系统的复杂性也增加了篡改装置的复杂性。如今，篡改不仅包括对某些汽车子系统的物理改变，还包括操纵通信信号以隐藏篡改设备的存在。提出了一种针对汽车尾气后处理系统篡改的检测方法。所提出的方法利用长短期记忆预测网络作为检测模型以及累积和控制图。提出的检测器在由重型车辆的最新后处理仿真模型产生的数据集上得到验证。这些数据集包含不同的驾驶场景以及已知和未知(例如，可能的未来)的篡改方法。
papers.title_zh: 使用长短期记忆预测网络的汽车排气后处理系统的篡改检测

papers.title: Fuzzing Malicious Driving Behavior to find Vulnerabilities in Collision Avoidance Systems
papers.authors: Ivan F. Salgado, Nicanor Quijano, Daniel J. Fremont, Alvaro A. Cárdenas
papers.abstract: In security research, it is difficult to design a system that can anticipate future actions by attackers. This is particularly true for cyber-physical systems because adversaries can create an infinite variety of physical environmental conditions to attack a system. We need to develop a more principled approach for evaluating and testing control algorithms against physical adversarial situations to design attack-resilient control systems. In this paper, we leverage the tools created by the falsification community and re-purpose them to consider finding attacks. Falsification provides a formal methodology to identify inputs that will violate the requirements of a system. In particular, we look at how cruise control algorithms respond to actions taken by malicious drivers that want to create an accident (while avoiding crashing themselves). We propose a scenario-based simulation and metric temporal logic to identify vulnerabilities in three cruise control with collision avoidance control strategies.
papers.abstract_zh: 在安全研究中，很难设计一个可以预测攻击者未来行动的系统。对于网络物理系统来说尤其如此，因为对手可以创造无限多种物理环境条件来攻击系统。我们需要开发一种更有原则的方法来评估和测试控制算法对抗物理对抗情况，以设计抗攻击的控制系统。在本文中，我们利用伪造社区创建的工具，并重新利用它们来考虑寻找攻击。证伪提供了一种正式的方法来识别违反系统要求的输入。特别是，我们看看巡航控制算法如何对恶意司机想要制造事故的行为做出反应(同时避免自己撞车)。我们提出了一个基于场景的模拟和度量时序逻辑，以确定三个具有防撞控制策略的巡航控制中的漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 模糊恶意驾驶行为以发现防撞系统中的漏洞

papers.title: bAdvertisement: Attacking Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems Using Print Advertisements
papers.authors: Ben Nassi, Jacob Shams, Raz Ben-Netanel, Yuval Elovici
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present bAdvertisement, a novel attack method against advanced driver-assistance systems (ADASs). bAdvertisement is performed as a supply chain attack via a compromised computer in a printing house, by embedding a “phantom” object in a print advertisement. When the compromised print advertisement is observed by an ADAS in a passing car, an undesired reaction is triggered from the ADAS. We analyze state-of-the-art object detectors and show that they do not take color or context into account in object detection. Our validation of these findings on Mobileye 630 PRO shows that this ADAS also fails to take color or context into account. Then, we show how an attacker can take advantage of these findings to execute an attack on a commercial ADAS, by embedding a phantom road sign in a print advertisement, which causes a car equipped with Mobileye 630 PRO to trigger a false notification to slow down. Finally, we discuss multiple countermeasures which can be deployed in order to mitigate the effect of our proposed attack.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了一种新的针对高级驾驶辅助系统(ADASs)的攻击方法bAdvertisement。恶意广告是通过在印刷广告中嵌入一个“幻影”对象，经由印刷厂中受损的计算机进行的供应链攻击。当经过的汽车中的ADAS观察到受损的印刷广告时，ADAS触发不期望的反应。我们分析了最先进的目标检测器，并表明它们在目标检测中没有考虑颜色或上下文。我们在Mobileye 630 PRO上对这些发现的验证表明，这种ADAS也未能将颜色或上下文考虑在内。然后，我们展示了攻击者如何利用这些发现对商业ADAS进行攻击，方法是在平面广告中嵌入虚幻的路标，导致配备Mobileye 630 PRO的汽车触发错误通知减速。最后，我们讨论了可以部署的多种对策，以减轻我们提出的攻击的影响。
papers.title_zh: 恶意广告:利用印刷广告攻击高级驾驶辅助系统

papers.title: Towards an Operations-Aware Experimentation Methodology
papers.authors: Michael Collins, Alefiya Hussain, Stephen Schwab
papers.abstract: Security Operations Centers (SOCs) serve a critical role in protecting enterprise networks and systems. Despite this critical role, only a limited number of researchers in the field have an awareness of the obstacles and challenges in applying cyber ranges and cybersecurity testbeds to the area of SOC training, exercises and evaluation. This paper introduces a systematic approach to incorporating SOCs into cybersecu-rity experiments, including both training and evaluation. We present a reference SOC model, an implementation of that model and downloadable software distributions suitable for deploying on cyber ranges, and guidance towards a methodol-ogy to promote rigorous experiments including those involving human cyber operators. Metrics focused on analyst event load are presented in the context of measuring the impact of new threats, technologies and procedures on SOC performance. Collectively, these contributions serve as a basis for future work to engage the research and operational communities to work together to advance the state-of-the-art of SOC technologies and SOC operators.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全运营中心(SOC)在保护企业网络和系统方面发挥着至关重要的作用。尽管这一作用至关重要，但该领域只有有限数量的研究人员意识到将网络靶场和网络安全试验台应用于SOC培训、演习和评估领域的障碍和挑战。本文介绍了一种将SOC整合到网络安全实验中的系统方法，包括训练和评估。我们提出了一个参考SOC模型、该模型的实现和适合在赛博靶场部署的可下载软件分发版，以及促进严格实验(包括涉及人类赛博操作员的实验)的方法指南。侧重于分析师事件负载的指标在测量新威胁、技术和程序对SOC性能的影响的背景下呈现。总的来说，这些贡献为未来的工作奠定了基础，使研究和运营社区能够共同努力，推动SOC技术和SOC运营商的发展。
papers.title_zh: 走向作战意识实验方法

papers.title: Applying Process Discovery to Cybersecurity Training: An Experience Report
papers.authors: Martin Macák, Radek Oslejsek, Barbora Buhnova
papers.abstract: Quality improvement of practical cybersecurity training is challenging due to the process-oriented nature of this learning domain. Event logs provide only a sparse preview of trainees' behavior in a form that is difficult to analyze. Process mining has great potential in converting events into behavioral graphs that could provide better cognitive features for understanding users' behavior than the raw data. However, practical usability for learning analytics is affected by many aspects. This paper aims to provide an experience report summarizing key features and obstacles in integrating process discovery into cyber ranges. We describe our lessons learned from applying process mining techniques to data captured in a cyber range, which we have been developing and operating for almost ten years. We discuss lessons learned from the whole workflow that covers data preprocessing, data mapping, and the utilization of process models for the post-training analysis of Capture the Flag games. Tactics addressing scalability are explicitly discussed because scalability has proven to be a challenging task. Interactive data mapping and Capture the Flag specific features are used to address this issue.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于这一学习领域面向过程的性质，提高实际网络安全培训的质量具有挑战性。事件日志仅仅以一种难以分析的形式提供了受训者行为的稀疏预览。过程挖掘在将事件转化为行为图方面具有巨大的潜力，与原始数据相比，行为图可以为理解用户行为提供更好的认知特征。然而，学习分析的实际可用性受到许多方面的影响。本文旨在提供一份经验报告，总结将过程发现集成到赛博靶场的关键特征和障碍。我们描述了将过程挖掘技术应用于网络范围内捕获的数据所获得的经验教训，我们已经开发和运行了近十年。我们讨论了从整个工作流程中获得的经验教训，包括数据预处理、数据映射以及利用流程模型进行夺旗游戏的后培训分析。明确讨论了解决可伸缩性的策略，因为可伸缩性已被证明是一项具有挑战性的任务。交互式数据映射和捕获标志的特定功能用于解决这个问题。
papers.title_zh: 将过程发现应用于网络安全培训:经验报告

papers.title: Programmatic Description Language for Cyber Range Topology Creation
papers.authors: Andrea Dalla Costa, Jarkko Kuusijärvi
papers.abstract: Cyber Ranges are becoming a fundamental part of cybersecurity training and preparations, since they allow testing different scenarios in a safe, isolated and repro-ducible environment. We can expect to see cyber ranges used even more in cybersecurity trainings and testing of various system deployments, which also means increasing amount of scenarios to be developed. It is beneficial to make the scenario development/generation easier and faster for the human operators and automated generation alike to support the different use cases requirements. This paper analyses the currently available open-source and/or research community solutions for defining topologies for cyber ranges and presents the enhanced description language developed. The description language aims to sim-plify the scenario creation process for large networks with features that support quick and easy specification of the initial topology. This paper describes the enhanced features that enable the language to describe topologies in a compact form and presents initial test topology creation in lab settings deployed in OpenStack environment.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络靶场正成为网络安全培训和准备的基本组成部分，因为它们允许在安全、隔离和可再现的环境中测试不同的场景。我们可以期待看到cyber ranges更多地用于网络安全培训和各种系统部署的测试，这也意味着要开发的场景越来越多。对于人工操作员和自动生成来说，使场景开发/生成更容易和更快以支持不同的用例需求是有益的。本文分析了当前可用的开源和/或研究社区解决方案，用于定义赛博靶场的拓扑结构，并介绍了开发的增强描述语言。描述语言旨在简化大型网络的场景创建过程，并具有支持快速、简单地指定初始拓扑的功能。本文描述了使该语言能够以简洁的形式描述拓扑的增强功能，并介绍了在OpenStack环境中部署的实验室设置中的初始测试拓扑创建。
papers.title_zh: 用于赛博靶场拓扑创建的程序描述语言

papers.title: An Industrial Control System Physical Testbed for Naval Defense Cybersecurity Research
papers.authors: Franck Sicard, Estelle Hotellier, Julien Francq
papers.abstract: Industrial Control Systems are used nowadays in many safety-critical applications, such as Naval Defense systems. These latter need high-level protection against cyberattacks, which can lead to potential disastrous consequences (e.g., components sabotage, Denial of Service, human deaths). Thus, these infrastructures, before being deployed in mission, need intensive security testing and validation. Moreover, cybersecurity research is required to anticipate future attacks. The research of new countermeasures has to be led on realistic platforms for getting precise and fruitful feedback for cyberdefense. This paper describes an Industrial Control System testbed for Naval Defense cybersecurity research. This realistic testbed implements a representative model of a warship, on which practical attacks and related countermeasures can be safely benchmarked. After describing the features of our physical testbed, we illustrate its relevance by describing four different attack scenarios. This testbed will be very useful in future works to elaborate and validate innovative cyberdefense measures (like knowledge-based and behavior-based intrusion detection) against network and physical process attacks, especially by generating representative datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，工业控制系统被用于许多安全关键的应用中，例如海军防御系统。后者需要针对网络攻击的高级别保护，这可能导致潜在的灾难性后果(例如，组件破坏、拒绝服务、人员死亡)。因此，这些基础设施在部署到特派团之前，需要进行密集的安全测试和验证。此外，网络安全研究需要预测未来的攻击。新对策的研究必须在现实的平台上进行，以便为网络防御获得精确而有效的反馈。本文描述了一个用于海军防御网络安全研究的工业控制系统试验床。这个真实的测试床实现了一个典型的战舰模型，在这个模型上可以安全地测试实际的攻击和相关的对策。在描述了我们的物理测试床的特性之后，我们通过描述四种不同的攻击场景来说明它的相关性。这个测试床在未来的工作中非常有用，可以详细说明和验证针对网络和物理过程攻击的创新网络防御措施(如基于知识和基于行为的入侵检测)，特别是通过生成代表性数据集。
papers.title_zh: 用于海军防御网络安全研究的工业控制系统物理试验台

papers.title: Building an Ontology for Cyber Defence Exercises
papers.authors: Gulkhara Babayeva, Kaie Maennel, Olaf Manuel Maennel
papers.abstract: Over the course of recent years, the volume of cyber attacks has increased. The Cyber Defence Exercises (CDX) help organisations evaluate their security capacity by engaging in real-life cyber attack scenarios and improving the skills of the cybersecurity specialists and security measures to protect their critical systems from any potential cyber attacks. During such exercises, cybersecurity data is generated in structured and unstructured forms ranging from system-generated logs to situational reports. However, there is no united governance of all the generated data within the CDX context, which may lead to knowledge mismanagement. In this paper, we develop ontology-based structured knowledge management within the CDX environment to provide common understanding, integration, and sharing of data in this domain. The CDX ontology is developed with RDF and OWL languages assembling the data in an organised and machine-understandable format which will be very handy for computational linguistics. The validation of the ontology is conducted by ontology reasoning, competency questions, and, most importantly, expert evaluation. The CDX ontology passes the validation methods successfully and is thought to be a valuable asset for future research in its domain.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，网络攻击的数量有所增加。网络防御演习(CDX)通过参与真实的网络攻击场景，提高网络安全专家的技能和安全措施，帮助组织评估其安全能力，以保护其关键系统免受任何潜在的网络攻击。在此类演习中，网络安全数据以结构化和非结构化的形式生成，从系统生成的日志到情况报告不等。然而，在CDX环境中，没有对所有生成的数据进行统一治理，这可能导致知识管理不善。在本文中，我们在CDX环境中开发了基于本体的结构化知识管理，以提供该领域中数据的共同理解、集成和共享。CDX本体是用RDF和OWL语言开发的，以一种有组织的机器可理解的格式组装数据，这对于计算语言学来说非常方便。本体的验证通过本体推理、能力问题以及最重要的专家评估来进行。CDX本体成功地通过了验证方法，被认为是该领域未来研究的宝贵财富。
papers.title_zh: 为网络防御演习建立一个本体

papers.title: AWS EC2 Public Cloud Cyber Range Deployment
papers.authors: Razvan Beuran, Zhe Zhang, Yasuo Tan
papers.abstract: Cybersecurity training activities require specialized environments, typically called cyber ranges, to make it possible for trainees to acquire not only security knowledge, but also practical security skills. However, the setup of these training environments is a tedious task, which hinders the wider use of cyber ranges for security training. In its turn, this has a negative impact on the development of the cybersecurity workforce that is exceedingly necessary in our network-centric society. In this paper we introduce our approach of using the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) public cloud for cyber range deployment, thus making it possible to conduct cybersecurity training activities at scale and at a relatively low cost. Our system was implemented by extending the functionality of the cyber range instantiation system CyRIS that is available as open source on GitHub. We evaluated our implementation from several perspectives, demonstrating that public cloud deployment can provide similar functionality and performance compared to local server or private cloud deployment, while avoiding the high purchase and management costs associated to those.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络安全培训活动需要专门的环境，通常称为网络靶场，使受训人员不仅能够获得安全知识，而且能够获得实用的安全技能。然而，设置这些训练环境是一项繁琐的任务，这阻碍了更广泛地使用赛博靶场进行安全训练。反过来，这又对网络安全人员的发展产生了负面影响，而这在我们这个以网络为中心的社会中是极其必要的。在本文中，我们介绍了使用亚马逊网络服务(AWS)弹性计算云(EC2)公共云进行网络范围部署的方法，从而使大规模和相对较低的成本开展网络安全培训活动成为可能。我们的系统是通过扩展cyber range实例化系统CyRIS的功能实现的，cyr is在GitHub上是开源的。我们从多个角度评估了我们的实施，证明公共云部署可以提供与本地服务器或私有云部署类似的功能和性能，同时避免了与之相关的高昂购买和管理成本。
papers.title_zh: AWS EC2公共云网络范围部署

papers.title: Deceptive directories and "vulnerable" logs: a honeypot study of the LDAP and log4j attack landscape
papers.authors: Shreyas Srinivasa, Jens Myrup Pedersen, Emmanouil Vasilomanolakis
papers.abstract: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) has been widely used to query directory services. It is mainly utilized for reading, writing, and searching directory services like the Active Directory. The vast adoption of LDAP for authentication has entailed several attack attempts like injection attacks and unauthorized access due to third-party key storage. Furthermore, recent vulnerabilities discovered in libraries like the Log4j can lead adversaries to obtain unauthorized information from the directory services through pivoting attacks.
