Moreover, the LDAP can be configured to operate on UDP, motivating adversaries to exploit it for Distributed Reflection Denial of Service attacks (DRDoS). This paper presents a study of attacks on the LDAP by deploying honeypots that simulate multiple profiles that support the LDAP service and correlating the attack datasets obtained from honeypots deployed by the Honeynet Project community. We observe a total of 39,388 malicious events targeting the honeypots and discover 273 unique attack sources performing pivot attacks in a period of one month.
papers.abstract_zh: 轻量级目录访问协议(LDAP)已被广泛用于查询目录服务。它主要用于读取、写入和搜索目录服务，如Active Directory。由于第三方密钥存储，大量采用LDAP进行身份验证已经招致了多次攻击尝试，如注入攻击和未经授权的访问。此外，最近在Log4j等库中发现的漏洞会导致对手通过旋转攻击从目录服务获取未经授权的信息。此外，LDAP可以被配置为在UDP上运行，促使对手利用它进行分布式反射拒绝服务攻击(DRDoS)。本文通过部署模拟支持LDAP服务的多个配置文件的蜜罐，并关联从蜜网项目社区部署的蜜罐中获得的攻击数据集，来研究对LDAP的攻击。我们观察到总共有39，388起针对蜜罐的恶意事件，并在一个月内发现了273个执行中枢攻击的独特攻击源。
papers.title_zh: 欺骗性目录和“易受攻击的”日志:LDAP和log4j攻击前景的蜜罐研究

papers.title: AI-based Sound-Squatting Attack Made Possible
papers.authors: Rodolfo V. Valentim, Idilio Drago, Federico Cerutti, Marco Mellia
papers.abstract: Domain squatting is an efficient attacking technique that relies on the similarity between domain names to trick users. Sound-squatting is a type of domain squatting that explores the similarity in the pronunciation of domains. Sound-squatting requires better approaches to protect users, and indeed it demands more research attention due to popularization of intelligent speakers and the increase of voice-based navigation. In this work we propose an AI-based methodology to automatically build sound-squatting candidates. We leverage recent results of AI, namely the ability to translate text, to automatically generate possible sound-squatting candidates. We evaluate our methodology by verifying the generated candidates and classifying them according to their threat class. We generate over twenty thousand candidates from popular domains, out of which, 7% are found active at the time of the analysis. Active domains include “Parked/Ads/For-Sale” domains. We thus show that automatic sound-squatting generation is useful to proactively check and limit the abuse of such offences.
papers.abstract_zh: 域名抢注是一种高效的攻击技术，它依靠域名之间的相似性来欺骗用户。声音域名抢注是域名抢注的一种类型，它探索域名发音的相似性。声音占用需要更好的方法来保护用户，并且由于智能扬声器的普及和基于语音的导航的增加，它确实需要更多的研究关注。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种基于人工智能的方法来自动构建候选音。我们利用人工智能的最新成果，即翻译文本的能力，来自动生成可能的声音占用候选对象。我们通过验证生成的候选项并根据其威胁类别对其进行分类来评估我们的方法。我们从热门领域中产生超过两万个候选项，其中7%在分析时被发现是活跃的。活跃域名包括“停车/广告/待售”域名。因此，我们表明，自动音蹲生成对于主动检查和限制此类犯罪的滥用是有用的。
papers.title_zh: 基于人工智能的声音抢注攻击成为可能

papers.title: The Importance of the Job Role in Social Media Cybersecurity Training
papers.authors: Fai Ben Salamah, Marco A. Palomino, Maria Papadaki, Steven Furnell
papers.abstract: Social media has become embedded in our everyday lives, personal activities and the workplace. Thus, educating users on emerging cybersecurity challenges for social media has become imperative. As such, we have investigated the feasibility of an awareness-raising and adaptive cybersecurity training system. Our investigation is aided by a questionnaire, which was administered online using Google Forms. We collected answers from 641 employees from a variety of sectors: education, healthcare, leadership and management, arts, entertainment, police and the military. We found that a one-size-fits-all training approach is highly ineffective, as people's understanding and knowledge can vary greatly. Thus, we have proceeded to identify the factors that influence the success of any given approach. Information such as gender, age, education level, job roles, and training preferences seem essential considerations for developing a robust training strategy. Our investigation concludes that “job role” is the most significant factor associated with people's preferences and perceptions in cybersecurity training. Also, people appear to be in favour of adaptive training. Moreover, a mixed delivery approach is likely to be welcomed.
papers.abstract_zh: 社交媒体已经深入我们的日常生活、个人活动和工作场所。因此，就社交媒体面临的新出现的网络安全挑战对用户进行教育已成为当务之急。因此，我们调查了提高认识和适应性网络安全培训系统的可行性。我们的调查得到了一份问卷的帮助，这份问卷是使用Google Forms在线管理的。我们收集了来自不同领域的641名员工的回答:教育、医疗保健、领导和管理、艺术、娱乐、警察和军队。我们发现，一刀切的培训方法是非常无效的，因为人们的理解和知识可能会有很大差异。因此，我们已经着手确定影响任何给定方法成功的因素。性别、年龄、教育水平、工作角色和培训偏好等信息似乎是制定稳健培训策略的重要考虑因素。我们的调查结论是，“工作角色”是与人们在网络安全培训中的偏好和认知相关的最重要的因素。此外，人们似乎赞成适应性训练。此外，混合交付方式可能会受到欢迎。
papers.title_zh: 社交媒体网络安全培训中工作角色的重要性

papers.title: Introduction to Information Security: From Formal Curriculum to Organisational Awareness
papers.authors: Petrus M. J. Delport, Johan Van Niekerk, Rayne Reid
papers.abstract: Many organisations responded to the recent global pandemic by moving operations online. This has led to increased exposure to information security-related risks. There is thus an increased need to ensure organisational information security awareness programs are up to date and relevant to the needs of the intended target audience. The advent of online educational providers has similarly placed increased pressure on the formal educational sector to ensure course content is updated to remain relevant. Such processes of academic reflection and review should consider formal curriculum standards and guidelines in order to ensure wide relevance. This paper presents a case study of the review of an Introduction to Information Security course. This review is informed by the Information Security and Assurance knowledge area of the ACM/IEEE Computer Science 2013 curriculum standard. The paper presents lessons learned during this review process to serve as a guide for future reviews of this nature. The authors assert that these lessons learned can also be of value during the review of organisational information security awareness programs.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多组织通过将业务转移到网上来应对最近的全球疫情。这导致暴露于信息安全相关风险的风险增加。因此，越来越需要确保组织的信息安全意识计划是最新的，并与预定目标受众的需求相关。在线教育提供商的出现同样给正规教育部门带来了更大的压力，要求确保课程内容得到更新以保持相关性。这种学术反思和审查过程应考虑正式的课程标准和准则，以确保广泛的相关性。本文介绍了一个案例研究的审查介绍信息安全课程。本综述参考了ACM/IEEE计算机科学2013课程标准的信息安全和保证知识领域。本文件介绍了在这一审查过程中吸取的经验教训，作为今后这类审查的指南。作者断言，这些经验教训在审查组织信息安全意识计划时也是有价值的。
papers.title_zh: 信息安全导论:从正式课程到组织意识

papers.title: Exploring Gamification Elements to Enhance User Motivation in a Cyber Security Learning Platform Through Focus Group Interviews
papers.authors: Rasmus Broholm, Michael Christensen, Lene Tolstrup Sørensen
papers.abstract: A rising demand for cyber security specialists, along with a wide selection of self-paced learning platforms available online, creates the ideal setting for pursuing a career in cyber security. A significant number of popular training platforms have implemented gamification theories to motivate and engage their users. The various approaches and strategies of implementing gamification elements in the most notable platforms, provide an interesting insight in relation to the effect of different procedures. The focus of this paper is to explore the impact of novel gamification elements discovered through design workshops involving participants with beginner or intermediate experience in the field. The workshops yielded interesting and unexpected new ideas with a high potential of eliciting a user response of higher motivation and retention.
papers.abstract_zh: 对网络安全专家不断增长的需求，以及在线提供的各种自定进度学习平台，为从事网络安全职业创造了理想的环境。大量流行的训练平台已经实施了游戏化理论来激励和吸引他们的用户。在最著名的平台中实现游戏化元素的各种方法和策略，提供了关于不同程序的效果的有趣见解。本文的重点是探索通过设计研讨会发现的新游戏化元素的影响，这些设计研讨会涉及具有该领域初级或中级经验的参与者。研讨会产生了有趣和意想不到的新想法，很有可能引发用户更高的动机和保留率。
papers.title_zh: 通过焦点小组访谈探索游戏化元素以增强网络安全学习平台中的用户动机

papers.title: Remotizing and Virtualizing Chips and Circuits for Hardware-based Capture-the-Flag Challenges
papers.authors: Gianluca Roascio, Samuele Yves Cerini, Paolo Prinetto
papers.abstract: In the very rapid digital revolution we are experiencing, the availability of cybersecurity experts becomes critical in every organization and at multiple levels. However, classical and theory-oriented training seems to lack effectiveness and power of attraction, while professional selection and training processes based on cybersecurity gamification are being successfully experimented, among which Capture-the-Flag (CTF) competitions certainly stand out. Nevertheless, careful analysis reveals that such initiatives have a major shortcoming in addressing security issues when training people to tackle hardware-related security issues. Several motivations can be identified, including the inadequate technical knowledge of the White Teams charged of the challenges preparations, and the evident logistic problems posed by the availability of real hardware devices when the numbers of trainees significantly scales up. This paper presents a platform able to provide as a service hardware-based CTF challenges and exercises, involving circuits and chips that can be physically connected to a server or simulated, to deal with topics such as hardware bugs, flaws and backdoors, vulnerabilities in test infrastructures, and side-channel attacks. The platform is presented from a technical perspective, and data for deducting related efficiency, stability and scalability are offered.
papers.abstract_zh: 在我们正在经历的快速数字革命中，网络安全专家的可用性在每个组织和多个层面都变得至关重要。然而，经典的和以理论为导向的培训似乎缺乏有效性和吸引力，而基于网络安全游戏化的职业选择和培训过程正在成功地进行实验，其中夺旗(CTF)比赛无疑是突出的。然而，仔细的分析表明，当训练人们处理与硬件相关的安全问题时，这样的计划在处理安全问题方面有一个主要的缺点。可以确定几个动机，包括负责挑战准备的白人团队的技术知识不足，以及当受训人员数量显著增加时，实际硬件设备的可用性带来的明显的后勤问题。本文介绍了一个平台，该平台能够提供基于硬件的CTF挑战和练习，涉及可以物理连接到服务器或模拟的电路和芯片，以处理硬件错误、缺陷和后门、测试基础设施中的漏洞以及侧信道攻击等主题。从技术角度介绍了该平台，并提供了用于推断相关效率、稳定性和可扩展性的数据。
papers.title_zh: 对芯片和电路进行重新建模和虚拟化，以应对基于硬件的夺旗挑战

papers.title: Aligning a Serious Game, Secure Programming and CyBOK-Linked Learning Outcomes
papers.authors: Léon McGregor, Sheung Chi Chan, Szymon Wlodarczyk, Manuel Maarek
papers.abstract: The increased need for cybersecurity professionals and the necessity to raise the general security awareness of software developers underlines the importance of exploring new approaches for secure programming education. In this paper, we present the Citadel Programming Lab which com-prises a GitLab instance for simulated secure programming tasks and a tower defence game. Whithin the lab we inte-grated guidance linked to CyBOK, a knowledgebase which organises and presents cybersecurity topics, to introduce learners to fundamental security and secure programming concepts. We discuss the design approach of using the game as a motivation to engage with the materials but also as the vehicle for introducing key cybersecurity concepts to assist students in tackling the secure programming tasks embedded in the lab. We present the result of a focus group discussion evaluation of the approach which confirms the pertinence of the CyBOK linkage and the suitability of the serious game to support the lab's progressive introduction to complex cybersecurity topics.
papers.abstract_zh: 对网络安全专业人员需求的增加以及提高软件开发人员总体安全意识的必要性，凸显了探索安全编程教育新途径的重要性。在本文中，我们介绍了Citadel编程实验室，它包括一个用于模拟安全编程任务的GitLab实例和一个塔防游戏。在实验室中，我们整合了与CyBOK相关的指南，CyBOK是一个组织和展示网络安全主题的知识库，旨在向学习者介绍基本的安全和安全编程概念。我们讨论了使用游戏作为参与材料的动机的设计方法，但也作为引入关键网络安全概念的工具，以帮助学生处理实验室中嵌入的安全编程任务。我们展示了该方法的焦点小组讨论评估结果，该结果证实了CyBOK链接的相关性和严肃游戏的适用性，以支持实验室对复杂网络安全主题的渐进介绍。
papers.title_zh: 对齐一个严肃的游戏，安全编程和CyBOK关联的学习成果

papers.title: Automatic Challenge Generation for Hands-on Cybersecurity Training
papers.authors: Matteo Benzi, Giovanni Lagorio, Marina Ribaudo
papers.abstract: Just reading the news is enough to understand how critical cybersecurity and cybersecurity-education have become. Many job positions remain unfilled due to a shortage of a skilled workforce, and universities have opened courses on cybersecurity-related topics to keep up with market demands. In turn, educators are reshaping their educational material and activities to cover both the standard theory of the field and the practice. However, organizing hands-on cybersecurity training is laborious and time consuming. We present Chad, a tool we developed to support instructors in the development and deployment of practical cybersecurity exercises. Chad, an open-source project written in Python, allows teachers to generate multiple different instances of an exercise, guaranteeing that they all share the same difficulty and require the same knowledge to be solved. Our tool also supports the testing of generated exercises, and their deployment, by leveraging technologies like Docker, Wireguard and iptables. Chad has been integrated with Github classroom and field-tested, during a.y. 2021/2022, in the context of a university course on binary analysis. However, its adoption is not limited to such topics or formal education. Indeed, the Github repository contains examples of reversing-engineering challenges for Linux and Windows, and a simple web challenge.
papers.abstract_zh: 仅仅阅读新闻就足以理解网络安全和网络安全教育变得多么重要。由于缺乏熟练劳动力，许多职位仍然空缺，大学开设了网络安全相关主题的课程，以满足市场需求。反过来，教育工作者正在重塑他们的教育材料和活动，以涵盖该领域的标准理论和实践。然而，组织动手的网络安全培训既费力又耗时。我们介绍Chad，这是我们开发的一个工具，用于支持教师开发和部署实用的网络安全练习。Chad是一个用Python编写的开源项目，它允许教师生成一个练习的多个不同实例，保证它们都具有相同的难度，需要解决相同的知识。通过利用Docker、Wireguard和iptables等技术，我们的工具还支持对生成的练习及其部署进行测试。乍得已被纳入Github课堂，并在2021/2022年期间，在大学二元分析课程的背景下进行了实地测试。然而，它的采用并不局限于这样的主题或正规教育。事实上，Github库包含了Linux和Windows逆向工程挑战的例子，以及一个简单的web挑战。
papers.title_zh: 用于实际网络安全培训的自动质询生成

papers.title: Outsourcing MPC Precomputation for Location Privacy
papers.authors: Ivan Oleynikov, Elena Pagnin, Andrei Sabelfeld
papers.abstract: Proximity testing is at the core of sev-eral Location-Based Services (LBS) offered by, e.g., Uber, Facebook, and BlaBlaCar, as it determines closeness to a target. Unfortunately, modern LBS demand not only that clients disclose their locations in plain, but also to trust that the services will not abuse this information. These requirements are unfounded as there are ways to perform proximity testing without revealing one's location. We propose POLAR, a protocol that imple-ments privacy-preserving proximity testing for LBS. POLAR is suitable for clients running mo-bile devices, and relies on a careful combination of three well-established multiparty computation protocols and lightweight cryptography. A point of originality is the inclusion of two servers into the proximity testing. The servers may aid multiple pairs of clients and contribute towards enhancing privacy, improving efficiency, and reducing the run-ning time of clients' procedures.
papers.abstract_zh: 邻近性测试是优步、脸书和BlaBlaCar等公司提供的几种基于位置的服务(LBS)的核心，因为它决定了与目标的接近程度。不幸的是，现代LBS不仅要求客户公开自己的位置，还要求客户相信服务不会滥用这些信息。这些要求是没有根据的，因为有办法在不暴露一个人的位置的情况下进行邻近测试。我们提出了POLAR，一个为LBS实现隐私保护邻近测试的协议。POLAR适用于运行移动设备的客户端，它依赖于三个成熟的多方计算协议和轻量级加密的精心组合。一个创新点是在邻近测试中包含了两台服务器。服务器可以帮助多对客户端，并且有助于增强隐私、提高效率和减少客户端程序的运行时间。
papers.title_zh: 位置隐私的外包MPC预计算

papers.title: Hide me Behind the Noise: Local Differential Privacy for Indoor Location Privacy
papers.authors: Hojjat Navidan, Vahideh Moghtadaiee, Niki Nazaran, Mina Alishahi
papers.abstract: The advent of numerous indoor location-based services (LBSs) and the widespread use of many types of mobile devices in indoor environments have resulted in generating a massive amount of people's location data. While geo-spatial data contains sensitive information about personal activities, collecting it in its raw form may lead to the leak of personal information relating to the people, violating their privacy. This paper proposes a novel privacy-aware framework for aggregating the indoor location data employing the Local Differential Privacy (LDP) technique, in which the user location data is changed locally in the user's device and is sent to the aggregator afterward. Therefore, the users' locations are kept hidden from a server or any attackers. The practical feasibility of applying the proposed framework is verified by two real-world datasets. The impact of dataset properties, the privacy mechanisms, and the privacy level on our framework are also investigated. The experimental results indicate that the presented framework can protect the location information of users, and the accuracy of the population frequency of different zones in the indoor area is close to that of the original population frequency with no knowledge about the location of people indoors.
papers.abstract_zh: 大量基于室内位置的服务(lbs)的出现和许多类型的移动设备在室内环境中的广泛使用导致产生了大量的人的位置数据。虽然地理空间数据包含关于个人活动的敏感信息，但以原始形式收集这些数据可能会导致与人们相关的个人信息泄露，侵犯他们的隐私。提出了一种新的隐私感知框架，利用本地差分隐私(LDP)技术聚合室内位置数据，其中用户位置数据在用户设备中本地改变，然后发送到聚合器。因此，用户的位置对服务器或任何攻击者都是隐藏的。两个真实数据集验证了该框架的实际可行性。我们还研究了数据集属性、隐私机制和隐私级别对我们框架的影响。实验结果表明，该框架能够保护用户的位置信息，并且在不知道室内人员位置的情况下，室内区域不同区域的人口频率与原始人口频率的准确度接近。
papers.title_zh: 把我藏在噪音后面:室内位置隐私的局部差分隐私

papers.title: The Ethics of Going Deep: Challenges in Machine Learning for Sensitive Security Domains
papers.authors: Aliai Eusebi, Marie Vasek, Ella Cockbain, Enrico Mariconti
papers.abstract: Sometimes, machine learning models can determine the trajectory of human life, and a series of cascading ethical failures could be irreversible. Ethical concerns are nevertheless set to increase, in particular when the injection of algorithmic forms of decision-making occurs in highly sensitive security contexts. In cybercrime, there have been cases of algorithms that have not identified racist and hateful speeches, as well as missing the identification of Image Based Sexual Abuse cases. Hence, this paper intends to add a voice of caution on the vulnerabilities pervading the different stages of a machine learning development pipeline and the ethical challenges that these potentially nurture and perpetuate. To highlight both the issues and potential fixes in an adversarial environment, we use Child Sexual Exploitation and its implications on the Internet as a case study, being 2021 its worst year according to the Internet Watch Foundation.
papers.abstract_zh: 有时，机器学习模型可以决定人类生活的轨迹，一系列连锁伦理失败可能是不可逆转的。然而，伦理问题将会增加，尤其是在高度敏感的安全环境下，算法形式的决策的引入。在网络犯罪中，有些算法没有识别出种族主义和仇恨言论，也没有识别出基于图像的性虐待案件。因此，本文旨在对机器学习开发管道的不同阶段普遍存在的漏洞以及这些漏洞可能滋生和延续的道德挑战提出警告。为了强调在敌对环境中的问题和潜在解决方案，我们使用儿童性剥削及其在互联网上的影响作为案例研究，根据互联网观察基金会，2021年是最糟糕的一年。
papers.title_zh: 深入的伦理:敏感安全领域的机器学习挑战

papers.title: Ethics in Security Research: Visions, Reality, and Paths Forward
papers.authors: Yiming Zhang, Mingxuan Liu, Mingming Zhang, Chaoyi Lu, Haixin Duan
papers.abstract: Ethics has become a prevalent and important criterion for academic research. However, achieving ethical compliance in practice is a highly complex and specialized task. In the field of computer security research, although top-tier conferences all have set out visions for ethical compliance, researchers may encounter practical dilemmas such as the lack of assistance from legal departments and the absence of specific domain guidelines, leading to various realistic obstacles to ethical treatment. This paper provides a comprehensive investigation of ethical considerations in computer security research. We first summarize the ethical requirements of top-tier security and network conferences. Then, based on a survey of 6,078 academic papers and an online investigation of 248 researchers mainly from a Chinese security community, we reveal the current status and practical issues of ethical considerations in security research. In particular, given the plight of the lack of authoritative ethical guidance, we offer a series of suggestions on how researchers at institutions without authoritative departments could best mitigate ethical risks. We also raise several open questions, and expect to help seek paths towards better ethical compliance for the security community.
papers.abstract_zh: 伦理已经成为学术研究的普遍和重要的标准。然而，在实践中实现道德合规是一项非常复杂和专业的任务。在计算机安全研究领域，尽管顶级会议都提出了伦理合规的愿景，但研究人员可能会遇到现实困境，如缺乏法律部门的协助和缺乏具体的领域指南，导致伦理治疗的各种现实障碍。本文对计算机安全研究中的伦理问题进行了全面的调查。我们首先总结顶层安全和网络会议的伦理要求。然后，基于对6，078篇学术论文的调查和对主要来自中国安全社区的248名研究人员的在线调查，我们揭示了安全研究中伦理考虑的现状和实际问题。特别是，鉴于缺乏权威伦理指导的困境，我们就没有权威部门的机构的研究人员如何最好地减轻伦理风险提供了一系列建议。我们还提出了几个开放性的问题，并期望帮助寻找安全社区更好地遵守道德规范的途径。
papers.title_zh: 安全研究中的伦理:愿景、现实和前进之路

papers.title: Ethical Practices for Security Research with At-Risk Populations
papers.authors: Rasika Bhalerao, Vaughn Hamilton, Allison McDonald, Elissa M. Redmiles, Angelika Strohmayer
papers.abstract: A growing body of security and privacy research focuses on at-risk populations - those who are marginalized, stigmatized, and/or criminalized - and who may face significant harm from research conducted about themselves and their communities. For example, recent research has studied family members of those in prison, survivors of domestic violence, undocumented immigrants, and sex workers. At-risk communities have a heightened need for confidentiality, consideration for possible past trauma, and research justice given inherent power differentials. Here, we offer a set of ethical research practices we have deployed in research with multiple at-risk communities. We hope these practices will serve as guidance and a springboard for discussion about what it means to conduct ethical research, particularly with marginalized, stigmatized, and/or criminalized groups.
papers.abstract_zh: 越来越多的安全和隐私研究将重点放在风险人群上，即那些被边缘化、被污名化和/或被定罪的人群，他们可能会因对自己及其社区进行的研究而面临重大伤害。例如，最近的研究对监狱中的家庭成员、家庭暴力幸存者、非法移民和性工作者进行了研究。鉴于固有的权力差异，处于危险中的社区对保密性、对可能的过去创伤的考虑和研究公正有更高的需求。在这里，我们提供了一套伦理研究实践，这些实践是我们在对多个高风险社区的研究中部署的。我们希望这些实践将作为指导和跳板，讨论进行伦理研究的意义，特别是对边缘化、被污名化和/或被定罪的群体。
papers.title_zh: 高危人群安全性研究的伦理实践

papers.title: Challenges of protecting confidentiality in social media data and their ethical import
papers.authors: Arianna Rossi, Mónica P. Arenas, Emre Kocyigit, Moad Hani
papers.abstract: This article discusses the challenges of pseudonymizing unstructured, noisy social media data for cybersecurity research purposes and presents an open-source package developed to pseudonymize personal and confidential information (i.e., personal names, companies, and locations) contained in such data. Its goal is to facilitate compliance with EU data protection obligations and the upholding of research ethics principles like the respect for the autonomy, privacy and dignity of research participants, the social responsibility of researchers, and scientific integrity. We discuss the limitations of the pseudonymizer package, their ethical import, and the additional security measures that should be adopted to protect the confidentiality of the data.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文讨论了出于网络安全研究目的对非结构化、嘈杂的社交媒体数据进行假名化所面临的挑战，并介绍了一个开源包，该包旨在对这些数据中包含的个人和机密信息(如个人姓名、公司和位置)进行假名化。其目标是促进遵守欧盟数据保护义务和维护研究伦理原则，如尊重研究参与者的自主权、隐私和尊严、研究人员的社会责任和科学诚信。我们讨论了假名处理包的局限性，它们的伦理意义，以及为了保护数据的机密性应该采取的额外的安全措施。
papers.title_zh: 保护社交媒体数据机密性的挑战及其伦理意义

papers.title: When Cryptographic Ransomware Poses Cyber Threats: Ethical Challenges and Proposed Safeguards for Cybersecurity Researchers
papers.authors: Marietjie Botes, Gabriele Lenzini
papers.abstract: Cryptographic ransomware, a malware capable of destroying data, is a serious threat if used against providers of critical infrastructures such as healthcare, energy supply chains, banking services, and transport systems. Used as such, ransomware may qualify as cyber weapon, but the current discussion around cyber and information warfare is not sufficiently legally regulated. This delegates the safe governance thereof to the application of ethical principles but leaves researchers working on ransomware in doubt about the double-use nature of their work and what code of conduct to follow. Although some existing biomedical research ethical principles have been repurposed for ICT research, in the context of recent threats posed by ransomware attacks, these efforts need an urgent rethink, especially when it involves the research of cybersecurity researchers dealing specifically with ransomware. This paper does not offer solutions, but rather describes the complexity, nature, and extent of ethical challenges raised by cybersecurity research and invites the cybersecurity research community to enter into active discussions around the need to consider the development of an appropriate research ethics framework in the domain of cybersecurity.
papers.abstract_zh: 加密勒索软件是一种能够破坏数据的恶意软件，如果用于医疗保健、能源供应链、银行服务和运输系统等关键基础设施的提供商，将是一个严重的威胁。如此使用，勒索软件可能有资格成为网络武器，但当前围绕网络和信息战的讨论没有得到足够的法律监管。这将安全治理委托给了道德原则的应用，但让研究勒索软件的研究人员对其工作的双重用途性质以及应遵循的行为准则产生了怀疑。尽管一些现有的生物医学研究伦理原则已被重新用于ICT研究，但在勒索软件攻击造成的最新威胁的背景下，这些努力需要紧急反思，特别是当它涉及专门处理勒索软件的网络安全研究人员的研究时。本文没有提供解决方案，而是描述了网络安全研究提出的伦理挑战的复杂性、性质和程度，并邀请网络安全研究界围绕考虑在网络安全领域制定适当的研究伦理框架的必要性展开积极讨论。
papers.title_zh: 当加密勒索软件构成网络威胁时:网络安全研究人员的伦理挑战和建议的安全措施

papers.title: Modelling direct messaging networks with multiple recipients for cyber deception
papers.authors: Kristen Moore, Cody James Christopher, David Liebowitz, Surya Nepal, Renee Selvey
papers.abstract: Cyber deception is the practice of deliberately introducing fake or misleading artefacts into cyber systems. It is emerging as a promising approach to defending networks and systems against attackers and data thieves. However, despite being relatively cheap to deploy [1], the generation of realistic content at scale is very costly when it is hand-crafted. With recent improvements in Machine Learning, we now have the opportunity to bring scale and automation to the creation of realistic and enticing simulated content. In this work, we propose a framework to automate the generation of email and instant messaging-style group communications at scale. Such messaging platforms within organisations contain a lot of valuable information inside private communications and document attachments, making them an enticing target for an adversary. The presence of an active messaging platform also enhances the realism of a deceptive network simulation, contributing both traffic and message artefacts. We address two key aspects of simulating this type of system: modelling when and with whom participants communicate, and generating topical, multi-party text to populate simulated conversation threads. We present the LogNormMix-Net Temporal Point Process as an approach to the first of these, building upon the intensity-free modeling approach of Shchur et al. [2] to create a generative model for unicast and multi-cast communications. We demonstrate the use of fine-tuned, pretrained language models to generate convincing multi-party conversation threads. A live email server is simulated by uniting our LogNormMix-Net TPP (to generate the communication timestamp, sender and recipients) with the language model, which generates the contents of the multi-party email threads. We evaluate the generated content with respect to a number of realism-based properties, that encourage a model to learn to generate content that will engage the attention of an adversary to achieve a deception outcome. Our simulations run in real time, making them suitable for deployment in cyber deception as a honeypot in its own right, or as part of a larger deception environment.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络欺骗是指故意将虚假或误导性的人工制品引入网络系统的行为。它正在成为一种很有前途的方法来保护网络和系统免受攻击者和数据窃贼的攻击。然而，尽管部署起来相对便宜[1]，手工制作的真实内容的大规模生成是非常昂贵的。随着机器学习的最新进展，我们现在有机会将规模和自动化引入现实和诱人的模拟内容的创建。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个框架来自动生成大规模的电子邮件和即时消息样式的群组通信。组织内部的这种消息平台在私人通信和文档附件中包含大量有价值的信息，使它们成为对手的诱人目标。主动消息平台的存在也增强了欺骗性网络模拟的真实性，造成了流量和消息假象。我们解决了模拟这种类型的系统的两个关键方面:建模参与者何时以及与谁通信，以及生成热门的多方文本来填充模拟的对话线程。我们提出LogNormMix-Net时间点过程作为第一种方法，建立在Shchur等人[2]的无强度建模方法上，以创建单播和多播通信的生成模型。我们演示了使用微调、预训练的语言模型来生成令人信服的多方对话线索。通过将我们的LogNormMix-Net TPP(生成通信时间戳、发送者和接收者)与生成多方电子邮件线程的内容的语言模型结合起来，模拟了一个实时电子邮件服务器。我们根据许多基于真实性的属性来评估生成的内容，这些属性鼓励模型学习生成将吸引对手注意力以实现欺骗结果的内容。我们的模拟实时运行，使它们适合部署在网络欺骗中，作为其自身的蜜罐，或作为更大的欺骗环境的一部分。
papers.title_zh: 为网络欺骗建立具有多个接收者的直接消息网络模型

papers.title: SoK: The Impact of Unlabelled Data in Cyberthreat Detection
papers.authors: Giovanni Apruzzese, Pavel Laskov, Aliya Tastemirova
papers.abstract: Machine learning (ML) has become an important paradigm for cyberthreat detection (CTD) in the recent years. A substantial research effort has been invested in the development of specialized algorithms for CTD tasks. From the operational perspective, however, the progress of ML-based CTD is hindered by the difficulty in obtaining the large sets of labelled data to train ML detectors. A potential solution to this problem are semisupervised learning (SsL) methods, which combine small labelled datasets with large amounts of unlabelled data. This paper is aimed at systematization of existing work on SsL for CTD and, in particular, on understanding the utility of unlabelled data in such systems. To this end, we analyze the cost of labelling in various CTD tasks and develop a formal cost model for SsL in this context. Building on this foundation, we formalize a set of requirements for evaluation of SsL methods, which elucidates the contribution of unlabelled data. We review the state-of-the-art and observe that no previous work meets such requirements. To address this problem, we propose a framework for assessing the benefits of unlabelled data in SsL. We showcase an application of this framework by performing the first benchmark evaluation that highlights the tradeoffs of 9 existing SsL methods on 9 public datasets. Our findings verify that, in some cases, unlabelled data provides a small, but statistically significant, performance gain. This paper highlights that SsL in CTD has a lot of room for improvement, which should stimulate future research in this field.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，机器学习已经成为网络威胁检测的重要范式。大量的研究工作已经投入到开发用于CTD任务的专门算法中。然而，从操作角度来看，基于ML的CTD的进展受到难以获得大量标记数据来训练ML检测器的阻碍。这个问题的潜在解决方案是半监督学习(SsL)方法，它将小的标记数据集与大量的未标记数据相结合。本文旨在系统化现有的关于用于CTD的SsL的工作，特别是理解未标记数据在这种系统中的效用。为此，我们分析了各种CTD任务中的标记成本，并在此背景下开发了SsL的正式成本模型。在此基础上，我们形式化了一组评估SsL方法的要求，阐明了未标记数据的贡献。我们回顾了最先进的技术，并观察到没有以前的工作满足这样的要求。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一个框架来评估SsL中未标记数据的好处。我们通过在9个公共数据集上执行第一个基准评估来展示该框架的应用，该评估强调了9个现有SsL方法的权衡。我们的发现证实，在某些情况下，未标记的数据提供了一个小的，但具有统计意义的性能增益。这篇论文强调了SsL在CTD中有很大的改进空间，这将激发该领域未来的研究。
papers.title_zh: SoK:未标记数据在网络威胁检测中的影响

papers.title: SIERRA: Ranking Anomalous Activities in Enterprise Networks
papers.authors: Jehyun Lee, Farren Tang, Phyo May Thet, Desmond Yeoh, Mitch Rybczynski, Dinil Mon Divakaran
papers.abstract: An enterprise today deploys multiple security middleboxes such as firewalls, IDS, IPS, etc. in its network to collect different kinds of events related to threats and attacks. These events are streamed into a SIEM (Security Information and Event Management) system for analysts to investigate and respond quickly with appropriate actions. However, the number of events collected for a single enterprise can easily run into hundreds of thousands per day, much more than what analysts can investigate under a given budget constraint (time). In this work, we look into the problem of prioritizing suspicious events or anomalies to analysts for further investigation. We develop SIERRA, a system that processes event logs from multiple and diverse middleboxes to detect and rank anomalous activities. SIERRA takes an unsupervised approach and therefore has no dependence on ground truth data. Different from other works, SIERRA defines contexts, that help it to provide visual explanations of highly-ranked anomalous points to analysts, despite employing unsupervised models. We evaluate SIERRA using months of logs from multiple security middleboxes of an enterprise network. The evaluations demonstrate the capability of SIERRA to detect top anomalies in a network while outperforming naive application of existing anomaly detection algorithms as well as a state-of-the-art SIEM-based anomaly detection solution.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，企业部署了多个安全中间体，如防火墙、IDS、IPS等。收集与威胁和攻击相关的各种事件。这些事件流入SIEM(安全信息和事件管理)系统，供分析师进行调查，并采取适当的措施快速做出响应。然而，为单个企业收集的事件数量每天可以轻松达到数十万，远远超过分析师在给定预算约束(时间)下可以调查的数量。在这项工作中，我们研究了对可疑事件或异常进行优先排序的问题，以便分析师进行进一步的调查。我们开发了SIERRA，这是一个处理来自多个不同中间体的事件日志的系统，用于检测和排列异常活动。SIERRA采用无人监督的方法，因此不依赖地面真实数据。与其他作品不同，SIERRA定义了上下文，这有助于它向分析师提供对高排名异常点的可视化解释，尽管采用了无监督模型。我们使用来自企业网络的多个安全中间体的几个月的日志来评估SIERRA。这些评估证明了SIERRA检测网络中顶级异常的能力，同时优于现有异常检测算法的简单应用以及基于SIEM的最新异常检测解决方案。
papers.title_zh: SIERRA:对企业网络中的异常活动进行排序

papers.title: Investigating Graph Embedding Methods for Cross-Platform Binary Code Similarity Detection
papers.authors: Victor Cochard, Damian Pfammatter, Chi Thang Duong, Mathias Humbert
papers.abstract: IoT devices are increasingly present, both in the industry and in consumer markets, but their security remains weak, which leads to an unprecedented number of attacks against them. In order to reduce the attack surface, one approach is to analyze the binary code of these devices to early detect whether they contain potential security vulnerabilities. More specifically, knowing some vulnerable function, we can determine whether the firmware of an IoT device contains some security flaw by searching for this function. However, searching for similar vulnerable functions is in general challenging due to the fact that the source code is often not openly available and that it can be compiled for different architectures, using different compilers and compilation settings. In order to handle these varying settings, we can compare the similarity between the graph embeddings derived from the binary functions. In this paper, inspired by the recent advances in deep learning, we propose a new method – GESS (graph embeddings for similarity search) – to derive graph embeddings, and we compare it with various state-of-the-art methods. Our empirical evaluation shows that GESS reaches an AUC of 0.979, thereby outperforming the best known approach. Furthermore, for a fixed low false positive rate, GESS provides a true positive rate (or recall) about 36% higher than the best previous approach. Finally, for a large search space, GESS provides a recall between 50% and 60% higher than the best previous approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网设备越来越多地出现在行业和消费市场中，但它们的安全性仍然很弱，这导致针对它们的攻击数量空前。为了减少攻击面，一种方法是分析这些设备的二进制代码，以早期检测它们是否包含潜在的安全漏洞。更具体地，知道一些易受攻击的功能，我们可以通过搜索该功能来确定物联网设备的固件是否包含一些安全缺陷。然而，搜索类似的易受攻击的函数通常是具有挑战性的，因为源代码通常不是公开可用的，并且可以使用不同的编译器和编译设置为不同的架构编译。为了处理这些不同的设置，我们可以比较从二元函数导出的图嵌入之间的相似性。在本文中，受深度学习最新进展的启发，我们提出了一种新的方法——GESS(graph embedding for similarity search)——来导出图嵌入，并与各种最先进的方法进行了比较。我们的实证评估显示，GESS达到了0.979的AUC，从而优于最好的已知方法。此外，对于固定的低假阳性率，GESS提供的真阳性率(或召回率)比以前最好的方法高大约36%。最后，对于大搜索空间，GESS提供了比以前最好的方法高50%到60%的召回率。
papers.title_zh: 跨平台二进制代码相似性检测的图嵌入方法研究

papers.title: Illuminati: Towards Explaining Graph Neural Networks for Cybersecurity Analysis
papers.authors: Haoyu He, Yuede Ji, H. Howie Huang
papers.abstract: Graph neural networks (GNNs) have been utilized to create multi-layer graph models for a number of cybersecurity applications from fraud detection to software vulnerability analysis. Unfortunately, like traditional neural networks, GNNs also suffer from a lack of transparency, that is, it is challenging to interpret the model predictions. Prior works focused on specific factor explanations for a GNN model. In this work, we have designed and implemented Illuminati, a comprehensive and accurate explanation framework for cybersecurity applications using GNN models. Given a graph and a pre-trained GNN model, Illuminati is able to identify the important nodes, edges, and attributes that are contributing to the prediction while requiring no prior knowledge of GNN models. We evaluate Illuminati in two cybersecurity applications, i.e., code vulnerability detection and smart contract vulnerability detection. The experiments show that Illuminati achieves more accurate explanation results than state-of-the-art methods, specifically, 87.6% of subgraphs identified by Illuminati are able to retain their original prediction, an improvement of 10.3% over others at 77.3%. Furthermore, the explanation of Illuminati can be easily understood by the domain experts, suggesting the significant usefulness for the development of cybersecurity applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 图形神经网络(GNNs)已经被用来为从欺诈检测到软件漏洞分析的许多网络安全应用创建多层图形模型。不幸的是，像传统的神经网络一样，GNNs也缺乏透明度，也就是说，解释模型预测是具有挑战性的。先前的工作集中在GNN模型的特定因素解释上。在这项工作中，我们设计并实现了Illuminati，这是一个使用GNN模型对网络安全应用进行全面准确解释的框架。给定一个图形和一个预先训练好的GNN模型，Illuminati能够识别出对预测有贡献的重要节点、边和属性，而不需要事先知道GNN模型。我们在两个网络安全应用中评估Illuminati，即代码漏洞检测和智能合约漏洞检测。实验表明，光照模型获得了比现有方法更准确的解释结果，特别是87.6%的光照模型识别出的子图能够保持原来的预测，比其他77.3%的子图提高了10.3%。此外,“光明会”的解释很容易被领域专家理解，这表明它对网络安全应用程序的开发非常有用。
papers.title_zh: 光明会:解释网络安全分析的图形神经网络

papers.title: SoK: Cryptanalysis of Encrypted Search with LEAKER - A framework for LEakage AttacK Evaluation on Real-world data
papers.authors: Seny Kamara, Abdelkarim Kati, Tarik Moataz, Thomas Schneider, Amos Treiber, Michael Yonli
papers.abstract: An encrypted search algorithm (ESA) allows a user to encrypt its data while preserving the ability to search over it. As all practical solutions leak some information, cryptanalysis plays an important role in the area of encrypted search. Starting with the work of Islam et al. (NDSS'12), many attacks have been proposed that exploit different leakage profiles under various assumptions. While these attacks improve our understanding of leakage, it can sometimes be difficult to draw definite conclusions about their practical performance. This is due to several reasons, including a lack of open-source implementations (which are needed to reproduce results), empirical evaluations that are conducted on restricted datasets, and in some cases reliance on relatively strong assumptions that can significantly affect accuracy. In this work, we address these limitations. First, we design and implement LEAKER, an open-source framework that evaluates the major leakage attacks against any dataset and that we hope will serve the community as a common way to evaluate leakage attacks. We identify new real-world datasets that capture different use cases for ESAs and, for the first time, include real-world user queries. Finally, we use LEAKER to systematically evaluate known attacks on our datasets, uncovering sometimes unexpected properties that increase or diminish accuracy. Our evaluation shows that some attacks work better on real-world data than previously thought and that others perform worse.
papers.abstract_zh: 加密搜索算法(ESA)允许用户加密数据，同时保留搜索数据的能力。由于所有实用的解决方案都会泄漏一些信息，因此密码分析在加密搜索领域扮演着重要的角色。从伊斯拉姆等人(NDSS 12)的工作开始，已经提出了许多攻击，这些攻击利用了各种假设下的不同泄漏特征。虽然这些攻击提高了我们对泄漏的理解，但有时很难对它们的实际性能得出明确的结论。这是由几个原因造成的，包括缺乏开源实现(这是重现结果所必需的)，在受限数据集上进行的经验评估，以及在某些情况下依赖于可能严重影响准确性的相对较强的假设。在这项工作中，我们解决了这些限制。首先，我们设计并实现了LEAKER，这是一个开源框架，可以针对任何数据集评估主要的泄漏攻击，我们希望它可以作为评估泄漏攻击的通用方法服务于社区。我们确定了新的真实世界数据集，这些数据集捕获了esa的不同用例，并且首次包含了真实世界的用户查询。最后，我们使用LEAKER系统地评估对我们数据集的已知攻击，揭示有时会增加或减少准确性的意外属性。我们的评估表明，一些攻击在真实世界的数据上比以前认为的效果更好，而另一些攻击表现更差。
papers.title_zh: SoK:对带有泄密者的加密搜索的密码分析——一个对真实世界数据进行泄漏攻击评估的框架

papers.title: EZEE: Epoch Parallel Zero Knowledge for ANSI C
papers.authors: Yibin Yang, David Heath, Vladimir Kolesnikov, David Devecsery
papers.abstract: Recent work has produced interactive Zero Knowledge (ZK) proof systems that can express proofs as arbitrary C programs (Heath et al., 2021, henceforth referred to as ZEE); these programs can be executed by a simulated ZK processor that runs in the 10KHz range. In this work, we demonstrate that such proof systems are amenable to high degrees of parallelism. Our epoch parallelism-based approach allows the prover and verifier to divide the ZK proof into pieces such that each piece can be executed on a different machine. These proof snippets can then be glued together, and the glued parallel proofs are equivalent to the original sequential proof. We implemented and we experimentally evaluate an epoch parallel version of the ZEE proof system. By running the prover and verifier each across 31 2-core machines, we achieve a ZK processor that runs at up to 394KHz. This allowed us to run a benchmark involving the Linux program bzip2, which would have required at least 11 days with the former ZEE system, in only 8.5 hours.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的工作产生了交互式零知识(ZK)证明系统，可以将证明表达为任意的C程序(Heath et al .，2021，以下简称ZEE)；这些程序可以由运行在10KHz范围内的模拟ZK处理器来执行。在这项工作中，我们证明了这种证明系统是服从高度并行。我们的基于纪元并行性的方法允许证明者和验证者将ZK证明分成多个部分，使得每个部分可以在不同的机器上执行。然后可以将这些证明片段粘合在一起，粘合后的并行证明相当于原始的顺序证明。我们实现并实验性评估了一个并行版本的ZEE验证系统。通过在31台双核机器上分别运行证明者和验证者，我们实现了一个运行频率高达394KHz的ZK处理器。这使我们能够运行一个涉及Linux程序bzip2的基准测试，使用以前的ZEE系统需要至少11天，而现在只需要8.5小时。
papers.title_zh: EZEE:针对ANSI C的Epoch并行零知识

papers.title: SoK: Privacy-Preserving Computing in the Blockchain Era
papers.authors: Ghada Almashaqbeh, Ravital Solomon
papers.abstract: Privacy is a huge concern for cryptocurrencies and blockchains as most of these systems log everything in the clear. This has resulted in several academic and industrial initiatives to address privacy. Starting with the UTXO model of Bitcoin, initial works brought confidentiality and anonymity to payments. Recent works have expanded to support more generalized forms of private computation. Such solutions tend to be highly involved as they rely on advanced cryptographic primitives and creative techniques to handle issues related to dealing with private records (e.g. concurrency and double spending). This situation makes it hard to comprehend the current state-of-the-art, much less build on top of it. To address these challenges, we develop a systematization of knowledge for privacy-preserving solutions in blockchain. To the best of our knowledge, our work is the first of its kind. After motivating design challenges, we devise two systematization frameworks-the first as a stepping stone to the second- and use them to study the state-of-the-art. For our first framework, we study the zero-knowledge proof systems used in surveyed solutions, based on their key features and limitations. Our second is for privacy-preserving solutions; we define several dimensions to categorize the surveyed schemes and, in doing so, identify two major paradigms employed to achieve private computation. We go on to provide insights to guide solutions' adoption and development. Finally, we touch upon challenges related to limited functionality and accommodating new developments.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于加密货币和区块链来说，隐私是一个巨大的问题，因为大多数这些系统都以明文记录一切。这导致了一些学术和工业倡议来解决隐私问题。从比特币的UTXO模型开始，最初的工作为支付带来了保密性和匿名性。最近的工作已经扩展到支持更一般形式的私有计算。这种解决方案往往是高度复杂的，因为它们依赖于高级密码原语和创造性技术来处理与处理私有记录相关的问题(例如，并发性和重复花费)。这种情况使人很难理解当前的艺术水平，更不用说在它上面进行构建了。为了应对这些挑战，我们在区块链开发了一个隐私保护解决方案的知识系统。据我们所知，我们的工作是同类工作中的首创。在激发设计挑战之后，我们设计了两个系统化框架——第一个作为第二个的垫脚石——并使用它们来研究最先进的技术。对于我们的第一个框架，我们研究了在调查的解决方案中使用的零知识证明系统，基于它们的关键特性和局限性。第二个是隐私保护解决方案；我们定义了几个维度来对所调查的方案进行分类，并在这样做的过程中，确定了用于实现私有计算的两个主要范例。我们继续提供见解来指导解决方案的采用和开发。最后，我们谈到了与有限的功能和适应新的发展相关的挑战。
papers.title_zh: SoK:区块链时代的隐私保护计算

papers.title: CostCO: An automatic cost modeling framework for secure multi-party computation
papers.authors: Vivian Fang, Lloyd Brown, William Lin, Wenting Zheng, Aurojit Panda, Raluca Ada Popa
papers.abstract: The last decade has seen an explosion in the number of new secure multi-party computation (MPC) protocols that enable collaborative computation on sensitive data. No single MPC protocol is optimal for all types of computation. As a result, researchers have created hybrid-protocol compilers that translate a program into a hybrid protocol that mixes different MPC protocols. Hybrid-protocol compilers crucially rely on accurate cost models, which are handwritten by the compilers' developers, to choose the correct schedule of protocols. In this paper, we propose CostCO, the first automatic MPC cost modeling framework. CostCO develops a novel API to interface with a variety of MPC protocols, and leverages domain-specific properties of MPC in order to enable efficient and automatic cost-model generation for a wide range of MPC protocols. CostCO employs a two-phase experiment design to efficiently synthesize cost models of the MPC protocol's runtime as well as its memory and network usage. We verify CostCO's modeling accuracy for several full circuits, characterize the engineering effort required to port existing MPC protocols, and demonstrate how hybrid-protocol compilers can leverage CostCO's cost models.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去十年中，新的安全多方计算(MPC)协议数量激增，这些协议支持对敏感数据进行协作计算。没有一个单一的MPC协议对所有类型的计算都是最佳的。因此，研究人员创造了混合协议编译器，将程序翻译成混合不同MPC协议的混合协议。混合协议编译器主要依赖于由编译器开发人员手写的精确成本模型来选择正确的协议调度。本文提出了第一个自动MPC成本建模框架CostCO。CostCO开发了一种新的API来与各种MPC协议接口，并利用MPC的特定于域的属性，以便为各种MPC协议实现高效和自动的成本模型生成。CostCO采用两阶段实验设计来有效地综合MPC协议运行时及其内存和网络使用的成本模型。我们验证了CostCO对几个完整电路的建模准确性，描述了移植现有MPC协议所需的工程工作，并展示了混合协议编译器如何利用CostCO的成本模型。
papers.title_zh: CostCO:安全多方计算的自动成本建模框架

papers.title: HyperLogLog: Exponentially Bad in Adversarial Settings
papers.authors: Kenneth G. Paterson, Mathilde Raynal
papers.abstract: Computing the count of distinct elements in large data sets is a common task but naive approaches are memory-expensive. The HyperLogLog (HLL) algorithm (Flajolet et al., 2007) estimates a data set's cardinality while using significantly less memory than a naive approach, at the cost of some accuracy. This trade-off makes the HLL algorithm very attractive for a wide range of applications such as database management and network monitoring, where an exact count may not be needed. The HLL algorithm and variants of it are implemented in systems such as Redis and Google Big Query. Recently, the HLL algorithm has started to be proposed for use in scenarios where the inputs may be adversarially generated, for example counting social network users or detection of network scanning attacks. This prompts an examination of the performance of the HLL algorithm in the face of adversarial inputs. We show that in such a setting, the HLL algorithm's estimate of cardinality can be exponentially bad: when an adversary has access to the internals of the HLL algorithm and has some flexibility in choosing what inputs will be recorded, it can manipulate the cardinality estimate to be exponentially smaller than the true cardinality. We study both the original HLL algorithm and a more modern version of it (Ertl, 2017) that is used in Redis. We present experimental results confirming our theoretical analysis. Finally, we consider attack prevention: we show how to modify HLL in a simple way that provably prevents cardinality estimate manipulation attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 计算大型数据集中不同元素的数量是一项常见的任务，但简单的方法需要耗费大量内存。超对数(HLL)算法(Flajolet等人，2007年)估计数据集的基数，同时使用比简单方法少得多的内存，代价是一些准确性。这种折衷使得HLL算法对于诸如数据库管理和网络监控等可能不需要精确计数的广泛应用非常有吸引力。HLL算法及其变体在Redis和Google Big Query等系统中实现。最近，HLL算法已经开始被提议用于输入可能是恶意生成的场景，例如计算社交网络用户或检测网络扫描攻击。这促使人们对HLL算法在面对敌对输入时的性能进行检验。我们表明，在这样的设置中，HLL算法对基数的估计可能是指数级的差:当对手可以访问HLL算法的内部，并且在选择记录什么输入方面具有一定的灵活性时，它可以操纵基数估计值，使其指数级地小于真实基数。我们研究了最初的HLL算法和Redis中使用的更现代的版本(Ertl，2017)。我们提出的实验结果证实了我们的理论分析。最后，我们考虑攻击预防:我们展示了如何以一种简单的方式修改HLL，这种方式可以证明可以防止基数估计操纵攻击。
papers.title_zh: 超级日志:在敌对环境中指数级的糟糕

papers.title: Trampoline Over the Air: Breaking in IoT Devices Through MQTT Brokers
papers.authors: Huikai Xu, Miao Yu, Yanhao Wang, Yue Liu, Qinsheng Hou, Zhenbang Ma, Haixin Duan, Jianwei Zhuge, Baojun Liu
papers.abstract: MQTT is widely adopted by IoT devices because it allows for the most efficient data transfer over a variety of communication lines. The security of MQTT has received increasing attention in recent years, and several studies have demonstrated the configurations of many MQTT brokers are insecure. Adversaries are allowed to exploit vulnerable brokers and publish malicious messages to subscribers. However, little has been done to understanding the security issues on the device side when devices handle unauthorized MQTT messages. To fill this research gap, we propose a fuzzing framework named ShadowFuzzer to find client-side vulnerabilities when processing incoming MQTT messages. To avoiding ethical issues, ShadowFuzzer redirects traffic destined for the actual broker to a shadow broker under the control to monitor vulnerabilities. We select 15 IoT devices communicating with vulnerable brokers and leverage ShadowFuzzer to find vulnerabilities when they parse MQTT messages. For these devices, ShadowFuzzer reports 34 zero-day vulnerabilities in 11 devices. We evaluated the exploitability of these vulnerabilities and received a total of 44,000 USD bug bounty rewards. And 16 CVE/CNVD/CN-NVD numbers have been assigned to us.
papers.abstract_zh: MQTT被物联网设备广泛采用，因为它允许在各种通信线路上进行最有效的数据传输。近年来，MQTT的安全性受到了越来越多的关注，一些研究表明许多MQTT代理的配置是不安全的。对手可以利用易受攻击的代理并向订户发布恶意消息。然而，当设备处理未授权的MQTT消息时，很少有人了解设备端的安全问题。为了填补这一研究空白，我们提出了一个名为ShadowFuzzer的模糊化框架，用于在处理传入的MQTT消息时发现客户端漏洞。为了避免道德问题，ShadowFuzzer在监控漏洞的控制下将去往实际代理的流量重定向到影子代理。我们选择了15个与易受攻击的代理通信的物联网设备，并利用ShadowFuzzer在解析MQTT消息时找到漏洞。对于这些设备，ShadowFuzzer报告了11个设备中的34个零日漏洞。我们评估了这些漏洞的可利用性，并获得了总计44，000美元的漏洞奖金。我们被分配了16个CVE/CNVD/CN-NVD号码。
papers.title_zh: 空中蹦床:通过MQTT经纪人打入物联网设备

papers.title: Hide and Seek: Revisiting DNS-based User Tracking
papers.authors: Deliang Chang, Joann Qiongna Chen, Zhou Li, Xing Li
papers.abstract: Domain name system (DNS) is the address book of the Internet and domain names are queried before almost every network activity. Since the entities like recursive resolvers can monitor users' DNS queries, privacy concerns such as user tracking arise. Though a number of prior works have looked into this issue, they all focus on the closed-world setting, which means that victim users must be known to the adversary. We argue that it does not reflect the adversary's true capabilities. Moreover, there lacks an effective approach to defend against DNS-based user tracking. In this work, we revisit these issues by investigating the attack surface in both open-world and closed-world settings and studying how to protect users. First, we introduce a new tracking mechanism DSCorr which incorporates domain-based word embedding to capture the fine-grained distance between domain names, and automatic threshold generation for fine-tuning the attack outcome. The evaluation result on a real-world DNS dataset shows DSCorr is able to outperform the existing works by a large margin especially in the open-world setting. On the defense side, we develop a system called LDPResolve, which incorporates a recently proposed differential privacy notion ULDP (Utility-optimized Local Differential Privacy) and a new technique named parallel domain resolving, to provide privacy guarantees without damaging the utility of legitimate applications. The evaluation result on the same dataset shows the DNS-based user tracking can be effectively curbed, e.g., tracking accuracy degraded from 93% to 10.1%.
papers.abstract_zh: 域名系统(DNS)是互联网的地址簿，几乎在每一次网络活动之前都会查询域名。因为像递归解析器这样的实体可以监控用户的DNS查询，所以出现了诸如用户跟踪这样的隐私问题。虽然许多先前的工作已经研究了这个问题，但是它们都集中在封闭世界的设置上，这意味着受害者用户必须为对手所知。我们认为它没有反映对手的真实能力。此外，缺乏有效的方法来防御基于DNS的用户跟踪。在这项工作中，我们通过调查开放世界和封闭世界环境中的攻击面以及研究如何保护用户来重新审视这些问题。首先，我们介绍了一种新的跟踪机制DSCorr，它结合了基于域的单词嵌入来捕获域名之间的细粒度距离，并自动生成阈值来微调攻击结果。在真实DNS数据集上的测试结果表明，DSCorr在开放环境下的性能明显优于已有算法。在防御方面，我们开发了一个名为LDPResolve的系统，该系统结合了最近提出的差分隐私概念ULDP(效用优化的本地差分隐私)和一种名为并行域解析的新技术，以在不损害合法应用的效用的情况下提供隐私保证。在同一数据集上的评估结果表明，基于DNS的用户跟踪可以得到有效抑制，跟踪准确率从93%下降到10.1%。
papers.title_zh: 捉迷藏:重新审视基于DNS的用户跟踪

papers.title: SoK: All or Nothing - A Postmortem of Solutions to the Third-Party Script Inclusion Permission Model and a Path Forward
papers.authors: Steven Sprecher, Christoph Kerschbaumer, Engin Kirda
papers.abstract: The web execution model allows third-party JavaScript to be leveraged in a single execution context. Access control for these scripts is currently all or nothing. It has been this way for over a decade despite the knowledge that this model allows for privacy violations and even user data exfiltration. Consequently, users have little to no control over which third-parties operate on their Personally Identifying Information (PII) when interacting with a web application. In this work we aim to explain the lack of solutions to this problem, and to suggest more promising future directions. We first survey past proposed solutions and their trade-offs. We then create a monitoring system in the Firefox browser which captures third-party script access to user supplied PII in HTML Form Elements. We proceed to inspect 100,000 websites with our Monitor and custom web crawler to highlight the complexity of use cases of third-party scripts operating on user PII. Our findings inform the creation of a grading rubric and systematization for solutions in this space, which we then apply to many previous works. The complexity exposed through this effort allows us to start a discussion around why current technological and policy solutions fail adoption. Ultimately we propose a research direction that allows web applications to take advantage of the interoperability of the web execution model while also respecting an end user's privacy and security.
papers.abstract_zh: web执行模型允许在单个执行上下文中利用第三方JavaScript。这些脚本的访问控制目前是全有或全无。这种方式已经持续了十多年，尽管人们知道这种模式会侵犯隐私，甚至会泄露用户数据。因此，用户在与web应用程序交互时，很少或根本无法控制哪些第三方对他们的个人身份信息(PII)进行操作。在这项工作中，我们旨在解释这个问题的解决方案的缺乏，并提出更有希望的未来方向。我们首先调查过去提出的解决方案及其权衡。然后，我们在Firefox浏览器中创建一个监控系统，它捕获第三方脚本对用户提供的HTML表单元素中的PII的访问。我们继续用我们的监视器和定制的网络爬虫检查100，000个网站，以突出在用户PII上操作的第三方脚本的用例的复杂性。我们的发现为这一领域的解决方案提供了一个分级标准和系统化的创建，然后我们将它应用到许多以前的作品中。这一努力暴露出的复杂性让我们开始讨论为什么当前的技术和政策解决方案没有被采用。最后，我们提出一个研究方向，允许web应用程序利用web执行模型的互操作性，同时也尊重最终用户的隐私和安全。
papers.title_zh: SoK:要么全有，要么全无——对第三方脚本包含许可模型的解决方案的回顾和前进的道路

papers.title: Lethe: Practical Data Breach Detection with Zero Persistent Secret State
papers.authors: Antreas Dionysiou, Elias Athanasopoulos
papers.abstract: Honeywords are false passwords associated with each user account. Using a honeyword to login sets off an alarm as a data breach has been detected. Existing approaches for detecting data breaches using honeywords suffer from the need of a trusted component to tell honey-words from the valid password. Once this trusted component is compromised, then honeywords can offer no assistance for mitigating or detecting a data breach. In this paper, we present Lethe, a honeywords-based data-breach detection system that requires no trusted components, other than a trusted bootstrap, and keeps limited transient state for verifying login attempts. Lethe is based on two fundamental principles. First, Lethe generates honeywords using a Machine Learning (ML) model, which constantly evolves. This means that an attacker that compromises the Honeyword Generation Technique (HGT) cannot reproduce the same set of honeywords, and thus cannot tell which password was used as the initial generator. In particular, Lethe is the first system that allows an attacker to fully compromise the HGT without affecting the security of already generated honeywords. Second, Lethe is not aware of the valid password. In fact, for Lethe the only one that knows the actual password is the user that selected it in the first place. Lethe records login events, but without storing anywhere the password used. These login events can be further replayed in another server, which can check if, for a particular user, there were at least two different passwords used and therefore detect a data breach. Lethe allows the detection of a data breach deterministically and not probabilistically as similar approaches do. Additionally, Lethe allows detecting data breaches that are associated with rarely used accounts. Lethe can signal an alarm even if a user account that has logged in just once with the system is compromised. This is in contrast to other efforts that require legitimate users to authenticate with the system, after the attacker has done so, for detecting the breach. To demonstrate the effectiveness of Lethe, we provide a fully functional prototype, along with the ML-based HGT, and assess the provided security with a set of diverse attackers.
papers.abstract_zh: 甜言蜜语是与每个用户帐户相关联的虚假密码。当检测到数据泄露时，使用甜言蜜语登录会引发警报。使用甜言蜜语检测数据泄露的现有方法需要可信组件来区分甜言蜜语和有效密码。一旦这个可信的组件受到危害，那么honeywords就不能为缓解或检测数据泄露提供任何帮助。在本文中，我们提出了Lethe，一个基于honeywords的数据泄露检测系统，它不需要任何可信组件，只需要一个可信的引导程序，并保持有限的瞬态来验证登录尝试。遗忘基于两个基本原则。首先，Lethe使用一个不断进化的机器学习(ML)模型来生成蜜语。这意味着危及蜜语生成技术(HGT)的攻击者不能复制相同的蜜语集，因此不能辨别哪个密码被用作初始生成器。特别是，Lethe是第一个允许攻击者完全破坏HGT而不影响已经生成的蜜语的安全性的系统。第二，Lethe不知道有效的密码。事实上，对于Lethe来说，唯一知道实际密码的人是最初选择它的用户。Lethe记录登录事件，但不存储使用的密码。这些登录事件可以在另一个服务器中进一步重放，该服务器可以检查特定用户是否使用了至少两个不同的密码，从而检测到数据泄露。Lethe允许确定性地而不是像类似方法那样概率性地检测数据泄露。此外，Lethe允许检测与很少使用的帐户相关的数据泄露。即使只登录过一次系统的用户帐户遭到破坏，Lethe也可以发出警报信号。这与其他需要合法用户向系统进行身份验证的努力形成了对比，在攻击者这样做之后，才能检测到漏洞。为了证明Lethe的有效性，我们提供了一个全功能的原型，以及基于ML的HGT，并使用一组不同的攻击者来评估所提供的安全性。
papers.title_zh: Lethe:零持久秘密状态的实用数据泄露检测

papers.title: Hand Sanitizers in the Wild: A Large-scale Study of Custom JavaScript Sanitizer Functions
papers.authors: David Klein, Thomas Barber, Souphiane Bensalim, Ben Stock, Martin Johns
papers.abstract: Despite the considerable amounts of resources invested into securing the Web, Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) is still widespread. This is especially true for Client-Side XSS as, unlike server-side application frameworks, Web browsers do not ship with standard protection routines, so-called sanitizers. Web developers, therefore, have to either resort to third-party libraries or write their own sanitizers to stop XSS in its tracks. Such custom sanitizer routines – dubbed hand sanitizers in the following – are notoriously difficult to implement securely. In this paper, we present a technique to automatically detect, extract, analyze, and validate JavaScript sanitizer functions using a combination of taint tracking and symbolic string analysis. While existing work evaluates server-side sanitizers using a small number of applications, we present the first large-scale study of client-side JavaScript sanitizers. Of the most popular 20,000 websites, our method detects 705 unique sanitizers across 1,415 domains, of which 12.5% are insecure. Of the vulnerable sanitizers, we were able to automatically generate circumventing exploits for 51.3% of them, highlighting the dangers of manual sanitization attempts. Interestingly, vulnerable sanitizers are present across the entire range of website rankings considered, and we find that most sanitizers are not generic enough to thwart XSS if used in just a slightly different context. Finally, we explore the origins of vulnerable sanitizers to motivate adopting a standardized sanitization API available directly in the browser.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管在保护网络安全上投入了大量的资源，跨站脚本(XSS)仍然很普遍。对于客户端XSS来说尤其如此，因为与服务器端应用程序框架不同，Web浏览器不附带标准的保护例程，即所谓的杀毒程序。因此，网络开发者要么求助于第三方库，要么编写自己的杀毒软件来阻止XSS的发展。众所周知，这种定制的消毒程序(以下称为洗手液)很难安全实施。在本文中，我们提出了一种结合污点跟踪和符号串分析来自动检测、提取、分析和验证JavaScript杀毒功能的技术。虽然现有的工作使用少量的应用程序评估服务器端杀毒程序，但我们提出了对客户端JavaScript杀毒程序的首次大规模研究。在最受欢迎的20，000个网站中，我们的方法在1，415个域中检测到705个独特的杀毒程序，其中12.5%是不安全的。在易受攻击的杀毒软件中，我们能够为其中的51.3%自动生成规避漏洞，这凸显了手动杀毒尝试的危险。有趣的是，易受攻击的杀毒软件存在于所考虑的整个网站排名范围内，我们发现如果在稍微不同的上下文中使用，大多数杀毒软件都不足以阻止XSS。最后，我们探索易受攻击的杀毒程序的来源，以促进采用直接在浏览器中可用的标准化杀毒API。
papers.title_zh: 野外洗手液:定制JavaScript洗手液功能的大规模研究

papers.title: Lightweight, Multi-Stage, Compiler-Assisted Application Specialization
papers.authors: Mohannad Alhanahnah, Rithik Jain, Vaibhav Rastogi, Somesh Jha, Thomas W. Reps
papers.abstract: Program debloating aims to enhance the performance and reduce the attack surface of bloated applications. Several techniques have been recently proposed to specialize programs. These approaches are either based on unsound strategies or demanding techniques, leading to unsafe results or a high-overhead debloating process. In this paper, we address these limitations by applying partial-evaluation principles to generate specialized applications. Our approach relies on a simple observation that an application typically consists of configuration logic, followed by the main logic of the program. The configuration logic specifies what functionality in the main logic should be executed. LMCAS performs partial interpretation to capture a precise program state of the configuration logic based on the supplied inputs. LMCAS then applies partial-evaluation optimizations to generate a specialized program by propagating the constants in the captured partial state, eliminating unwanted code, and preserving the desired functionalities. Our evaluation of LMCAS-on commonly used benchmarks and real-world applications-shows that it successfully removes unwanted features while preserving the functionality and robustness of the debloated programs, runs faster than prior tools, and reduces the attack surface of specialized programs. LMCAS runs 1500x, 4.6x, and 1.2x faster than the state-of-the-art debloating tools CHISEL, RAZOR, and OCCAM, respectively; achieves 25% reduction in the binary size; demonstrates favorable gadgets elimination trade-off; and eliminates 87.5% of the known CVE vulnerabilities in our test corpus.
papers.abstract_zh: 程序去模糊旨在提高性能，减少臃肿的应用程序的攻击面。最近提出了几种技术来专门化程序。这些方法要么基于不健全的策略，要么基于要求高的技术，导致不安全的结果或高开销的去块过程。在本文中，我们通过应用部分评估原则来生成专门的应用程序，从而解决这些限制。我们的方法依赖于一个简单的观察，即一个应用程序通常由配置逻辑组成，然后是程序的主逻辑。配置逻辑指定应该执行主逻辑中的什么功能。LMCAS执行部分解释，以根据提供的输入捕获配置逻辑的精确程序状态。然后，LMCAS应用部分求值优化，通过传播捕获的部分状态中的常数，消除不需要的代码，并保留所需的功能，来生成专用程序。我们在常用基准和真实应用上对LMCAS进行的评估表明，它成功地删除了不需要的功能，同时保留了去模糊程序的功能和健壮性，运行速度比以前的工具更快，并减少了专用程序的攻击面。LMCAS的运行速度分别比最先进的去模糊工具CHISEL、RAZOR和OCCAM快1500倍、4.6倍和1.2倍；二进制文件大小减少了25%;演示有利的小工具消除权衡；并消除了我们测试语料库中87.5%的已知CVE漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 轻量级、多阶段、编译器辅助的应用程序专门化

papers.title: LockedDown: Exploiting Contention on Host-GPU PCIe Bus for Fun and Profit
papers.authors: Mert Side, Fan Yao, Zhenkai Zhang
papers.abstract: The deployment of modern graphics processing units (GPUs) has grown rapidly in both traditional and cloud computing. Nevertheless, the potential security issues brought forward by this extensive deployment have not been thoroughly investigated. In this paper, we disclose a new exploitable side-channel vulnerability that ubiquitously exists in systems equipped with modern GPUs. This vulnerability is due to measurable contention caused on the host-GPU PCIe bus. To demonstrate the exploitability of this vulnerability, we conduct two case studies. In the first case study, we exploit the vulnerability to build a cross-VM covert channel that works on virtualized NVIDIA GPUs. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first work that explores covert channel attacks under the circumstances of virtualized GPUs. The covert channel can reach a speed up to 90 kbps with a considerably low error rate. In the second case study, we exploit the vulnerability to mount a website fingerprinting attack that can accurately infer which web pages are browsed by a user. The attack is evaluated against popular browsers like Chrome and Firefox on both Windows and Linux, and the results show that this fingerprinting method can achieve up to 95.2% accuracy. In addition, the attack is evaluated against Tor browser, and up to 90.6% accuracy can be achieved.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代图形处理单元(GPU)的部署在传统和云计算中都快速增长。然而，这种大规模部署带来的潜在安全问题尚未得到彻底调查。在本文中，我们揭示了一种新的可利用的旁路漏洞，这种漏洞普遍存在于配备现代GPU的系统中。此漏洞是由于主机-GPU PCIe总线上引起的可测量的争用造成的。为了展示此漏洞的可利用性，我们进行了两个案例研究。在第一个案例研究中，我们利用该漏洞构建了一个跨虚拟机的隐蔽通道，可在虚拟化的NVIDIA GPUs上工作。据我们所知，这是第一个探索虚拟化GPU环境下隐蔽通道攻击的工作。隐蔽信道可以达到高达90 kbps的速度，并且误码率相当低。在第二个案例研究中，我们利用该漏洞发起网站指纹攻击，可以准确推断用户浏览了哪些网页。在Windows和Linux上对流行的浏览器如Chrome和Firefox进行了攻击评估，结果表明这种指纹识别方法可以达到95.2%的准确率。此外，针对Tor浏览器进行了攻击评估，最高可达到90.6%的准确率。
papers.title_zh: LockedDown:利用主机-GPU PCIe总线上的争用获取乐趣和利润

papers.title: Fuzzing with Data Dependency Information
papers.authors: Alessandro Mantovani, Andrea Fioraldi, Davide Balzarotti
papers.abstract: Recent advances in fuzz testing have introduced several forms of feedback mechanisms, motivated by the fact that for a large range of programs and libraries, edgecoverage alone is insufficient to reveal complicated bugs. Inspired by this line of research, we examined existing program representations looking for a match between expressiveness of the structure and adaptability to the context of fuzz testing. In particular, we believe that data dependency graphs (DDGs) represent a good candidate for this task, as the set of information embedded by this data structure is potentially useful to find vulnerable constructs by stressing combinations of def-use pairs that would be difficult for a traditional fuzzer to trigger. Since some portions of the dependency graph overlap with the control flow of the program, it is possible to reduce the additional instrumentation to cover only “interesting” data-flow dependencies, those that help the fuzzer to visit the code in a distinct way compared to standard methodologies. To test these observations, in this paper we propose DDFuzz, a new approach that rewards the fuzzer not only with code coverage information, but also when new edges in the data dependency graph are hit. Our results show that the adoption of data dependency instrumentation in coverage-guided fuzzing is a promising solution that can help to discover bugs that would otherwise remain unexplored by standard coverage approaches. This is demonstrated by the 72 different vulnerabilities that our data-dependency driven approach can identify when executed on 38 target programs from three different datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 模糊测试的最新进展已经引入了几种形式的反馈机制，这是因为对于大范围的程序和库来说，仅靠edgecoverage不足以揭示复杂的bug。受这条研究路线的启发，我们检查了现有的程序表示，寻找结构的表达性和对模糊测试环境的适应性之间的匹配。特别是，我们认为数据依赖图(DDGs)是这项任务的良好候选，因为这种数据结构嵌入的信息集可能有助于通过强调传统模糊器难以触发的定义-使用对的组合来找到易受攻击的结构。由于依赖图的某些部分与程序的控制流重叠，因此可以减少额外的工具，只覆盖“有趣的”数据流依赖，这些依赖有助于模糊者以与标准方法不同的方式访问代码。为了测试这些观察，在本文中我们提出了DDFuzz，这是一种新的方法，它不仅用代码覆盖信息奖励模糊器，而且当数据依赖图中的新边被命中时也奖励模糊器。我们的结果表明，在覆盖引导的模糊化中采用数据依赖工具是一种有前途的解决方案，可以帮助发现标准覆盖方法无法发现的错误。这由我们的数据依赖驱动的方法在来自三个不同数据集的38个目标程序上执行时可以识别的72个不同的漏洞来证明。
papers.title_zh: 使用数据依赖信息进行模糊处理

papers.title: Unrolling SGD: Understanding Factors Influencing Machine Unlearning
papers.authors: Anvith Thudi, Gabriel Deza, Varun Chandrasekaran, Nicolas Papernot
papers.abstract: Machine unlearning is the process through which a deployed machine learning model is made to forget about some of its training data points. While naively retraining the model from scratch is an option, it is almost always associated with large computational overheads for deep learning models. Thus, several approaches to approximately unlearn have been proposed along with corresponding metrics that formalize what it means for a model to forget about a data point. In this work, we first taxonomize approaches and metrics of approximate unlearning. As a result, we identify verification error, i.e., the $\ell_{2}$ difference between the weights of an approximately unlearned and a naively retrained model, as an approximate unlearning metric that should be optimized for as it subsumes a large class of other metrics. We theoretically analyze the canonical training algorithm, stochastic gradient descent (SGD), to surface the variables which are relevant to reducing the verification error of approximate unlearning for SGD. From this analysis, we first derive an easy-to-compute proxy for verification error (termed unlearning error). The analysis also informs the design of a new training objective penalty that limits the overall change in weights during SGD and as a result facilitates approximate unlearning with lower verification error. We validate our theoretical work through an empirical evaluation on learning with CIFAR-10, CIFAR-100, and IMDB sentiment analysis.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器去学习是一个过程，通过该过程，部署的机器学习模型被使得忘记它的一些训练数据点。虽然天真地从头重新训练模型是一种选择，但它几乎总是与深度学习模型的大量计算开销相关联。因此，已经提出了几种近似遗忘的方法以及相应的度量标准，这些度量标准形式化了模型遗忘数据点的含义。在这项工作中，我们首先对近似遗忘的方法和度量进行分类。因此，我们将验证误差，即近似未学习的模型和简单重新训练的模型的权重之间的$\ell_{2}$差异，确定为近似未学习的度量，由于它包含一大类其他度量，因此应该对其进行优化。我们从理论上分析了标准训练算法——随机梯度下降(SGD ),以找出与减少SGD近似遗忘验证误差相关的变量。从这个分析中，我们首先推导出一个易于计算的验证误差(称为遗忘误差)的代理。该分析还通知了新的训练目标罚分的设计，该罚分限制了SGD期间权重的总体变化，并且因此促进了具有较低验证误差的近似遗忘。我们通过使用CIFAR-10、CIFAR-100和IMDB情感分析对学习进行实证评估来验证我们的理论工作。
papers.title_zh: 展开SGD:了解影响机器去学习的因素

papers.title: Transformer-based Extraction of Deep Image Models
papers.authors: Verena Battis, Alexander Penner
papers.abstract: Model extraction attacks pose a threat to the security of ML models and to the privacy of the data used for training. Previous research has shown that such attacks can be either monetarily motivated to gain an edge over competitors or maliciously in order to mount subsequent attacks on the extracted model. In this paper, recent advances in the field of transformers are exploited to propose an attack tailored to the task of image classification that allows stealing complex convolutional neural network models without any knowledge of their architecture. The attack was performed on a range of datasets and target architectures to evaluate the robustness of the proposed attack. With only 100k queries, we were able to recover up to 99.2% of the black-box target network's accuracy on the test set. We conclude that it is possible to effectively steal complex neural networks with relatively little expertise and conventional means – even without knowledge of the target's architecture. Recently proposed defences have also been examined for their effectiveness in preventing the attack proposed in this paper.
papers.abstract_zh: 模型提取攻击对ML模型的安全性和用于训练的数据的隐私性构成威胁。先前的研究表明，这种攻击可能是金钱动机，以获得对竞争对手的优势，或者是恶意的，以便对提取的模型进行后续攻击。在这篇论文中，利用了变压器领域的最新进展，提出了一种针对图像分类任务的攻击，这种攻击允许在不知道复杂卷积神经网络的架构的情况下窃取复杂卷积神经网络模型。攻击是在一系列数据集和目标体系结构上执行的，以评估所提出的攻击的健壮性。仅使用100k个查询，我们就能够在测试集上恢复高达99.2%的黑盒目标网络准确度。我们的结论是，利用相对较少的专业知识和常规手段，甚至在不了解目标体系结构的情况下，有效地窃取复杂的神经网络是可能的。最近提出的防御方法也被用来检测它们在防止本文提出的攻击方面的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 基于变换的深度图像模型提取

papers.title: DNN Model Architecture Fingerprinting Attack on CPU-GPU Edge Devices
papers.authors: Kartik Patwari, Syed Mahbub Hafiz, Han Wang, Houman Homayoun, Zubair Shafiq, Chen-Nee Chuah
papers.abstract: Embedded systems for edge computing are getting more powerful, and some are equipped with a GPU to enable on-device deep neural network (DNN) learning tasks such as image classification and object detection. Such DNN-based applications frequently deal with sensitive user data, and their architectures are considered intellectual property to be protected. We investigate a potential avenue of fingerprinting attack to identify the (running) DNN model architecture family (out of state-of-the-art DNN categories) on CPU-GPU edge devices. We exploit a stealthy analysis of aggregate system-level side-channel information such as memory, CPU, and GPU usage available at the user-space level. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first attack of its kind that does not require physical access and/or sudo access to the victim device and only collects the system traces passively, as opposed to most of the existing reverse-engineering-based DNN model architecture extraction attacks. We perform feature selection analysis and supervised machine learning-based classification to detect the model architecture. With a combination of RAM, CPU, and GPU features and a Random Forest-based classifier, our proposed attack classifies a known DNN model into its model architecture family with 99% accuracy. Also, the introduced attack is so transferable that it can detect an unknown DNN model into the right DNN architecture category with 87.2% accuracy. Our rigorous feature analysis illustrates that memory usage (RAM) is a critical feature for such fingerprinting. Furthermore, we successfully replicate this attack on two different CPU-GPU platforms and observe similar experimental results that exhibit the capability of platform portability of the attack. Also, we investigate the robustness of the proposed attack to varying background noises and a modified DNN pipeline. Besides, we exhibit that the leakage of model architecture family information from this stealthy attack can strengthen an adversarial attack against a victim DNN model by 2×.
papers.abstract_zh: 用于边缘计算的嵌入式系统越来越强大，一些系统配备了GPU，以实现设备上的深度神经网络(DNN)学习任务，如图像分类和对象检测。这种基于DNN的应用程序经常处理敏感的用户数据，它们的架构被认为是受保护的知识产权。我们研究了一种指纹攻击的潜在途径，以识别CPU-GPU边缘设备上的(运行中的)DNN模型架构家族(在最先进的DNN类别之外)。我们利用了对聚合系统级侧通道信息的秘密分析，例如用户空间级可用的内存、CPU和GPU使用情况。据我们所知，这是同类攻击中第一次不需要对受害设备进行物理访问和/或sudo访问，而只是被动地收集系统跟踪，这与大多数现有的基于逆向工程的DNN模型架构提取攻击相反。我们执行特征选择分析和基于监督机器学习的分类来检测模型架构。通过RAM、CPU和GPU功能的组合以及随机的基于森林的分类器，我们提出的攻击以99%的准确率将已知的DNN模型分类到其模型架构家族中。此外，所引入的攻击是如此可转移，以至于它可以以87.2%的准确度将未知的DNN模型检测到正确的DNN架构类别中。我们严格的特征分析表明，内存使用(RAM)是这种指纹识别的一个关键特征。此外，我们在两个不同的CPU-GPU平台上成功地复制了这种攻击，并观察到类似的实验结果，显示了攻击的平台可移植性。此外，我们还研究了提出的攻击对变化的背景噪声和修改的DNN流水线的鲁棒性。此外，我们还证明了从这种隐形攻击中泄漏的模型体系结构族信息可以将对受害者DNN模型的对抗性攻击增强2倍。
papers.title_zh: 对CPU-GPU边缘设备的DNN模型架构指纹攻击

papers.title: Towards Fair and Robust Classification
papers.authors: Haipei Sun, Kun Wu, Ting Wang, Wendy Hui Wang
papers.abstract: Robustness and fairness are two equally important issues for machine learning systems. Despite the active research on robustness and fairness of ML recently, these efforts focus on either fairness or robustness, but not both. To bridge this gap, in this paper, we design Fair and Robust Classification (FRoC) models that equip the classification models with both fairness and robustness. Meeting both fairness and robustness constraints is not trivial due to the tension between them. The trade-off between fairness, robustness, and model accuracy also introduces additional challenge. To address these challenges, we design two FRoC methods, namely FRoC-PRE that modifies the input data before model training, and FRoC-IN that modifies the model with an adversarial objective function to address both fairness and robustness during training. FRoC-IN is suitable to the settings where the users (e.g., ML service providers) only have the access to the model but not the original data, while FRoC-PRE works for the settings where the users (e.g., data owners) have the access to both data and a surrogate model that may have similar architecture as the target model. Our extensive experiments on real-world datasets demonstrate that both FRoC-IN and FRoC-PRE can achieve both fairness and robustness with insignificant accuracy loss of the target model.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于机器学习系统来说，鲁棒性和公平性是两个同等重要的问题。尽管最近对ML的鲁棒性和公平性进行了积极的研究，但是这些努力集中在公平性或鲁棒性上，而不是两者。为了弥合这一差距，在本文中，我们设计了公平和鲁棒分类(FRoC)模型，该模型为分类模型配备了公平性和鲁棒性。由于公平性和健壮性之间的紧张关系，同时满足它们并不容易。公平性、稳健性和模型准确性之间权衡也引入了额外的挑战。为了解决这些挑战，我们设计了两种FRoC方法，即在模型训练之前修改输入数据的FRoC-PRE，以及用对抗性目标函数修改模型以解决训练期间的公平性和鲁棒性的FRoC-IN。FRoC-IN适用于用户(例如，ML服务提供商)只能访问模型而不能访问原始数据的设置，而FRoC-PRE适用于用户(例如，数据所有者)可以访问数据和与目标模型具有相似架构的代理模型的设置。我们在真实数据集上的大量实验表明，FRoC-IN和FRoC-PRE都可以在不损失目标模型准确性的情况下实现公平性和鲁棒性。
papers.title_zh: 走向公平和稳健的分类

papers.title: WatchAuth: User Authentication and Intent Recognition in Mobile Payments using a Smartwatch
papers.authors: Jack Sturgess, Simon Eberz, Ivo Sluganovic, Ivan Martinovic
papers.abstract: In this paper, we show that the tap gesture, performed when a user ‘taps’ a smartwatch onto an NFC-enabled terminal to make a payment, is a biometric capable of implicitly authenticating the user and simultaneously recognising intent-to-pay. The proposed system can be deployed purely in software on the watch without requiring updates to payment terminals. It is agnostic to terminal type and position and the intent recognition portion does not require any training data from the user. To validate the system, we conduct a user study (n=16) to collect wrist motion data from users as they interact with payment terminals and to collect long-term data from a subset of them ($\mathrm{n}=9$) as they perform daily activities. Based on this data, we identify optimum gesture parameters and develop authentication and intent recognition models, for which we achieve EERs of 0.08 and 0.04, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们展示了当用户在支持NFC的终端上“轻击”智能手表进行支付时，所执行的轻击手势是一种能够隐式验证用户身份并同时识别支付意图的生物特征。所提出的系统可以完全部署在手表上的软件中，而不需要更新支付终端。它不知道终端类型和位置，并且意图识别部分不需要来自用户的任何训练数据。为了验证该系统，我们进行了一项用户研究(n=16)，在用户与支付终端交互时收集他们的手腕运动数据，并在他们进行日常活动时收集他们的子集($\mathrm{n}=9$)的长期数据。基于这些数据，我们确定了最佳手势参数，并开发了认证和意图识别模型，我们分别实现了0.08和0.04的eer。
papers.title_zh: WatchAuth:使用智能手表的移动支付中的用户认证和意图识别

papers.title: Difficult for Thee, But Not for Me: Measuring the Difficulty and User Experience of Remediating Persistent IoT Malware
papers.authors: Elsa Rodríguez, Max Fukkink, Simon Parkin, Michel van Eeten, Carlos Gañán
papers.abstract: Consumer IoT devices may suffer malware attacks, and be recruited into botnets or worse. There is evidence that generic advice to device owners to address IoT malware can be successful, but this does not account for emerging forms of persistent IoT malware. Less is known about persistent malware, which resides on persistent storage, requiring targeted manual effort to remove it. This paper presents a field study on the removal of persistent IoT malware by consumers. We partnered with an ISP to contrast remediation times of 760 customers across three malware categories: Windows malware, non-persistent IoT malware, and persistent IoT malware. We also contacted ISP customers identified as having persistent IoT malware on their network-attached storage devices, specifically QSnatch. We found that persistent IoT malware exhibits a mean infection duration many times higher than Windows or Mirai malware; QSnatch has a survival probability of 30% after 180 days, whereby most if not all other observed malware types have been removed. For interviewed device users, QSnatch infections lasted longer, so are apparently more difficult to get rid of, yet participants did not report experiencing difficulty in following notification instructions. We see two factors driving this paradoxical finding: First, most users reported having high technical competency. Also, we found evidence of planning behavior for these tasks and the need for multiple notifications. Our findings demonstrate the critical nature of interventions from outside for persistent malware, since automatic scan of an AV tool or a power cycle, like we are used to for Windows malware and Mirai infections, will not solve persistent IoT malware infections.
papers.abstract_zh: 消费者物联网设备可能会遭受恶意软件攻击，并被招募到僵尸网络或更糟。有证据表明，向设备所有者提供解决物联网恶意软件的通用建议可能是成功的，但这并不能解释新出现的持久性物联网恶意软件。对于驻留在持久性存储上的持久性恶意软件，我们知之甚少，需要有针对性的手动操作才能将其删除。本文介绍了一项关于消费者清除持久性物联网恶意软件的实地研究。我们与一家ISP合作，对比了760名客户在三个恶意软件类别中的补救时间:Windows恶意软件、非持久性物联网恶意软件和持久性物联网恶意软件。我们还联系了被确定在其网络连接存储设备上存在持续物联网恶意软件的ISP客户，特别是QSnatch。我们发现，持久性物联网恶意软件的平均感染持续时间比Windows或Mirai未来组合恶意软件高出许多倍；QSnatch在180天后有30%的生存概率，因此大多数(如果不是所有)其他观察到的恶意软件类型都已被删除。对于接受采访的设备用户，QSnatch感染持续时间更长，因此显然更难清除，但参与者没有报告在遵循通知指示方面遇到困难。我们看到两个因素推动了这一矛盾的发现:首先，大多数用户报告有很高的技术能力。此外，我们发现了这些任务的计划行为和多通知需求的证据。我们的研究结果证明了外部干预对持续恶意软件的重要性，因为自动扫描反病毒工具或重启电源，就像我们习惯的Windows恶意软件和Mirai未来组合感染一样，不会解决持续的物联网恶意软件感染。
papers.title_zh: 对你来说很难，但对我来说并不困难:衡量补救持久性物联网恶意软件的难度和用户体验

papers.title: KGP Meter: Communicating Kin Genomic Privacy to the Masses
papers.authors: Mathias Humbert, Didier Dupertuis, Mauro Cherubini, Kévin Huguenin
papers.abstract: Direct-to-consumer genetic testing services are gaining momentum: As of today, companies such as 23andMe or AncestryDNA have already attracted 26 million customers. These services raise privacy concerns, exacerbated by the fact that their customers can then share their genomic data on platforms such as GEDmatch. Notwithstanding their right to learn about their genetic background or to share their genomic data, it is paramount that individuals realize that such a behavior damages their relatives' privacy (i.e., kin genomic privacy). In this paper, we present KGP Meter, a new online tool that provides means for raising awareness in the general public about the privacy risks of genomic data sharing. Our tool features various properties that makes it highly interactive, privacy-preserving (i.e., not requiring access to the actual genomic data), and user-friendly. It explores possible configurations in an optimized way and combines well-established graphical models with an entropy-based metric to compute kin genomic privacy scores. Our experiments show that KGP Meter is very responsive. We design and implement an interface that enables users to draw their family trees and indicate which of their relatives' genomes are known, and that communicates the resulting privacy scores to the users. We then analyze the usage of the tool and survey users to better understand users' perceptions towards these risks and evaluate our tool. We observe that most of them find the privacy score worrisome, and that the large majority of them find KGP Meter useful.
papers.abstract_zh: 直接面向消费者的基因检测服务正在获得势头:截至今天，23andMe或AncestryDNA等公司已经吸引了2600万客户。这些服务引发了隐私担忧，而客户可以在GEDmatch等平台上分享他们的基因组数据这一事实加剧了这种担忧。尽管他们有权了解自己的遗传背景或分享自己的基因组数据，但最重要的是，个人认识到这种行为损害了他们亲属的隐私(即亲属基因组隐私)。在本文中，我们介绍了KGP计，一种新的在线工具，它提供了提高公众对基因组数据共享的隐私风险的认识的手段。我们的工具具有各种特性，使其具有高度交互性、隐私保护性(即不需要访问实际的基因组数据)和用户友好性。它以优化的方式探索可能的配置，并将完善的图形模型与基于熵的度量结合起来，以计算亲属基因组隐私得分。我们的实验表明KGP计非常灵敏。我们设计并实现了一个界面，使用户能够绘制他们的家谱，并指出他们的哪些亲属的基因组是已知的，并向用户传达由此产生的隐私得分。然后，我们分析该工具的使用情况，并调查用户，以更好地了解用户对这些风险的看法，并评估我们的工具。我们观察到，他们中的大多数人认为隐私得分令人担忧，而且他们中的绝大多数人认为KGP量表有用。
papers.title_zh: KGP米:向大众传达亲属基因组隐私

papers.title: aaeCAPTCHA: The Design and Implementation of Audio Adversarial CAPTCHA
papers.authors: Imran Hossen, Xiali Hei
papers.abstract: CAPTCHAs are designed to prevent malicious bot programs from abusing websites.
